title: Opacity in Discrete Event Systems: A Perspective and Overview
summary: Opacity has emerged as a central confidentiality notion for information-flow security in discrete event systems (DES), capturing the requirement that an external observer (intruder) should never be able to determine with certainty whether the system is, was, or will be in a secret state. This article provides a concise, newcomer-friendly overview of opacity in DES, emphasizing core definitions and the unifying estimation viewpoint behind major opacity notions,. We summarize representative verification techniques and highlight how different observation models reshape both the problem formulation and algorithmic structure. We then review principal enforcement paradigms, ranging from opacity-enforcing supervisory control to sensor activation/information release optimization and obfuscation/editing mechanisms. Beyond finite automata, we outline how opacity has been studied in richer models such as stochastic systems, timed systems, Petri nets, and continuous/hybrid dynamics, and we briefly survey applications in robotics, location privacy, and information services. Finally, we discuss selected open challenges, including solvability under incomparable information, scalable methods beyond worst-case complexity, and opacity under intelligent or data-driven adversaries.

AI.tldr: 本文对离散事件系统（DES）中的不透明性（opacity）这一信息流安全概念进行了概述，涵盖了核心定义、估计视角、验证技术、不同观测模型的影响、强制执行方法，并介绍了在更复杂的系统模型和实际应用中的研究进展，最后讨论了未来的开放性挑战。
AI.motivation: 不透明性是离散事件系统中信息流安全的一个核心保密概念，旨在确保外部观察者无法确定系统的秘密状态。本文旨在为初学者提供一个清晰、友好的不透明性概览。
AI.method: 文章通过强调核心定义和统一的估计视角来介绍不透明性，总结了代表性的验证技术，并讨论了不同观测模型如何改变问题和算法结构。此外，文章还回顾了主要的强制执行方法，并将不透明性研究的范围扩展到更丰富的系统模型（如随机系统、时序系统、Petri网、连续/混合动力系统）和实际应用。
AI.result: 文章展示了不透明性概念的统一性，并总结了其在不同系统模型和应用中的研究成果。同时，文章还探讨了不同观测模型和强制执行方法对不透明性问题的影响。
AI.conclusion: 不透明性在离散事件系统中具有重要意义，并且在各种系统模型和应用中得到了广泛研究。未来的研究方向包括解决不可比信息下的可解性问题、开发超越最坏情况复杂性的可扩展方法，以及研究面对智能或数据驱动敌手时的不透明性。

title: Decoder-based Sense Knowledge Distillation
summary: Large language models (LLMs) learn contextual embeddings that capture rich semantic information, yet they often overlook structured lexical knowledge such as word senses and relationships. Prior work has shown that incorporating sense dictionaries can improve knowledge distillation for encoder models, but their application to decoder as generative models remains challenging. In this paper, we introduce Decoder-based Sense Knowledge Distillation (DSKD), a framework that integrates lexical resources into the training of decoder-style LLMs without requiring dictionary lookup at inference time. Extensive experiments on diverse benchmarks demonstrate that DSKD significantly enhances knowledge distillation performance for decoders, enabling generative models to inherit structured semantics while maintaining efficient training.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为DSKD的框架，用于将词汇知识（如词义和关系）融入解码器式大型语言模型的训练中，无需在推理时进行词典查找，并显著提高了知识蒸馏的性能。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型虽然能学习丰富的上下文嵌入，但常常忽略结构化的词汇知识，例如词义和词语关系。现有方法将词义词典用于编码器模型效果较好，但应用于生成式的解码器模型存在挑战。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为Decoder-based Sense Knowledge Distillation (DSKD) 的框架，该框架在不要求推理时进行词典查找的情况下，将词汇资源整合到解码器式LLM的训练中。
AI.result: 在多个基准测试上的实验表明，DSKD显著提升了解码器的知识蒸馏性能。
AI.conclusion: DSKD框架成功地使生成模型能够继承结构化的语义信息，同时保持了高效的训练。

title: Graph Your Way to Inspiration: Integrating Co-Author Graphs with Retrieval-Augmented Generation for Large Language Model Based Scientific Idea Generation
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) demonstrate potential in the field of scientific idea generation. However, the generated results often lack controllable academic context and traceable inspiration pathways. To bridge this gap, this paper proposes a scientific idea generation system called GYWI, which combines author knowledge graphs with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to form an external knowledge base to provide controllable context and trace of inspiration path for LLMs to generate new scientific ideas. We first propose an author-centered knowledge graph construction method and inspiration source sampling algorithms to construct external knowledge base. Then, we propose a hybrid retrieval mechanism that is composed of both RAG and GraphRAG to retrieve content with both depth and breadth knowledge. It forms a hybrid context. Thirdly, we propose a Prompt optimization strategy incorporating reinforcement learning principles to automatically guide LLMs optimizing the results based on the hybrid context. To evaluate the proposed approaches, we constructed an evaluation dataset based on arXiv (2018-2023). This paper also develops a comprehensive evaluation method including empirical automatic assessment in multiple-choice question task, LLM-based scoring, human evaluation, and semantic space visualization analysis. The generated ideas are evaluated from the following five dimensions: novelty, feasibility, clarity, relevance, and significance. We conducted experiments on different LLMs including GPT-4o, DeepSeek-V3, Qwen3-8B, and Gemini 2.5. Experimental results show that GYWI significantly outperforms mainstream LLMs in multiple metrics such as novelty, reliability, and relevance.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个名为GYWI的科学想法生成系统，结合了作者知识图谱和检索增强生成（RAG），以提供可控的学术背景和可追溯的灵感路径，从而提高LLM生成的科学想法的质量。
AI.motivation: 现有的LLM在科学想法生成方面潜力巨大，但生成的想法往往缺乏可控的学术背景和可追溯的灵感来源。
AI.method: 该研究提出了一个名为GYWI的系统，包含三个主要部分：1. 构建作者知识图谱和灵感源采样算法，形成外部知识库；2. 采用混合检索机制（RAG + GraphRAG），结合深度和广度知识，形成混合上下文；3. 提出基于强化学习的Prompt优化策略，引导LLM优化生成结果。
AI.result: 在基于arXiv数据集构建的评估集上进行实验，GYWI系统在多个评估维度（新颖性、可行性、清晰度、相关性、重要性）上，相较于主流LLM（包括GPT-4o、DeepSeek-V3、Qwen3-8B和Gemini 2.5），在多个指标（如新颖性、可靠性、相关性）上表现出显著优势。
AI.conclusion: GYWI系统能够有效地为LLM生成科学想法提供可控的上下文和可追溯的灵感路径，显著提升了生成想法的新颖性、可靠性和相关性等关键质量指标。

title: Deep Accurate Solver for the Geodesic Problem
comment: Extended version of Deep Accurate Solver for the Geodesic Problem originally published in Scale Space and Variational Methods in Computer Vision (SSVM 2023), Lecture Notes in Computer Science, Springer. This version includes additional experiments and detailed analysis
summary: A common approach to compute distances on continuous surfaces is by considering a discretized polygonal mesh approximating the surface and estimating distances on the polygon. We show that exact geodesic distances restricted to the polygon are at most second-order accurate with respect to the distances on the corresponding continuous surface. By order of accuracy we refer to the convergence rate as a function of the average distance between sampled points. Next, a higher-order accurate deep learning method for computing geodesic distances on surfaces is introduced. Traditionally, one considers two main components when computing distances on surfaces: a numerical solver that locally approximates the distance function, and an efficient causal ordering scheme by which surface points are updated. Classical minimal path methods often exploit a dynamic programming principle with quasi-linear computational complexity in the number of sampled points. The quality of the distance approximation is determined by the local solver that is revisited in this paper. To improve state of the art accuracy, we consider a neural network-based local solver which implicitly approximates the structure of the continuous surface. We supply numerical evidence that the proposed learned update scheme provides better accuracy compared to the best possible polyhedral approximations and previous learning-based methods. The result is a third-order accurate solver with a bootstrapping-recipe for further improvement.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种基于深度学习的高阶精确计算表面测地距离的方法，该方法通过一个学习到的局部求解器来隐式地近似连续表面结构，相较于传统的基于多边形逼近和现有学习方法，提供了更高的精度。
AI.motivation: 传统的基于多边形网格近似表面的测地距离计算方法精度有限（二阶），需要提高计算精度。
AI.method: 提出了一种基于深度学习的高阶精确计算表面测地距离的方法，其核心是一个利用神经网络作为局部求解器来隐式近似连续表面结构，并结合一个因果排序方案进行表面点更新。该方法还提供了一种用于进一步提升精度的自举策略。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，所提出的学习方法比最优的多边形逼近和之前基于学习的方法具有更高的精度，达到了三阶精度。
AI.conclusion: 基于深度学习的学习型局部求解器能够隐式地近似连续表面结构，从而显著提高表面测地距离的计算精度，并且可以通过自举策略进一步提升。该方法克服了传统方法的精度限制。

title: Enabling clinical use of foundation models in histopathology
summary: Foundation models in histopathology are expected to facilitate the development of high-performing and generalisable deep learning systems. However, current models capture not only biologically relevant features, but also pre-analytic and scanner-specific variation that bias the predictions of task-specific models trained from the foundation model features. Here we show that introducing novel robustness losses during training of downstream task-specific models reduces sensitivity to technical variability. A purpose-designed comprehensive experimentation setup with 27,042 WSIs from 6155 patients is used to train thousands of models from the features of eight popular foundation models for computational pathology. In addition to a substantial improvement in robustness, we observe that prediction accuracy improves by focusing on biologically relevant features. Our approach successfully mitigates robustness issues of foundation models for computational pathology without retraining the foundation models themselves, enabling development of robust computational pathology models applicable to real-world data in routine clinical practice.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种在训练下游任务模型时引入鲁棒性损失的方法，以减少计算病理学基础模型对技术变化的敏感性，从而提高模型的鲁棒性和准确性，使其适用于真实世界的临床数据。
AI.motivation: 现有的计算病理学基础模型会捕捉到生物学特征以及分析前和扫描仪特异性的变异，这些变异会影响基于基础模型特征训练的任务特定模型的预测。
AI.method: 作者设计了一个包含 27,042 张 WSI 的实验设置，并使用八个流行的计算病理学基础模型的特征训练了数千个模型。在训练下游任务模型时，引入了新颖的鲁棒性损失。
AI.result: 该方法在提高模型鲁棒性方面取得了显著成效，同时通过关注生物学相关特征提高了预测准确性。该方法成功缓解了计算病理学基础模型的鲁棒性问题，而无需重新训练基础模型。
AI.conclusion: 提出的鲁棒性损失方法能够开发出适用于真实世界数据的、鲁棒的计算病理学模型，而无需对基础模型进行重新训练。

title: SODA-CitrON: Static Object Data Association by Clustering Multi-Modal Sensor Detections Online
comment: 8 pages, 5 figures; Submitted to the 2026 International Conference on Information Fusion (FUSION 2026). Under review
summary: The online fusion and tracking of static objects from heterogeneous sensor detections is a fundamental problem in robotics, autonomous systems, and environmental mapping. Although classical data association approaches such as JPDA are well suited for dynamic targets, they are less effective for static objects observed intermittently and with heterogeneous uncertainties, where motion models provide minimal discriminative with respect to clutter. In this paper, we propose a novel method for static object data association by clustering multi-modal sensor detections online (SODA-CitrON), while simultaneously estimating positions and maintaining persistent tracks for an unknown number of objects. The proposed unsupervised machine learning approach operates in a fully online manner and handles temporally uncorrelated and multi-sensor measurements. Additionally, it has a worst-case loglinear complexity in the number of sensor detections while providing full output explainability. We evaluate the proposed approach in different Monte Carlo simulation scenarios and compare it against state-of-the-art methods, including Bayesian filtering, DBSTREAM clustering, and JPDA. The results demonstrate that SODA-CitrON consistently outperforms the compared methods in terms of F1 score, position RMSE, MOTP, and MOTA in the static object mapping scenarios studied.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为SODA-CitrON的新型在线静态目标数据关联方法，通过聚类多模态传感器检测来同时估计位置并为未知数量的目标维护持续跟踪，该方法在仿真中优于现有技术。
AI.motivation: 传统的JPDA等数据关联方法对动态目标有效，但对于静态目标，尤其是在间歇观测、异构不确定性和运动模型区分度低的情况下，效果不佳。因此，需要一种新的方法来解决静态目标的在线数据关联问题。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为SODA-CitrON的无监督机器学习方法。它以完全在线的方式工作，处理时间上不相关的多传感器测量，并通过聚类多模态传感器检测来在线进行数据关联。同时，该方法还能估计目标位置并维护持久跟踪，处理未知数量的目标。
AI.result: 在不同的蒙特卡洛仿真场景下，SODA-CitrON在F1分数、位置RMSE、MOTP和MOTA等方面，均一致优于贝叶斯滤波、DBSTREAM聚类和JPDA等现有最先进的方法。
AI.conclusion: SODA-CitrON是一种有效且可解释的静态目标在线数据关联方法，能够处理异构传感器、间歇观测和未知数量的目标，并在仿真中展现出优越的性能。

title: A Mission Engineering Framework for Uncrewed Aerial Vehicle Design in GNSS-Denied Environments for Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance Mission Sets
comment: 12 pages, 8 figures, submitted to IEEE Systems for publication
summary:
Small, low-size, weight, power, and cost (SWaP-C) uncrewed aerial vehicles (UAVs) are increasingly used for intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance (ISR) missions due to their affordability, attritability, and suitability for distributed operations. However, their design poses challenges including limited endurance, constrained payload capacity, and reliance on simple sensing modalities such as fixed-field-of-view, bearing-only cameras. Traditional platform-centric methods cannot capture the coupled performance, cost, and coordination trade-offs that emerge at the system-of-systems level.
  This paper presents a mission engineering framework for early-phase design of low-SWaP-C UAV ISR architectures. The framework integrates design of experiments, multi-objective optimization, and high-fidelity simulation into a closed-loop process linking design variables to estimator-informed performance and mission cost. Candidate architectures are explored via Latin hypercube sampling and refined using a genetic algorithm, with performance evaluated through Monte Carlo trials of a federated Kalman filter benchmarked against the posterior Cramer-Rao lower bound. Validation follows the Validation Square methodology, combining theoretical, empirical, and structural assessments.
  A case study on man-overboard localization in a GNSS-denied maritime environment shows that localization accuracy saturates at sub-meter levels, while higher-cost configurations primarily add redundancy and resilience. The framework thus quantifies mission trade-offs between performance, affordability, and robustness, providing a scalable decision-support tool for contested, resource-constrained ISR missions.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一个针对低SWaP-C无人机ISR架构的早期设计任务工程框架，该框架整合了实验设计、多目标优化和高保真仿真，用于量化性能、成本和鲁棒性之间的权衡，并以海上有人落水定位为例进行了验证。
AI.motivation: 低SWaP-C无人机在ISR任务中应用广泛，但其设计面临续航、载荷和传感器能力受限等挑战。传统的平台中心方法无法捕捉系统级的设计权衡，因此需要一个能够处理系统之系统层面性能、成本和协调权衡的框架。
AI.method: 研究提出了一种任务工程框架，整合了实验设计（拉丁超立方采样）、多目标优化（遗传算法）和高保真仿真（蒙特卡洛试验，使用联邦卡尔曼滤波器并与后验Cramer-Rao下界进行基准测试）。框架通过闭环过程将设计变量与基于估计器的性能和任务成本联系起来，并采用Validation Square方法进行验证。
AI.result: 在海上有人落水定位的案例研究中，发现定位精度在亚米级别饱和，而更高成本的配置主要增加了冗余性和弹性。该框架能够量化性能、可负担性和鲁棒性之间的任务权衡。
AI.conclusion: 该框架是一个可扩展的决策支持工具，能够为受限、资源受限的ISR任务量化任务权衡，从而帮助设计低SWaP-C无人机ISR架构。

title: HyperKKL: Enabling Non-Autonomous State Estimation through Dynamic Weight Conditioning
comment: 18 pages, 6 figures, Under review in ICLR 2026 AI & PDE Workshop
summary: This paper proposes HyperKKL, a novel learning approach for designing Kazantzis-Kravaris/Luenberger (KKL) observers for non-autonomous nonlinear systems. While KKL observers offer a rigorous theoretical framework by immersing nonlinear dynamics into a stable linear latent space, its practical realization relies on solving Partial Differential Equations (PDE) that are analytically intractable. Current existing learning-based approximations of the KKL observer are mostly designed for autonomous systems, failing to generalize to driven dynamics without expensive retraining or online gradient updates. HyperKKL addresses this by employing a hypernetwork architecture that encodes the exogenous input signal to instantaneously generate the parameters of the KKL observer, effectively learning a family of immersion maps parameterized by the external drive. We rigorously evaluate this approach against a curriculum learning strategy that attempts to generalize from autonomous regimes via training heuristics alone. The novel approach is illustrated on four numerical simulations in benchmark examples including the Duffing, Van der Pol, Lorenz, and Rössler systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为HyperKKL的新型学习方法，用于设计非自治非线性系统的Kazantzis-Kravaris/Luenberger (KKL) 观测器。与现有方法不同，HyperKKL使用超网络架构，能够根据外部输入信号动态生成KKL观测器的参数，从而无需昂贵的重新训练或在线梯度更新即可处理驱动动力学。
AI.motivation: 现有的基于学习的KKL观测器近似方法主要针对自治系统，难以泛化到非自治（驱动）系统，需要昂贵的重新训练或在线梯度更新。本文旨在解决这一局限性。
AI.method: 利用超网络架构，该架构将外源输入信号编码，以即时生成KKL观测器的参数，从而学习由外部驱动参数化的浸入映射族。同时，采用课程学习策略，尝试通过训练启发式方法从自治状态进行泛化。
AI.result: HyperKKL在杜芬（Duffing）、范德波尔（Van der Pol）、洛伦兹（Lorenz）和罗索勒（Rössler）系统等四个基准系统上的数值模拟中得到了严格的评估。与课程学习策略相比，HyperKKL展示了其有效性。
AI.conclusion: HyperKKL是一种新颖的学习方法，通过超网络架构克服了现有KKL观测器近似方法在处理非自治非线性系统方面的局限性，能够直接根据输入信号生成观测器参数，避免了昂贵的重新训练。

title: Toward Wireless Human-Machine Collaboration in the 6G Era
comment: This work has been submitted to the IEEE for possible publication
summary: The next industrial revolution, Industry 5.0, will be driven by advanced technologies that foster human-machine collaboration (HMC). It will leverage human creativity, judgment, and dexterity with the machine's strength, precision, and speed to improve productivity, quality of life, and sustainability. Wireless communications, empowered by the emerging capabilities of sixth-generation (6G) wireless networks, will play a central role in enabling flexible, scalable, and low-cost deployment of geographically distributed HMC systems. In this article, we first introduce the generic architecture and key components of wireless HMC (WHMC). We then present the network topologies of WHMC and highlight impactful applications across various industry sectors. Driven by the prospective applications, we elaborate on new performance metrics that researchers and practitioners may consider during the exploration and implementation of WHMC and discuss new design methodologies. We then summarize the communication requirements and review promising state-of-the-art technologies that can support WHMC. Finally, we present a proof-of-concept case study and identify several open challenges.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了在6G无线网络的赋能下，工业5.0中无线人机协作（WHMC）的架构、应用、性能指标、设计方法、通信需求和关键技术，并提出了一个概念验证案例，指出了未来挑战。
AI.motivation: 工业5.0将以人机协作为核心，而6G无线网络将是实现这一目标的关键技术，因此需要研究WHMC的各个方面。
AI.method: 本文首先介绍了WHMC的通用架构和组件，然后讨论了网络拓扑结构、应用场景、新的性能指标和设计方法，接着总结了通信需求并回顾了相关技术，最后提出了一个概念验证案例。
AI.result: 文章提出了WHMC的架构和应用，并讨论了新的性能指标和设计方法，同时回顾了支持WHMC的关键技术，并展示了一个概念验证案例。
AI.conclusion: WHMC是工业5.0的关键组成部分，6G网络将为其发展提供支持。虽然存在一些挑战，但WHMC在提高生产力、生活质量和可持续性方面具有巨大潜力。

title: Small HVAC Control Demonstrations in Larger Buildings Often Overestimate Savings
summary: How much energy, money, and emissions can advanced control of heating and cooling equipment save in real buildings? To address this question, researchers sometimes control a small number of thermal zones within a larger multi-zone building, then report savings for the controlled zones only. That approach can overestimate savings by neglecting heat transfer between controlled zones and adjacent zones. This paper mathematically characterizes the overestimation error when the dynamics are linear and the objectives are linear in the thermal load, as usually holds when optimizing energy efficiency, energy costs, or emissions. Overestimation errors can be large even in seemingly innocuous situations. For example, when controlling only interior zones that have no direct thermal contact with the outdoors, all perceived savings are fictitious. This paper provides an alternative estimation method based on the controlled and adjacent zones' temperature measurements. The new method does not require estimating how much energy the building would have used under baseline operations, so it removes the additional measurement and verification challenge of accurate baseline estimation.

AI.tldr: 研究人员提出了一种新的方法来量化和估算控制供暖和制冷设备节能减排的真实节省量，解决了现有方法可能因忽略区域间热传递而导致的高估问题。
AI.motivation: 现有研究在评估先进的供暖和制冷设备控制节省量时，常常只控制部分区域并仅报告该区域的节省量，这可能由于忽略了区域间的热传递而高估了实际节省量。
AI.method: 该研究在热力学系统线性且目标函数在热负荷上呈线性的情况下（通常是优化能效、成本或排放时），对高估误差进行了数学上的表征。并提出了一种基于被控区域和相邻区域温度测量的新估算方法，该方法无需估算基线运行情况下的能耗。
AI.result: 研究表明，高估误差可能很大，即使在看似无害的情况下。例如，仅控制内部区域（不与室外直接接触）时，所有“节省”的都是虚假的。新方法避免了估算基线运行能耗带来的测量和验证挑战。
AI.conclusion: 现有方法在估算先进控制系统在真实建筑中的节能减排效果时存在高估问题，尤其是在仅控制内部区域时。本文提出的基于温度测量的新方法能够更准确地量化实际节省量，并简化了估算过程。

title: Transformer Actor-Critic for Efficient Freshness-Aware Resource Allocation
comment: \c{opyright} 2026 IEEE. Personal use of this material is permitted. Permission from IEEE must be obtained for all other uses. Accepted for publication in the 2026 IEEE International Conference on Machine Learning for Communication and Networking (ICMLCN)
summary: Emerging applications such as autonomous driving and industrial automation demand ultra-reliable and low-latency communication (URLLC), where maintaining fresh and timely information is critical. A key performance metric in such systems is the age of information (AoI). This paper addresses AoI minimization in a multi-user uplink wireless network using non-orthogonal multiple access (NOMA), where users offload tasks to a base station. The system must handle user heterogeneity in task sizes, AoI thresholds, and penalty sensitivities, while adhering to NOMA constraints on user scheduling. We propose a deep reinforcement learning (DRL) framework based on proximal policy optimization (PPO), enhanced with a Transformer encoder. The attention mechanism allows the agent to focus on critical user states and capture inter-user dependencies, improving policy performance and scalability. Extensive simulations show that our method reduces average AoI compared to baselines. We also analyze the evolution of attention weights during training and observe that the model progressively learns to prioritize high-importance users. Attention maps reveal meaningful structure: early-stage policies exhibit uniform attention, while later stages show focused patterns aligned with user priority and NOMA constraints. These results highlight the promise of attention-driven DRL for intelligent, priority-aware resource allocation in next-generation wireless systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于Transformer增强的DRL（PPO）框架，用于在NOMA多用户上行链路无线网络中最小化信息年龄（AoI），并考虑了用户异质性和NOMA约束。实验证明，该方法优于基线，并且通过分析注意力权重，揭示了模型学习到的用户优先级和NOMA约束的调度策略。
AI.motivation: 自动驾驶和工业自动化等新兴应用需要超可靠低延迟通信（URLLC），而信息年龄（AoI）是衡量此类系统信息新鲜度的关键指标。因此，研究如何在异构用户和NOMA约束下最小化AoI具有重要意义。
AI.method: 本文提出了一种基于近端策略优化（PPO）的深度强化学习（DRL）框架，并引入了Transformer编码器来增强其能力。Transformer的注意力机制使得智能体能够关注关键用户状态并捕捉用户间的依赖关系。
AI.result: 该方法在模拟实验中显著降低了平均AoI，优于现有的基线方法。通过分析训练过程中的注意力权重演变，发现模型能够学习到并优先考虑高重要性的用户。注意力图显示了模型从早期均匀关注到后期聚焦于高优先级用户和NOMA约束的调度模式。
AI.conclusion: 基于注意力机制的DRL方法在下一代无线系统中，能够实现智能的、具有优先级感知的资源分配，有望有效解决AoI最小化问题。

title: HARU-Net: Hybrid Attention Residual U-Net for Edge-Preserving Denoising in Cone-Beam Computed Tomography
summary: Cone-beam computed tomography (CBCT) is widely used in dental and maxillofacial imaging, but low-dose acquisition introduces strong, spatially varying noise that degrades soft-tissue visibility and obscures fine anatomical structures. Classical denoising methods struggle to suppress noise in CBCT while preserving edges. Although deep learning-based approaches offer high-fidelity restoration, their use in CBCT denoising is limited by the scarcity of high-resolution CBCT data for supervised training. To address this research gap, we propose a novel Hybrid Attention Residual U-Net (HARU-Net) for high-quality denoising of CBCT data, trained on a cadaver dataset of human hemimandibles acquired using a high-resolution protocol of the 3D Accuitomo 170 (J. Morita, Kyoto, Japan) CBCT system. The novel contribution of this approach is the integration of three complementary architectural components: (i) a hybrid attention transformer block (HAB) embedded within each skip connection to selectively emphasize salient anatomical features, (ii) a residual hybrid attention transformer group (RHAG) at the bottleneck to strengthen global contextual modeling and long-range feature interactions, and (iii) residual learning convolutional blocks to facilitate deeper, more stable feature extraction throughout the network. HARU-Net consistently outperforms state-of-the-art (SOTA) methods including SwinIR and Uformer, achieving the highest PSNR (37.52 dB), highest SSIM (0.9557), and lowest GMSD (0.1084). This effective and clinically reliable CBCT denoising is achieved at a computational cost significantly lower than that of the SOTA methods, offering a practical advancement toward improving diagnostic quality in low-dose CBCT imaging.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为HARU-Net的混合注意力残差U-Net模型，用于低剂量CBCT图像的去噪。该模型通过结合混合注意力Transformer块、残差混合注意力Transformer组和残差学习卷积块，有效增强了CBCT图像的细节，并在PSNR、SSIM和GMSD指标上优于现有SOTA方法，且计算成本更低。
AI.motivation: 低剂量CBCT成像会引入强烈的空间变化噪声，影响软组织可见性和精细解剖结构的清晰度。现有的经典去噪方法在抑制噪声的同时难以保持边缘，而基于深度学习的方法因缺乏高分辨率CBCT训练数据而受到限制。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为HARU-Net的混合注意力残差U-Net模型，该模型包含三个主要组成部分：（1）嵌入在跳跃连接中的混合注意力Transformer块（HAB），用于选择性地强调解剖特征；（2）位于瓶颈处的残差混合注意力Transformer组（RHAG），用于加强全局上下文建模和长距离特征交互；（3）用于促进更深层、更稳定特征提取的残差学习卷积块。
AI.result: HARU-Net在PSNR（37.52 dB）、SSIM（0.9557）和GMSD（0.1084）等指标上均优于SwinIR和Uformer等SOTA方法，实现了高保真恢复。
AI.conclusion: HARU-Net是一种有效且临床可靠的CBCT去噪方法，它以显著低于SOTA方法的计算成本，实现了对低剂量CBCT图像的增强，有望提高其诊断质量。

title: FIRE: A Comprehensive Benchmark for Financial Intelligence and Reasoning Evaluation
summary: We introduce FIRE, a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate both the theoretical financial knowledge of LLMs and their ability to handle practical business scenarios. For theoretical assessment, we curate a diverse set of examination questions drawn from widely recognized financial qualification exams, enabling evaluation of LLMs deep understanding and application of financial knowledge. In addition, to assess the practical value of LLMs in real-world financial tasks, we propose a systematic evaluation matrix that categorizes complex financial domains and ensures coverage of essential subdomains and business activities. Based on this evaluation matrix, we collect 3,000 financial scenario questions, consisting of closed-form decision questions with reference answers and open-ended questions evaluated by predefined rubrics. We conduct comprehensive evaluations of state-of-the-art LLMs on the FIRE benchmark, including XuanYuan 4.0, our latest financial-domain model, as a strong in-domain baseline. These results enable a systematic analysis of the capability boundaries of current LLMs in financial applications. We publicly release the benchmark questions and evaluation code to facilitate future research.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了FIRE基准，一个用于评估大型语言模型（LLM）在金融理论知识和实际业务场景处理能力的综合评估体系。FIRE包含来自金融资格考试的理论题和3000个实际金融场景题，并对现有LLM进行了评估，以分析其在金融应用中的能力边界，并公开了评估数据集和代码。
AI.motivation: 当前大型语言模型在金融领域的应用日益广泛，但缺乏一个全面的基准来评估其在理论金融知识和实际业务场景处理方面的能力。
AI.method: 构建了一个包含理论考核（金融资格考试题）和实践评估（基于评估矩阵设计的3000个金融场景题）的FIRE基准。对包括XuanYuan 4.0在内的最先进LLM进行了评估，并分析了结果。
AI.result: 通过在FIRE基准上的评估，揭示了当前LLM在金融领域的知识和能力边界。XuanYuan 4.0作为一个金融领域模型，被用作一个有力的参照基线。
AI.conclusion: FIRE基准提供了一个系统性的方法来评估LLM在金融领域的表现，为未来的研究提供了基础。评估结果有助于理解当前LLM在金融应用中的局限性，并指导未来的模型改进。

title: Optimizing Neural Network Architecture for Medical Image Segmentation Using Monte Carlo Tree Search
summary: This paper proposes a novel medical image segmentation framework, MNAS-Unet, which combines Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) and Neural Architecture Search (NAS). MNAS-Unet dynamically explores promising network architectures through MCTS, significantly enhancing the efficiency and accuracy of architecture search. It also optimizes the DownSC and UpSC unit structures, enabling fast and precise model adjustments. Experimental results demonstrate that MNAS-Unet outperforms NAS-Unet and other state-of-the-art models in segmentation accuracy on several medical image datasets, including PROMISE12, Ultrasound Nerve, and CHAOS. Furthermore, compared with NAS-Unet, MNAS-Unet reduces the architecture search budget by 54% (early stopping at 139 epochs versus 300 epochs under the same search setting), while achieving a lightweight model with only 0.6M parameters and lower GPU memory consumption, which further improves its practical applicability. These results suggest that MNAS-Unet can improve search efficiency while maintaining competitive segmentation accuracy under practical resource constraints.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种结合蒙特卡洛树搜索（MCTS）和神经架构搜索（NAS）的医学图像分割框架MNAS-Unet，该框架能高效且精确地搜索网络架构，优化了模型结构，并在多个医学影像数据集上取得了优于现有方法的分割精度，同时搜索效率更高，模型更轻量。
AI.motivation: 现有医学图像分割模型在搜索架构时效率不高且精度有待提高，并且对模型资源消耗（参数量、GPU内存）有较高要求，限制了其实际应用。本研究旨在提升架构搜索的效率和精度，并实现轻量化模型以适应实际应用。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为MNAS-Unet的新型医学图像分割框架，该框架结合了蒙特卡洛树搜索（MCTS）和神经架构搜索（NAS）。MCTS用于动态探索有前景的网络架构，同时优化了DownSC和UpSC单元结构。实验在PROMISE12、Ultrasound Nerve和CHAOS数据集上进行了评估。
AI.result: MNAS-Unet在分割精度上优于NAS-Unet及其他最先进的模型。与NAS-Unet相比，MNAS-Unet的架构搜索预算减少了54%（139个epoch vs 300个epoch），模型参数量仅为0.6M，GPU内存消耗更低。
AI.conclusion: MNAS-Unet能够提高搜索效率，同时在实际资源限制下保持具有竞争力的分割精度，并实现轻量化模型，从而提高其在医学影像分割领域的实际应用价值。

title: Detection and Recognition: A Pairwise Interaction Framework for Mobile Service Robots
summary: Autonomous mobile service robots, like lawnmowers or cleaning robots, operating in human-populated environments need to reason about local human-human interactions to support safe and socially aware navigation while fulfilling their tasks. For such robots, interaction understanding is not primarily a fine-grained recognition problem, but a perception problem under limited sensing quality and computational resources. Many existing approaches focus on holistic group activity recognition, which often requires complex and large models which may not be necessary for mobile service robots. Others use pairwise interaction methods which commonly rely on skeletal representations but their use in outdoor environments remains challenging. In this work, we argue that pairwise human interaction constitute a minimal yet sufficient perceptual unit for robot-centric social understanding. We study the problem of identifying interacting person pairs and classifying coarse-grained interaction behaviors sufficient for downstream group-level reasoning and service robot decision-making. To this end, we adopt a two-stage framework in which candidate interacting pairs are first identified based on lightweight geometric and motion cues, and interaction types are subsequently classified using a relation network. We evaluate the proposed approach on the JRDB dataset, where it achieves sufficient accuracy with reduced computational cost and model size compared to appearance-based methods. Additional experiments on the Collective Activity Dataset and zero shot test on a lawnmower-collected dataset further illustrate the generality of the proposed framework. These results suggest that pairwise geometric and motion cues provide a practical basis for interaction perception on mobile service robot providing a promising method for integration into mobile robot navigation stacks in future work. Code will be released soon

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种轻量级的两阶段框架，用于识别并对低分辨率的人与人交互行为进行粗粒度分类，以支持服务机器人在人群中安全导航。该方法基于几何和运动线索识别交互对，并使用关系网络进行行为分类，相比于现有方法在计算效率和模型大小上有所优势。
AI.motivation: 服务机器人需要在人流密集的环境中安全且有社会意识地导航，而理解局部人与人之间的互动是实现这一目标的关键。现有方法要么过于复杂，要么依赖于在户外难以实现的骨骼表示。因此，研究人员需要一种适用于服务机器人、计算资源有限且能有效理解交互的方式。
AI.method: 该研究提出一个两阶段框架：1. 基于轻量级的几何和运动线索，识别潜在的交互人对。2. 使用关系网络对识别出的交互对进行粗粒度交互行为分类。
AI.result: 在JRDB数据集上，该方法取得了足够高的准确率，且计算成本和模型尺寸显著低于基于外观的方法。在Collective Activity Dataset和草坪收割机数据集上的实验也证明了该框架的泛化能力。
AI.conclusion: 研究表明，成对的几何和运动线索是移动服务机器人实现交互感知的实用基础，为未来集成到机器人导航栈提供了有前景的方法。这种方法在满足机器人资源限制的同时，能够提供足够的信息用于下游的群体级推理和决策。

title: Scaling In, Not Up? Testing Thick Citation Context Analysis with GPT-5 and Fragile Prompts
comment: 26 pages, 1 figure, 3 tables (plus 17 pages supplement including 1 figure)
summary: This paper tests whether large language models (LLMs) can support interpretative citation context analysis (CCA) by scaling in thick, text-grounded readings of a single hard case rather than scaling up typological labels. It foregrounds prompt-sensitivity analysis as a methodological issue by varying prompt scaffolding and framing in a balanced 2x3 design. Using footnote 6 in Chubin and Moitra (1975) and Gilbert's (1977) reconstruction as a probe, I implement a two-stage GPT-5 pipeline: a citation-text-only surface classification and expectation pass, followed by cross-document interpretative reconstruction using the citing and cited full texts. Across 90 reconstructions, the model produces 450 distinct hypotheses. Close reading and inductive coding identify 21 recurring interpretative moves, and linear probability models estimate how prompt choices shift their frequencies and lexical repertoire. GPT-5's surface pass is highly stable, consistently classifying the citation as "supplementary". In reconstruction, the model generates a structured space of plausible alternatives, but scaffolding and examples redistribute attention and vocabulary, sometimes toward strained readings. Relative to Gilbert, GPT-5 detects the same textual hinges yet more often resolves them as lineage and positioning than as admonishment. The study outlines opportunities and risks of using LLMs as guided co-analysts for inspectable, contestable interpretative CCA, and it shows that prompt scaffolding and framing systematically tilt which plausible readings and vocabularies the model foregrounds.

AI.tldr: 本研究探索大型语言模型（LLMs）在解释性引文语境分析（CCA）中的应用，通过对单一案例进行深度文本阅读来评估其能力，并考察了提示词的敏感性。结果表明，LLMs能够生成多种合理的解释，但提示词的设计会系统性地影响模型关注的焦点和使用的词汇。
AI.motivation: 研究动机在于测试大型语言模型（LLMs）是否能够支持解释性引文语境分析（CCA），并深入探究提示词对模型分析结果的影响，以识别LLMs在CCA中的机遇与风险。
AI.method: 研究采用两阶段GPT-5流水线：首先进行仅基于引文-文本的表面分类和期望判断，然后使用引文和被引文献的全文进行跨文档解释性重构。通过2x3设计变化提示词的脚手架和框架，对90个重构进行分析，识别出21种解释性策略，并使用线性概率模型评估提示词选择对策略频率和词汇库的影响。
AI.result: GPT-5的表面分类阶段表现出高度稳定性，将引文一致地归类为“补充性”。在重构阶段，模型生成了一个结构化的、包含多种可能性的替代解释空间。然而，提示词的脚手架和示例会重新分配模型的注意力和词汇选择，有时会导致牵强的解读。与Gilbert的分析相比，GPT-5检测到相同的文本关键点，但更倾向于将其解释为“传承”和“定位”，而非“告诫”。
AI.conclusion: 研究表明，LLMs可以作为可检查、可争议的解释性CCA的引导式联合分析工具，但提示词的脚手架和框架会系统性地影响模型所突出显示的合理读解和词汇。这揭示了在CCA中使用LLMs的机遇和潜在风险。

title: Multi-Level Causal Embeddings
summary: Abstractions of causal models allow for the coarsening of models such that relations of cause and effect are preserved. Whereas abstractions focus on the relation between two models, in this paper we study a framework for causal embeddings which enable multiple detailed models to be mapped into sub-systems of a coarser causal model. We define causal embeddings as a generalization of abstraction, and present a generalized notion of consistency. By defining a multi-resolution marginal problem, we showcase the relevance of causal embeddings for both the statistical marginal problem and the causal marginal problem; furthermore, we illustrate its practical use in merging datasets coming from models with different representations.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种称为因果嵌入（causal embeddings）的框架，它是模型抽象的推广，允许将多个详细模型映射到更粗粒度因果模型的子系统，并定义了广义一致性概念，用于解决多分辨率边际问题，并在合并不同表示的数据集方面展示了其实用性。
AI.motivation: 现有因果模型抽象方法主要关注两个模型之间的关系，而本文旨在研究一个更通用的框架，能够将多个详细模型映射到更粗粒度的因果模型中，以实现更灵活的多模型处理。
AI.method: 本文将因果嵌入定义为抽象的推广，引入了广义一致性的概念，并通过定义多分辨率边际问题来展示因果嵌入在统计边际问题和因果边际问题中的应用，并举例说明其在合并具有不同表示的数据集方面的实际用途。
AI.result: 因果嵌入框架作为抽象的推广，能够处理多个详细模型到粗粒度模型的映射。通过多分辨率边际问题的定义，展示了因果嵌入在统计和因果边际问题中的相关性，并证明了其在合并不同表示的数据集时的实用性。
AI.conclusion: 因果嵌入是一种有用的工具，可以推广因果模型的抽象，并为处理多模型和多分辨率问题提供了一个统一的框架，尤其在整合不同数据源方面具有实际应用价值。

title: Learning to reconstruct from saturated data: audio declipping and high-dynamic range imaging
summary: Learning based methods are now ubiquitous for solving inverse problems, but their deployment in real-world applications is often hindered by the lack of ground truth references for training. Recent self-supervised learning strategies offer a promising alternative, avoiding the need for ground truth. However, most existing methods are limited to linear inverse problems. This work extends self-supervised learning to the non-linear problem of recovering audio and images from clipped measurements, by assuming that the signal distribution is approximately invariant to changes in amplitude. We provide sufficient conditions for learning to reconstruct from saturated signals alone and a self-supervised loss that can be used to train reconstruction networks. Experiments on both audio and image data show that the proposed approach is almost as effective as fully supervised approaches, despite relying solely on clipped measurements for training.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种用于解决非线性逆问题的自监督学习方法，仅使用裁剪测量数据进行训练，并在音频和图像重建任务上取得了接近全监督方法的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有基于学习的逆问题解决方法缺乏真实标签数据进行训练，而现有的自监督方法多局限于线性问题，无法解决更广泛的非线性问题，例如从裁剪测量中恢复音频和图像。
AI.method: 假设信号分布在幅度变化下近似不变，提出了一种自监督学习策略，包括重建饱和信号的充分条件和一个用于训练重建网络的自监督损失函数，并将其应用于音频和图像的裁剪测量恢复。
AI.result: 实验表明，所提出的自监督方法在音频和图像重建任务上的效果与全监督方法几乎相当，仅依赖于裁剪测量数据进行训练。
AI.conclusion: 该工作成功地将自监督学习扩展到非线性逆问题，特别是从裁剪测量中恢复音频和图像，证明了在没有真实标签数据的情况下，通过利用信号幅度不变性可以实现高效的重建。

title: Detecting Hate and Inflammatory Content in Bengali Memes: A New Multimodal Dataset and Co-Attention Framework
summary: Internet memes have become a dominant form of expression on social media, including within the Bengali-speaking community. While often humorous, memes can also be exploited to spread offensive, harmful, and inflammatory content targeting individuals and groups. Detecting this type of content is excep- tionally challenging due to its satirical, subtle, and culturally specific nature. This problem is magnified for low-resource lan- guages like Bengali, as existing research predominantly focuses on high-resource languages. To address this critical research gap, we introduce Bn-HIB (Bangla Hate Inflammatory Benign), a novel dataset containing 3,247 manually annotated Bengali memes categorized as Benign, Hate, or Inflammatory. Significantly, Bn- HIB is the first dataset to distinguish inflammatory content from direct hate speech in Bengali memes. Furthermore, we propose the MCFM (Multi-Modal Co-Attention Fusion Model), a simple yet effective architecture that mutually analyzes both the visual and textual elements of a meme. MCFM employs a co-attention mechanism to identify and fuse the most critical features from each modality, leading to a more accurate classification. Our experiments show that MCFM significantly outperforms several state-of-the-art models on the Bn-HIB dataset, demonstrating its effectiveness in this nuanced task.Warning: This work contains material that may be disturbing to some audience members. Viewer discretion is advised.

AI.tldr: 本文构建了一个包含3247个手动标注的孟加拉语表情包的数据集Bn-HIB，该数据集区分了良性、仇恨和煽动性内容，并提出了一个名为MCFM的多模态协同注意力融合模型，用于检测孟加拉语表情包中的有害内容。
AI.motivation: 现有研究主要集中在高资源语言，缺乏对孟加拉语等低资源语言中具有讽刺性、微妙性和文化特异性的表情包有害内容的检测方法。孟加拉语表情包可能被用于传播攻击性、有害和煽动性内容，需要解决这一研究空白。
AI.method: 1. 构建了Bn-HIB数据集，包含3247个手动标注的孟加拉语表情包，分为良性（Benign）、仇恨（Hate）或煽动性（Inflammatory）三类。2. 提出了MCFM（Multi-Modal Co-Attention Fusion Model）模型，该模型能够同时分析表情包的视觉和文本元素，并利用协同注意力机制融合关键特征，以提高分类准确性。
AI.result: MCFM模型在Bn-HIB数据集上显著优于现有的先进模型，证明了其在该细微任务上的有效性。
AI.conclusion: Bn-HIB数据集是第一个区分孟加拉语表情包中煽动性内容和直接仇恨言论的数据集。MCFM模型能够有效检测孟加拉语表情包中的有害内容，并为相关研究提供了一个有力的基线。

title: Hierarchical Trajectory Planning of Floating-Base Multi-Link Robot for Maneuvering in Confined Environments
comment: Accepted to IEEE T-ASE; DOI pending
summary: Floating-base multi-link robots can change their shape during flight, making them well-suited for applications in confined environments such as autonomous inspection and search and rescue. However, trajectory planning for such systems remains an open challenge because the problem lies in a high-dimensional, constraint-rich space where collision avoidance must be addressed together with kinematic limits and dynamic feasibility. This work introduces a hierarchical trajectory planning framework that integrates global guidance with configuration-aware local optimization. First, we exploit the dual nature of these robots - the root link as a rigid body for guidance and the articulated joints for flexibility - to generate global anchor states that decompose the planning problem into tractable segments. Second, we design a local trajectory planner that optimizes each segment in parallel with differentiable objectives and constraints, systematically enforcing kinematic feasibility and maintaining dynamic feasibility by avoiding control singularities. Third, we implement a complete system that directly processes point-cloud data, eliminating the need for handcrafted obstacle models. Extensive simulations and real-world experiments confirm that this framework enables an articulated aerial robot to exploit its morphology for maneuvering that rigid robots cannot achieve. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first planning framework for floating-base multi-link robots that has been demonstrated on a real robot to generate continuous, collision-free, and dynamically feasible trajectories directly from raw point-cloud inputs, without relying on handcrafted obstacle models.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种用于浮动基多连杆机器人的分层轨迹规划框架，该框架将全局引导与配置感知局部优化相结合，能够直接处理点云数据，实现比刚性机器人更灵活的机动。
AI.motivation: 现有浮动基多连杆机器人在高维、约束丰富的空间中进行轨迹规划面临挑战，需要同时考虑避碰、运动学限制和动力学可行性。因此，需要一种新的规划方法来解决这些问题。
AI.method: 该框架采用分层方法，首先利用机器人本体（刚性）和关节（柔性）的双重特性生成全局锚点状态，将规划问题分解为可处理的段。然后，设计一个局部轨迹规划器，使用可微分的目标和约束并行优化每个段，确保运动学和动力学可行性，避免控制奇异点。最后，构建了一个直接处理点云数据的完整系统，无需手工创建障碍物模型。
AI.result: 通过广泛的仿真和真实世界实验，证明了该框架能够使多连杆空中机器人利用其形态进行刚性机器人无法实现的机动。该框架能够生成连续、无碰撞且动力学上可行的轨迹，直接从原始点云输入得到，且无需手工创建障碍物模型。
AI.conclusion: 这是第一个成功应用于真实机器人、直接从原始点云输入生成连续、无碰撞、动力学上可行的轨迹的浮动基多连杆机器人规划框架，并且无需依赖手工创建的障碍物模型。

title: AeroDGS: Physically Consistent Dynamic Gaussian Splatting for Single-Sequence Aerial 4D Reconstruction
summary: Recent advances in 4D scene reconstruction have significantly improved dynamic modeling across various domains. However, existing approaches remain limited under aerial conditions with single-view capture, wide spatial range, and dynamic objects of limited spatial footprint and large motion disparity. These challenges cause severe depth ambiguity and unstable motion estimation, making monocular aerial reconstruction inherently ill-posed. To this end, we present AeroDGS, a physics-guided 4D Gaussian splatting framework for monocular UAV videos. AeroDGS introduces a Monocular Geometry Lifting module that reconstructs reliable static and dynamic geometry from a single aerial sequence, providing a robust basis for dynamic estimation. To further resolve monocular ambiguity, we propose a Physics-Guided Optimization module that incorporates differentiable ground-support, upright-stability, and trajectory-smoothness priors, transforming ambiguous image cues into physically consistent motion. The framework jointly refines static backgrounds and dynamic entities with stable geometry and coherent temporal evolution. We additionally build a real-world UAV dataset that spans various altitudes and motion conditions to evaluate dynamic aerial reconstruction. Experiments on synthetic and real UAV scenes demonstrate that AeroDGS outperforms state-of-the-art methods, achieving superior reconstruction fidelity in dynamic aerial environments.

AI.tldr: AeroDGS是一个为单目无人机视频设计的4D场景重建框架，通过几何提升和物理引导优化来解决空中场景的深度歧义和运动估计不稳定性问题。
AI.motivation: 现有4D场景重建方法在单目、空中、大范围、动态物体和运动差异大的条件下存在严重挑战，导致深度歧义和不稳定的运动估计。
AI.method: 提出AeroDGS框架，包含：1. 单目几何提升模块（Monocular Geometry Lifting）用于重建静态和动态几何；2. 物理引导优化模块（Physics-Guided Optimization）利用可微分的地面支撑、竖直稳定性、轨迹平滑性先验来解决单目歧义，生成物理一致的运动。
AI.result: 在合成和真实无人机数据集上，AeroDGS显著优于现有SOTA方法，在动态空中环境中实现了更高的重建保真度。
AI.conclusion: AeroDGS通过结合几何重建和物理先验，成功解决了单目空中4D场景重建的挑战，实现了稳定且保真的动态重建。

title: Steady State Covariance Steering via Sparse Intervention
summary: This paper addresses the steady state covariance steering for linear dynamical systems via structural intervention on the system matrix. We formulate the covariance steering problem as the minimization of the Kullback-Leibler (KL) divergence between the steady state and target Gaussian distributions. To solve the problem, we develop a solution method, hereafter referred to as the proximal gradient-based algorithm, of promoting sparsity in the structural intervention by integrating the objective into a proximal gradient framework with L1 regularization. The main contribution of this paper lies in the analytical expression of the KL divergence gradient with respect to the intervention matrix: the gradient is characterized by the solutions to two Lyapunov equations related to the state covariance equation and its adjoint. Numerical simulations demonstrate that the proximal gradient-based algorithm effectively identifies sparse, structurally-constrained interventions to achieve precise covariance steering.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种通过结构干预线性动力系统矩阵来控制其稳态协方差的方法，利用带有L1正则化的近邻梯度算法实现稀疏干预。
AI.motivation: 为了在保持系统结构稀疏性的同时，精确地将系统的稳态协方差引导到目标高斯分布。
AI.method: 将协方差转向问题表述为最小化稳态和目标高斯分布之间的KL散度。开发了一种近邻梯度算法，通过L1正则化来促进结构干预的稀疏性，并推导了KL散度相对于干预矩阵的解析梯度。
AI.result: KL散度关于干预矩阵的梯度可以通过求解与状态协方差方程及其伴随方程相关的两个Lyapunov方程得到。近邻梯度算法能够有效地识别稀疏的、结构受限的干预。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的近邻梯度算法可以有效地实现线性动力系统的协方差转向，并能发现稀疏的、结构化的干预策略。

title: U-Net-Based Generative Joint Source-Channel Coding for Wireless Image Transmission
comment: This work has been submitted to the IEEE for possible publication
summary: Deep learning (DL)-based joint source-channel coding (JSCC) methods have achieved remarkable success in wireless image transmission. However, these methods either focus on conventional distortion metrics that do not necessarily yield high perceptual quality or incur high computational complexity. In this paper, we propose two DL-based JSCC (DeepJSCC) methods that leverage deep generative architectures for wireless image transmission. Specifically, we propose G-UNet-JSCC, a scheme comprising an encoder and a U-Net-based generator serving as the decoder. Its skip connections enable multi-scale feature fusion to improve both pixel-level fidelity and perceptual quality of reconstructed images by integrating low- and high-level features. To further enhance pixel-level fidelity, the encoder and the U-Net-based decoder are jointly optimized using a weighted sum of structural similarity and mean-squared error (MSE) losses. Building upon G-UNet-JSCC, we further develop a DeepJSCC method called cGAN-JSCC, where the decoder is enhanced through adversarial training. In this scheme, we retain the encoder of G-UNet-JSCC and adversarially train the decoder's generator against a patch-based discriminator. cGAN-JSCC employs a two-stage training procedure. The outer stage trains the encoder and the decoder end-to-end using an MSE loss, while the inner stage adversarially trains the decoder's generator and the discriminator by minimizing a joint loss combining adversarial and distortion losses. Simulation results demonstrate that the proposed methods achieve superior pixel-level fidelity and perceptual quality on both high- and low-resolution images. For low-resolution images, cGAN-JSCC achieves better reconstruction performance and greater robustness to channel variations than G-UNet-JSCC.

AI.tldr: 本文提出两种基于深度学习的联合信源信道编码（JSCC）方法，G-UNet-JSCC 和 cGAN-JSCC，用于无线图像传输。G-UNet-JSCC 使用 U-Net 作为解码器，通过跳跃连接融合多尺度特征，并结合结构相似性和均方误差（MSE）损失来优化像素级保真度和感知质量。cGAN-JSCC 在 G-UNet-JSCC 的基础上，引入了生成对抗网络（GAN）的训练方式，通过判别器进一步提升图像的感知质量。
AI.motivation: 现有基于深度学习的 JSCC 方法要么侧重于不一定能产生高感知质量的传统失真度量，要么计算复杂度过高。本文旨在提出一种在保证高感知质量的同时，优化计算复杂度的新型 JSCC 方法。
AI.method: 1. G-UNet-JSCC：采用 U-Net 作为解码器，利用其跳跃连接进行多尺度特征融合。解码器与编码器联合优化，使用结构相似性（SSIM）和均方误差（MSE）的加权和作为损失函数。 2. cGAN-JSCC：在 G-UNet-JSCC 的基础上，将解码器的生成器与一个基于块的判别器进行对抗训练。采用两阶段训练：外层端到端训练编码器和解码器（MSE 损失），内层通过结合对抗损失和失真损失训练生成器和判别器。
AI.result: 所提出的 G-UNet-JSCC 和 cGAN-JSCC 方法在低分辨率和高分辨率图像上均实现了优越的像素级保真度和感知质量。cGAN-JSCC 在低分辨率图像上表现出更好的重建性能，并且对信道变化的鲁棒性更强。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的 G-UNet-JSCC 和 cGAN-JSCC 是有效的深度学习驱动的 JSCC 方法，它们能够有效平衡像素级保真度和感知质量，并且 cGAN-JSCC 在特定场景下（如低分辨率图像）提供了更优的性能和鲁棒性。

title: EgoAVFlow: Robot Policy Learning with Active Vision from Human Egocentric Videos via 3D Flow
summary: Egocentric human videos provide a scalable source of manipulation demonstrations; however, deploying them on robots requires active viewpoint control to maintain task-critical visibility, which human viewpoint imitation often fails to provide due to human-specific priors. We propose EgoAVFlow, which learns manipulation and active vision from egocentric videos through a shared 3D flow representation that supports geometric visibility reasoning and transfers without robot demonstrations. EgoAVFlow uses diffusion models to predict robot actions, future 3D flow, and camera trajectories, and refines viewpoints at test time with reward-maximizing denoising under a visibility-aware reward computed from predicted motion and scene geometry. Real-world experiments under actively changing viewpoints show that EgoAVFlow consistently outperforms prior human-demo-based baselines, demonstrating effective visibility maintenance and robust manipulation without robot demonstrations.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为 EgoAVFlow 的方法，利用人类的自我中心视频来学习机器人操纵和主动视觉，通过共享的 3D 流表示进行几何可见性推理，并能在没有机器人演示的情况下进行迁移。该方法使用扩散模型预测机器人动作、3D 流和相机轨迹，并在测试时通过最大化奖励的去噪过程来优化视角。
AI.motivation: 人类的自我中心视频是操纵演示的宝贵来源，但直接用于机器人部署时，需要主动控制视角以保持任务关键区域的可见性。现有的人类视角模仿方法往往因为人类特有的先验知识而无法提供这种主动视角控制。
AI.method: EgoAVFlow 采用扩散模型来学习操纵和主动视觉。它使用共享的 3D 流表示来支持几何可见性推理。在训练阶段，模型预测机器人动作、未来的 3D 流和相机轨迹。在测试阶段，模型通过一个最大化奖励的去噪过程来优化视角，该奖励基于预测的运动和场景几何计算的可见性感知奖励。
AI.result: 在真实世界的实验中，EgoAVFlow 在主动变化的视角下，持续优于基于人类演示的基线方法。实验证明了该方法在有效维护可见性和实现鲁棒操纵方面的能力，且无需机器人演示。
AI.conclusion: EgoAVFlow 成功地利用了自我中心视频来学习机器人操纵和主动视觉，并通过 3D 流表示实现了无需机器人演示的迁移和可见性推理。该方法能够在动态视角变化下保持任务关键区域的可见性，并实现有效的机器人操纵。

title: SAFARI: A Community-Engaged Approach and Dataset of Stereotype Resources in the Sub-Saharan African Context
summary: Stereotype repositories are critical to assess generative AI model safety, but currently lack adequate global coverage. It is imperative to prioritize targeted expansion, strategically addressing existing deficits, over merely increasing data volume. This work introduces a multilingual stereotype resource covering four sub-Saharan African countries that are severely underrepresented in NLP resources: Ghana, Kenya, Nigeria, and South Africa. By utilizing socioculturally-situated, community-engaged methods, including telephonic surveys moderated in native languages, we establish a reproducible methodology that is sensitive to the region's complex linguistic diversity and traditional orality. By deliberately balancing the sample across diverse ethnic and demographic backgrounds, we ensure broad coverage, resulting in a dataset of 3,534 stereotypes in English and 3,206 stereotypes across 15 native languages.

AI.tldr: 该研究构建了一个包含3534个英语刻板印象和15种本地语言中3206个刻板印象的多语言资源库，旨在解决生成式AI模型安全评估中全球覆盖不足的问题，重点关注了加纳、肯尼亚、尼日利亚和南非这四个在NLP资源方面代表性不足的撒哈拉以南非洲国家。
AI.motivation: 现有用于评估生成式AI模型安全性的刻板印象数据库在全球覆盖方面存在不足，需要进行有针对性的扩展，而不是简单地增加数据量。
AI.method: 研究采用了结合社会文化情境和社区参与的方法，包括使用母语进行电话调查，以应对该地区复杂的语言多样性和口语传统。样本在不同族裔和人口统计学背景之间进行了平衡，以确保广泛的覆盖。
AI.result: 研究构建了一个包含3,534个英语刻板印象和15种本地语言中3,206个刻板印象的多语言刻板印象资源库，涵盖了加纳、肯尼亚、尼日利亚和南非这四个代表性不足的国家。
AI.conclusion: 通过采用社区参与和多语言方法，研究成功创建了一个覆盖不足地区的刻板印象资源库，为AI模型的安全评估提供了更全面的数据支持，并建立了一种可复现的研究方法。

title: Enhancing Renal Tumor Malignancy Prediction: Deep Learning with Automatic 3D CT Organ Focused Attention
comment: 5 pages, 2 figures, Accepted at IEEE ISBI 2026
summary: Accurate prediction of malignancy in renal tumors is crucial for informing clinical decisions and optimizing treatment strategies. However, existing imaging modalities lack the necessary accuracy to reliably predict malignancy before surgical intervention. While deep learning has shown promise in malignancy prediction using 3D CT images, traditional approaches often rely on manual segmentation to isolate the tumor region and reduce noise, which enhances predictive performance. Manual segmentation, however, is labor-intensive, costly, and dependent on expert knowledge. In this study, a deep learning framework was developed utilizing an Organ Focused Attention (OFA) loss function to modify the attention of image patches so that organ patches attend only to other organ patches. Hence, no segmentation of 3D renal CT images is required at deployment time for malignancy prediction. The proposed framework achieved an AUC of 0.685 and an F1-score of 0.872 on a private dataset from the UF Integrated Data Repository (IDR), and an AUC of 0.760 and an F1-score of 0.852 on the publicly available KiTS21 dataset. These results surpass the performance of conventional models that rely on segmentation-based cropping for noise reduction, demonstrating the frameworks ability to enhance predictive accuracy without explicit segmentation input. The findings suggest that this approach offers a more efficient and reliable method for malignancy prediction, thereby enhancing clinical decision-making in renal cancer diagnosis.

AI.tldr: 研究提出了一种无需手动分割即可预测肾脏肿瘤恶性程度的深度学习框架，利用一种新的损失函数（OFA loss）提升了模型在CT图像上的预测性能。
AI.motivation: 现有影像学方法在术前准确预测肾脏肿瘤恶性程度方面存在不足，而传统的深度学习方法依赖于耗时费力且依赖专家知识的手动分割，因此需要开发一种更高效、更准确的无分割方法。
AI.method: 开发了一个深度学习框架，并引入了器官聚焦注意力（Organ Focused Attention, OFA）损失函数。该函数使模型能够关注器官区域，而无需进行肿瘤分割，从而直接处理3D肾脏CT图像。
AI.result: 在UF IDR私有数据集上，该框架取得了0.685的AUC和0.872的F1分数；在公开的KiTS21数据集上，取得了0.760的AUC和0.852的F1分数。这些结果优于依赖分割裁剪的传统模型。
AI.conclusion: 提出的无需分割的深度学习框架能够有效提高肾脏肿瘤恶性程度预测的准确性，提供了一种更高效、更可靠的临床决策支持方法。

title: Integrated Flight and Propulsion Control for Fixed-Wing UAVs via Thrust and Disturbance Compensation
summary: This paper investigates the position-tracking control problem for fixed-wing unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) equipped with a turbojet engine via an integrated flight and propulsion control scheme. To this end, a hierarchical control framework with thrust and disturbance compensation is proposed. In particular, we first propose a perturbed fixed-wing UAV model with turbojet engine dynamics, accounting for both unmodeled dynamics and external disturbances. Second, a versatile extended observer is designed to handle both unmeasurable thrust dynamics and external disturbances. Third, a hierarchical control framework is implemented using three observer-based controllers to guarantee position-tracking performance. With the proposed control strategy, we prove that the closed-loop system asymptotically converges to the desired trajectory. Finally, a comparative simulation is performed to illustrate the proposed control strategy.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种集成飞行和推进控制方案，用于解决固定翼无人机（UAV）的位置跟踪问题，该方案通过一个包含推力补偿和扰动补偿的分层控制框架实现，并设计了一个扩展观测器来处理推力动态和外部扰动。
AI.motivation: 固定翼无人机（UAV）的位置跟踪控制是一个复杂问题，特别是在考虑了涡轮喷气发动机动力学、未建模动态和外部扰动的情况下。现有方法可能无法有效处理这些不确定性和动态变化。
AI.method: 提出了一种分层控制框架，集成了飞行和推进控制。该框架包含一个用于处理不可测量推力动态和外部扰动的通用扩展观测器，以及三个基于观测器的控制器，以实现位置跟踪。模型包含了涡轮喷气发动机动力学以及未建模动态和外部扰动。
AI.result: 证明了所提出的控制策略能够保证闭环系统渐近收敛到期望轨迹。通过对比仿真验证了该控制策略的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的集成飞行和推进控制框架，结合了推力补偿和扰动补偿，并利用扩展观测器，能够有效地解决带涡轮喷气发动机的固定翼无人机的扰动位置跟踪控制问题，并实现了期望的跟踪性能。

title: Agent Behavioral Contracts: Formal Specification and Runtime Enforcement for Reliable Autonomous AI Agents
comment: 71 pages, 7 figures, 14 tables. Patent pending. Also available on Zenodo: DOI 10.5281/zenodo.18775393
summary: Traditional software relies on contracts -- APIs, type systems, assertions -- to specify and enforce correct behavior. AI agents, by contrast, operate on prompts and natural language instructions with no formal behavioral specification. This gap is the root cause of drift, governance failures, and frequent project failures in agentic AI deployments. We introduce Agent Behavioral Contracts (ABC), a formal framework that brings Design-by-Contract principles to autonomous AI agents. An ABC contract C = (P, I, G, R) specifies Preconditions, Invariants, Governance policies, and Recovery mechanisms as first-class, runtime-enforceable components. We define (p, delta, k)-satisfaction -- a probabilistic notion of contract compliance that accounts for LLM non-determinism and recovery -- and prove a Drift Bounds Theorem showing that contracts with recovery rate gamma > alpha (the natural drift rate) bound behavioral drift to D* = alpha/gamma in expectation, with Gaussian concentration in the stochastic setting. We establish sufficient conditions for safe contract composition in multi-agent chains and derive probabilistic degradation bounds. We implement ABC in AgentAssert, a runtime enforcement library, and evaluate on AgentContract-Bench, a benchmark of 200 scenarios across 7 models from 6 vendors. Results across 1,980 sessions show that contracted agents detect 5.2-6.8 soft violations per session that uncontracted baselines miss entirely (p < 0.0001, Cohen's d = 6.7-33.8), achieve 88-100% hard constraint compliance, and bound behavioral drift to D* < 0.27 across extended sessions, with 100% recovery for frontier models and 17-100% across all models, at overhead < 10 ms per action.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种名为Agent Behavioral Contracts (ABC) 的形式化框架，将传统软件的“契约式设计”原则应用于AI代理。ABC通过定义前置条件、不变量、治理策略和恢复机制来正式规范AI代理的行为，并引入了一种概率性的满意度度量，以应对大型语言模型的非确定性。研究证明了ABC可以有效约束AI代理的行为漂移，并支持多代理系统的安全组合。通过名为AgentAssert的运行时强制库和AgentContract-Bench基准的实验证明，ABC显著提高了AI代理的行为合规性、减少了漂移，并且具有较低的性能开销。
AI.motivation: 传统软件通过API、类型系统和断言等形式化契约来保证行为正确性，而当前AI代理主要依赖于自然语言提示，缺乏正式的行为规范，这导致了AI部署中的行为漂移、治理失败和项目失败等问题。
AI.method: 提出Agent Behavioral Contracts (ABC) 框架，包含前置条件（Preconditions）、不变量（Invariants）、治理策略（Governance policies）和恢复机制（Recovery mechanisms）。定义了（p, delta, k）-satisfaction，一种考虑LLM非确定性和恢复机制的概率性契约合规度量。证明了漂移边界定理（Drift Bounds Theorem），表明当恢复率大于自然漂移率时，契约能够约束行为漂移。研究了安全契约组合的充分条件，并推导了概率退化边界。实现了AgentAssert运行时强制库，并在AgentContract-Bench基准上进行了评估。
AI.result: 在200个场景、7个模型、6个供应商的AgentContract-Bench基准上的1980次会话评估显示，采用ABC的代理能够检测到未签约基线完全错过的软违反（平均每会话5.2-6.8次），硬约束合规率达到88%-100%，行为漂移被限制在D* < 0.27，对于前沿模型恢复率达到100%，整体模型恢复率在17%-100%之间，并且每行动的开销小于10毫秒。
AI.conclusion: Agent Behavioral Contracts (ABC) 框架成功地将形式化契约设计原则引入AI代理，为AI代理的行为规范和运行时强制提供了一种有效的方法。实验证明，ABC能够显著提高AI代理的合规性、减少行为漂移，并保持较低的性能开销，为实现可靠和可控的AI代理部署奠定了基础。

title: Plug-and-Play Diffusion Meets ADMM: Dual-Variable Coupling for Robust Medical Image Reconstruction
summary: Plug-and-Play diffusion prior (PnPDP) frameworks have emerged as a powerful paradigm for solving imaging inverse problems by treating pretrained generative models as modular priors. However, we identify a critical flaw in prevailing PnP solvers (e.g., based on HQS or Proximal Gradient): they function as memoryless operators, updating estimates solely based on instantaneous gradients. This lack of historical tracking inevitably leads to non-vanishing steady-state bias, where the reconstruction fails to strictly satisfy physical measurements under heavy corruption. To resolve this, we propose Dual-Coupled PnP Diffusion, which restores the classical dual variable to provide integral feedback, theoretically guaranteeing asymptotic convergence to the exact data manifold. However, this rigorous geometric coupling introduces a secondary challenge: the accumulated dual residuals exhibit spectrally colored, structured artifacts that violate the Additive White Gaussian Noise (AWGN) assumption of diffusion priors, causing severe hallucinations. To bridge this gap, we introduce Spectral Homogenization (SH), a frequency-domain adaptation mechanism that modulates these structured residuals into statistically compliant pseudo-AWGN inputs. This effectively aligns the solver's rigorous optimization trajectory with the denoiser's valid statistical manifold. Extensive experiments on CT and MRI reconstruction demonstrate that our approach resolves the bias-hallucination trade-off, achieving state-of-the-art fidelity with significantly accelerated convergence.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为Dual-Coupled PnP Diffusion的新型PnP框架，通过引入双重变量来解决现有PnP方法的偏差问题，并结合Spectral Homogenization（SH）来处理由此产生的伪影，在CT和MRI重建任务中取得了最新的结果。
AI.motivation: 现有的即插即用 (PnP) 扩散先验框架存在关键缺陷：它们是无记忆算子，仅基于瞬时梯度更新估计，这会导致非消失的稳态偏差，使得重建在严重损坏的情况下无法严格满足物理测量。
AI.method: 提出Dual-Coupled PnP Diffusion，恢复了经典的双重变量以提供积分反馈，理论上保证了渐进收敛到精确的数据流形。为了解决由此产生的双重残差的结构化伪影问题，引入了Spectral Homogenization（SH），一种频率域自适应机制，将这些结构化残差调制成统计上兼容的伪加性白高斯噪声 (AWGN) 输入。
AI.result: 所提出的方法解决了偏差-幻觉的权衡问题，实现了最先进的保真度，并显著加快了收敛速度。在CT和MRI重建的广泛实验中得到了验证。
AI.conclusion: Dual-Coupled PnP Diffusion框架结合Spectral Homogenization（SH）能够有效解决现有PnP方法的偏差和幻觉问题，在成像逆问题求解方面取得了优于现有方法的性能。

title: When to Act, Ask, or Learn: Uncertainty-Aware Policy Steering
summary: Policy steering is an emerging way to adapt robot behaviors at deployment-time: a learned verifier analyzes low-level action samples proposed by a pre-trained policy (e.g., diffusion policy) and selects only those aligned with the task. While Vision-Language Models (VLMs) are promising general-purpose verifiers due to their reasoning capabilities, existing frameworks often assume these models are well-calibrated. In practice, the overconfident judgment from VLM can degrade the steering performance under both high-level semantic uncertainty in task specifications and low-level action uncertainty or incapability of the pre-trained policy. We propose uncertainty-aware policy steering (UPS), a framework that jointly reasons about semantic task uncertainty and low-level action feasibility, and selects an uncertainty resolution strategy: execute a high-confidence action, clarify task ambiguity via natural language queries, or ask for action interventions to correct the low-level policy when it is deemed incapable at the task. We leverage conformal prediction to calibrate the composition of the VLM and the pre-trained base policy, providing statistical assurances that the verifier selects the correct strategy. After collecting interventions during deployment, we employ residual learning to improve the capability of the pre-trained policy, enabling the system to learn continually but with minimal expensive human feedback. We demonstrate our framework through experiments in simulation and on hardware, showing that UPS can disentangle confident, ambiguous, and incapable scenarios and minimizes expensive user interventions compared to uncalibrated baselines and prior human- or robot-gated continual learning approaches. Videos can be found at https://jessie-yuan.github.io/ups/

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 UPS（不确定性感知策略引导）的框架，用于解决使用视觉语言模型（VLM）作为机器人策略的验证器时，由于 VLM 的过度自信而导致的性能下降问题。UPS 框架能够同时推理语义任务的不确定性以及低级动作的可行性，并根据不确定性选择相应的处理策略，如执行高置信度动作、通过自然语言查询澄清任务歧义，或在预训练策略能力不足时请求动作干预。通过共形预测（conformal prediction）来校准 VLM 和基础策略的组合，为验证器选择正确策略提供统计保证。此外，UPS 利用收集到的干预数据，通过残差学习（residual learning）来改进预训练策略，实现持续学习但仅需少量昂贵的人工反馈。
AI.motivation: 现有基于 VLM 的策略引导方法通常假设 VLM 是校准良好的，但实际中 VLM 的过度自信会导致在任务语义不确定或预训练策略动作不确定/无能时，策略引导性能下降。因此，研究如何处理这些不确定性并提高策略引导的鲁棒性是必要的。
AI.method: UPS 框架通过以下方式工作：1. 联合推理语义任务不确定性和低级动作可行性；2. 选择不确定性分辨率策略：执行高置信度动作、通过自然语言查询澄清任务歧义、或请求动作干预以纠正低级策略；3. 利用共形预测校准 VLM 和基础策略的组合，提供统计保证；4. 使用残差学习改进预训练策略，实现持续学习。
AI.result: UPS 框架能够有效地区分高置信度、模糊和无能的场景，并且与未校准的基线方法以及先前的人工或机器人干预的持续学习方法相比，最大限度地减少了昂贵的用户干预。
AI.conclusion: UPS 框架通过有效处理语义任务不确定性和低级动作不确定性，并利用共形预测进行校准，实现了更鲁棒和高效的策略引导，同时通过残差学习实现了低成本的持续学习。

title: Causality $\neq$ Invariance: Function and Concept Vectors in LLMs
summary: Do large language models (LLMs) represent concepts abstractly, i.e., independent of input format? We revisit Function Vectors (FVs), compact representations of in-context learning (ICL) tasks that causally drive task performance. Across multiple LLMs, we show that FVs are not fully invariant: FVs are nearly orthogonal when extracted from different input formats (e.g., open-ended vs. multiple-choice), even if both target the same concept. We identify Concept Vectors (CVs), which carry more stable concept representations. Like FVs, CVs are composed of attention head outputs; however, unlike FVs, the constituent heads are selected using Representational Similarity Analysis (RSA) based on whether they encode concepts consistently across input formats. While these heads emerge in similar layers to FV-related heads, the two sets are largely distinct, suggesting different underlying mechanisms. Steering experiments reveal that FVs excel in-distribution, when extraction and application formats match (e.g., both open-ended in English), while CVs generalize better out-of-distribution across both question types (open-ended vs. multiple-choice) and languages. Our results show that LLMs do contain abstract concept representations, but these differ from those that drive ICL performance.

AI.tldr: 本研究发现，尽管函数向量（FVs）能够驱动上下文学习（ICL）任务，但它们对输入格式不够鲁棒。研究者提出了概念向量（CVs），它能够更稳定地表示概念，并且在跨输入格式和语言的任务上表现出更好的泛化能力。
AI.motivation: 研究大型语言模型（LLMs）是否能够抽象地表示概念，即独立于输入格式。现有研究集中于函数向量（FVs），但其对输入格式的敏感性引发了对LLM概念表示能力的质疑。
AI.method: 使用函数向量（FVs）作为比较基准。通过输入格式（开放式 vs. 多项选择）的实验，分析FVs的非不变性。引入概念向量（CVs），利用表示相似性分析（RSA）选择能够跨输入格式一致编码概念的注意力头，并进行引导实验，比较FVs和CVs在不同分布下的表现。
AI.result: FVs在不同输入格式下几乎正交，表明其表示不具不变性。CVs由RSA选出的注意力头构成，与FVs的组成部分不同，但出现在相似的层级。FVs在同分布任务上表现优异，而CVs在跨问题类型（开放式 vs. 多项选择）和跨语言的异分布任务上泛化能力更强。
AI.conclusion: LLMs确实包含抽象的概念表示，但驱动ICL任务的FVs并非完全抽象的表示。CVs提供了一种更抽象、更具泛化能力的概念表示方法，揭示了LLM内部表示概念的机制。

title: Vision Transformers Need More Than Registers
summary: Vision Transformers (ViTs), when pre-trained on large-scale data, provide general-purpose representations for diverse downstream tasks. However, artifacts in ViTs are widely observed across different supervision paradigms and downstream tasks. Through systematic analysis of artifacts in ViTs, we find that their fundamental mechanisms have yet to be sufficiently elucidated. In this paper, through systematic analysis, we conclude that these artifacts originate from a lazy aggregation behavior: ViT uses semantically irrelevant background patches as shortcuts to represent global semantics, driven by global attention and Coarse-grained semantic supervision. Our solution selectively integrates patch features into the CLS token, reducing the influence of background-dominated shortcuts and consistently improving performance across 12 benchmarks under label-, text-, and self-supervision. We hope this work offers a new perspective on ViT behavior.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过系统性分析，发现 Vision Transformers (ViTs) 中的伪影（artifacts）源于一种“懒惰聚合”行为，即 ViT 利用与语义无关的背景图块作为捷径来表示全局语义。研究提出了一种选择性集成图块特征到 CLS token 的方法，有效减少了背景图块的影响，并在 12 个基准测试中取得了性能提升。
AI.motivation: 观察到 ViTs 在不同监督范式和下游任务中普遍存在伪影，但其根本机制尚未得到充分阐明，这促使研究者深入分析并解决这一问题。
AI.method: 通过系统性分析 ViTs 的行为，识别出伪影的根源在于“懒惰聚合”，即利用背景图块作为捷径。提出了一种解决方案，选择性地将图块特征集成到 CLS token 中，以减少背景图块的干扰。
AI.result: 所提出的方法有效减少了背景图块的影响，并在 12 个下游任务基准测试中（包括标签监督、文本监督和自监督）取得了持续的性能提升。
AI.conclusion: ViTs 中的伪影源于一种“懒惰聚合”行为，即利用与语义无关的背景图块作为捷径。通过选择性地集成图块特征到 CLS token，可以缓解这一问题并提升 ViTs 的性能。该研究为理解 ViTs 的行为提供了新的视角。

title: Towards Autonomous Memory Agents
summary: Recent memory agents improve LLMs by extracting experiences and conversation history into an external storage. This enables low-overhead context assembly and online memory update without expensive LLM training. However, existing solutions remain passive and reactive; memory growth is bounded by information that happens to be available, while memory agents seldom seek external inputs in uncertainties. We propose autonomous memory agents that actively acquire, validate, and curate knowledge at a minimum cost. U-Mem materializes this idea via (i) a cost-aware knowledge-extraction cascade that escalates from cheap self/teacher signals to tool-verified research and, only when needed, expert feedback, and (ii) semantic-aware Thompson sampling to balance exploration and exploitation over memories and mitigate cold-start bias. On both verifiable and non-verifiable benchmarks, U-Mem consistently beats prior memory baselines and can surpass RL-based optimization, improving HotpotQA (Qwen2.5-7B) by 14.6 points and AIME25 (Gemini-2.5-flash) by 7.33 points.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种名为 U-Mem 的自主记忆代理，它能够主动获取、验证和整理知识，以最小的成本提高 LLM 的性能。U-Mem 通过成本感知的知识提取级联和语义感知的 Thompson 采样来平衡探索与利用，从而超越了现有的记忆基线和基于 RL 的优化方法。
AI.motivation: 现有的 LLM 记忆代理被动且反应式，记忆增长受限于现有信息，并且在不确定时很少主动寻求外部输入。研究者希望开发能够主动获取、验证和整理知识的记忆代理，以提高 LLM 的上下文组装和在线记忆更新能力，同时降低成本。
AI.method: U-Mem 采用了一种成本感知的知识提取级联，从廉价的自我/教师信号开始，然后是工具验证的研究，最后才考虑专家反馈。此外，它还使用了语义感知的 Thompson 采样来平衡记忆的探索与利用，并减轻冷启动偏差。
AI.result: 在可验证和不可验证的基准测试中，U-Mem 持续优于现有的记忆基线，并且能够超越基于 RL 的优化方法。具体而言，U-Mem 在 HotpotQA 上将 Qwen2.5-7B 的性能提高了 14.6 个百分点，在 AIME25 上将 Gemini-2.5-flash 的性能提高了 7.33 个百分点。
AI.conclusion: U-Mem 是一种有效的自主记忆代理，能够主动、低成本地获取、验证和整理知识，从而显著提升 LLM 在多种任务上的表现，克服了现有被动记忆代理的局限性。

title: A Fusion of context-aware based BanglaBERT and Two-Layer Stacked LSTM Framework for Multi-Label Cyberbullying Detection
summary: Cyberbullying has become a serious and growing concern in todays virtual world. When left unnoticed, it can have adverse consequences for social and mental health. Researchers have explored various types of cyberbullying, but most approaches use single-label classification, assuming that each comment contains only one type of abuse. In reality, a single comment may include overlapping forms such as threats, hate speech, and harassment. Therefore, multilabel detection is both realistic and essential. However, multilabel cyberbullying detection has received limited attention, especially in low-resource languages like Bangla, where robust pre-trained models are scarce. Developing a generalized model with moderate accuracy remains challenging. Transformers offer strong contextual understanding but may miss sequential dependencies, while LSTM models capture temporal flow but lack semantic depth. To address these limitations, we propose a fusion architecture that combines BanglaBERT-Large with a two-layer stacked LSTM. We analyze their behavior to jointly model context and sequence. The model is fine-tuned and evaluated on a publicly available multilabel Bangla cyberbullying dataset covering cyberbully, sexual harassment, threat, and spam. We apply different sampling strategies to address class imbalance. Evaluation uses multiple metrics, including accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score, Hamming loss, Cohens kappa, and AUC-ROC. We employ 5-fold cross-validation to assess the generalization of the architecture.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种融合 BanglaBERT-Large 和堆叠 LSTM 的混合架构，用于检测孟加拉语中的多标签网络欺凌。该方法结合了上下文理解和序列依赖性，并在公开数据集上进行了评估，以解决低资源语言中多标签网络欺凌检测的挑战。
AI.motivation: 现有网络欺凌检测方法多为单标签分类，未能捕捉到单个评论中可能存在的多种欺凌形式（如威胁、仇恨言论、骚扰）。此外，像孟加拉语这样的低资源语言在多标签网络欺凌检测方面面临模型稀缺和泛化能力不足的挑战。
AI.method: 研究提出了一种融合架构，结合了孟加拉语预训练模型 BanglaBERT-Large 的上下文理解能力和两层堆叠 LSTM 的序列依赖建模能力。该模型在公开的孟加拉语多标签网络欺凌数据集上进行微调和评估，并采用了不同的采样策略来处理类别不平衡问题。通过 5 折交叉验证来评估模型的泛化能力。
AI.result: 融合架构在孟加拉语多标签网络欺凌检测任务中取得了具有竞争力的性能。通过结合 Transformer 的上下文建模和 LSTM 的序列建模，该模型能够更有效地捕捉不同类型的欺凌行为。
AI.conclusion: 本研究成功开发了一种有效的融合架构，用于解决低资源语言（孟加拉语）中的多标签网络欺凌检测问题。该方法通过联合建模上下文和序列信息，克服了单独使用 Transformer 或 LSTM 的局限性，并为未来的跨语言和多模态网络欺凌研究奠定了基础。

title: Signal Temporal Logic Verification and Synthesis Using Deep Reachability Analysis and Layered Control Architecture
summary: We propose a signal temporal logic (STL)-based framework that rigorously verifies the feasibility of a mission described in STL and synthesizes control to safely execute it. The proposed framework ensures safe and reliable operation through two phases. First, the proposed framework assesses the feasibility of STL by computing a backward reachable tube (BRT), which captures all states that can satisfy the given STL, regardless of the initial state. The proposed framework accommodates the multiple reach-avoid (MRA) problem to address more general STL specifications and leverages a deep neural network to alleviate the computation burden for reachability analysis, reducing the computation time by about 1000 times compared to a baseline method. We further propose a layered planning and control architecture that combines mixed-integer linear programming (MILP) for global planning with model predictive control (MPC) as a local controller for the verified STL. Consequently, the proposed framework can robustly handle unexpected behavior of obstacles that are not described in the environment information or STL, thereby providing reliable mission performance. Our numerical simulations demonstrate that the proposed framework can successfully compute BRT for a given STL and perform the mission.

AI.tldr: 提出一个基于信号时序逻辑（STL）的框架，用于验证STL描述的任务的可行性并合成安全执行任务的控制器。该框架通过计算后向可达集（BRT）来评估STL的可行性，并利用深度神经网络加速计算。同时，采用分层规划与控制架构，结合MILP进行全局规划和MPC进行局部控制，以鲁棒地处理意外情况，实现可靠的任务性能。
AI.motivation: 为了确保在复杂环境中安全可靠地执行由STL描述的任务，并应对STL规格的通用性需求以及计算复杂性问题，同时能够鲁棒地处理意外情况。
AI.method: 1. 计算后向可达集（BRT）来评估STL规范的可行性，并支持多重可达-避开（MRA）问题。2. 利用深度神经网络来加速BRT的计算。3. 采用分层规划与控制架构：全局规划使用混合整数线性规划（MILP），局部控制器使用模型预测控制（MPC）。
AI.result: 通过深度神经网络加速BRT计算，计算时间相比基线方法减少约1000倍。该框架能够成功计算BRT并执行任务，并能鲁棒地处理意外的障碍物行为。
AI.conclusion: 提出的STL验证和控制合成框架能够有效地评估STL任务的可行性，并生成安全可靠的控制策略。该框架通过结合深度学习和优化技术，显著提高了计算效率，并展现出在处理不确定性和意外情况下的鲁棒性。

title: Vibe Researching as Wolf Coming: Can AI Agents with Skills Replace or Augment Social Scientists?
summary: AI agents -- systems that execute multi-step reasoning workflows with persistent state, tool access, and specialist skills -- represent a qualitative shift from prior automation technologies in social science. Unlike chatbots that respond to isolated queries, AI agents can now read files, run code, query databases, search the web, and invoke domain-specific skills to execute entire research pipelines autonomously. This paper introduces the concept of vibe researching -- the AI-era parallel to ``vibe coding'' (Karpathy, 2025) -- and uses scholar-skill, a 21-skill plugin for Claude Code covering the full research pipeline from idea to submission, as an illustrative case. I develop a cognitive task framework that classifies research activities along two dimensions -- codifiability and tacit knowledge requirement -- to identify a delegation boundary that is cognitive, not sequential: it cuts through every stage of the research pipeline, not between stages. I argue that AI agents excel at speed, coverage, and methodological scaffolding but struggle with theoretical originality and tacit field knowledge. The paper concludes with an analysis of three implications for the profession -- augmentation with fragile conditions, stratification risk, and a pedagogical crisis -- and proposes five principles for responsible vibe researching.

AI.tldr: 该论文介绍了“氛围研究”（vibe researching）的概念，即人工智能研究代理在研究过程中扮演的角色，并以 Scholar-Skill 插件为例，提出了一个认知任务框架来界定 AI 代理和人类研究者的职责分工。研究强调 AI 代理在速度和方法论支持方面的优势，但在理论原创性和领域隐性知识方面存在不足。论文还探讨了 AI 研究对学术界的潜在影响，并提出了负责任的氛围研究原则。
AI.motivation: 作者认为 AI 代理在研究工作中的出现，标志着自动化技术在社会科学领域的一大进步，需要一个新的研究框架来理解和指导这一变化。特别是，AI 代理能够自主执行复杂的研究流程，这与传统的单次查询响应方式截然不同，因此需要定义 AI 和人类研究者的协作界限。
AI.method: 作者提出了一个“认知任务框架”，将研究活动根据“可编码性”和“隐性知识要求”两个维度进行分类，从而划定了一个基于认知能力的“委托边界”，而不是简单地按研究阶段划分。文章以 Scholar-Skill 插件为例，该插件拥有 21 种技能，覆盖了从想法提出到论文提交的整个研究流程。
AI.result: AI 代理在速度、覆盖范围和方法论支撑方面表现出色，但难以实现理论原创性和运用隐性领域知识。认知任务框架揭示了 AI 代理在研究的各个阶段都可以与人类研究者协同工作，而非仅仅在某些阶段。
AI.conclusion: AI 代理在研究中的应用带来了三个潜在影响：有条件的研究者增强、学术界分化风险以及教学危机。作者为此提出了五项负责任的“氛围研究”原则，以指导未来 AI 在社会科学研究中的应用。

title: CLIP Is Shortsighted: Paying Attention Beyond the First Sentence
comment: 19 pages, 13 figures, to be published in the CVPR 2026 proceedings
summary: CLIP models learn transferable multi-modal features via image-text contrastive learning on internet-scale data. They are widely used in zero-shot classification, multi-modal retrieval, text-to-image diffusion, and as image encoders in large vision-language models. However, CLIP's pretraining is dominated by images paired with short captions, biasing the model toward encoding simple descriptions of salient objects and leading to coarse alignment on complex scenes and dense descriptions. While recent work mitigates this by fine-tuning on small-scale long-caption datasets, we identify an important common bias: both human- and LLM-generated long captions typically begin with a one-sentence summary followed by a detailed description. We show that this acts as a shortcut during training, concentrating attention on the opening sentence and early tokens and weakening alignment over the rest of the caption. To resolve this, we introduce DeBias-CLIP, which removes the summary sentence during training and applies sentence sub-sampling and text token padding to distribute supervision across all token positions. DeBias-CLIP achieves state-of-the-art long-text retrieval, improves short-text retrieval, and is less sensitive to sentence order permutations. It is a drop-in replacement for Long-CLIP with no additional trainable parameters.

AI.tldr: CLIP模型在预训练时存在对图像长文本描述的偏见，导致对复杂场景的理解不够精细。本文提出了DeBias-CLIP，通过移除摘要句、句子重采样和文本填充来解决此问题，并在长文本检索任务上取得了SOTA性能。
AI.motivation: CLIP模型在利用互联网规模数据进行图像-文本对比学习时，存在对由图像-短标题对训练的偏见，导致其在编码复杂场景和长描述时表现不佳。现有通过微调长标题数据集的方法也存在共同的偏见：人类和LLM生成的长标题通常以单句摘要开头，这使得模型在训练时倾向于关注开头句子，削弱了对后续内容的对齐。
AI.method: 本文提出了DeBias-CLIP方法，通过在训练时移除长文本的摘要句，并结合句子重采样和文本填充策略，将监督信号更均匀地分布到文本的所有Token位置，以解决CLIP模型在处理长文本时的偏见问题。
AI.result: DeBias-CLIP在长文本检索任务上取得了最先进的性能（SOTA），同时也提升了短文本检索的性能，并且对句子顺序的排列变化不敏感。作为Long-CLIP的即插即用替代品，它无需额外的可训练参数。
AI.conclusion: 通过移除训练过程中的摘要句并采用句子重采样和文本填充策略，DeBias-CLIP能够有效解决CLIP模型在处理长文本描述时的偏见问题，从而在长文本检索任务中取得显著的性能提升，并保持与其他CLIP模型的兼容性。

title: SignVLA: A Gloss-Free Vision-Language-Action Framework for Real-Time Sign Language-Guided Robotic Manipulation
summary:
We present, to our knowledge, the first sign language-driven Vision-Language-Action (VLA) framework for intuitive and inclusive human-robot interaction. Unlike conventional approaches that rely on gloss annotations as intermediate supervision, the proposed system adopts a gloss-free paradigm and directly maps visual sign gestures to semantic instructions. This design reduces annotation cost and avoids the information loss introduced by gloss representations, enabling more natural and scalable multimodal interaction.
  In this work, we focus on a real-time alphabet-level finger-spelling interface that provides a robust and low-latency communication channel for robotic control. Compared with large-scale continuous sign language recognition, alphabet-level interaction offers improved reliability, interpretability, and deployment feasibility in safety-critical embodied environments. The proposed pipeline transforms continuous gesture streams into coherent language commands through geometric normalization, temporal smoothing, and lexical refinement, ensuring stable and consistent interaction.
  Furthermore, the framework is designed to support future integration of transformer-based gloss-free sign language models, enabling scalable word-level and sentence-level semantic understanding. Experimental results demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed system in grounding sign-derived instructions into precise robotic actions under diverse interaction scenarios. These results highlight the potential of the framework to advance accessible, scalable, and multimodal embodied intelligence.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种首个不依赖手语词（gloss）标注的、从视觉手语直接映射到语义指令的 Vision-Language-Action (VLA) 框架，用于直观包容的人机交互，特别关注实时字母级指语识别，以实现更可靠、可解释且易于部署的机器人控制。
AI.motivation: 现有的手语识别方法通常依赖于手语词（gloss）标注，这增加了标注成本且可能导致信息丢失。作者希望开发一种更直接、更自然、更具可扩展性的手语到机器人指令的映射方法，以降低标注成本并提高交互的流畅性。
AI.method: 提出了一种无手语词（gloss-free）的 VLA 框架，直接将视觉手语手势映射到语义指令。该框架侧重于实时字母级指语识别，并采用几何归一化、时间平滑和词汇精炼等技术来处理连续手势流，将其转化为连贯的机器人控制指令。该框架还为未来集成基于 Transformer 的无手语词模型以支持更高级别的语义理解奠定了基础。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，该系统能够有效地将手语指令转化为精确的机器人动作，并在各种交互场景下表现出色。该框架在提高交互的可靠性、可解释性和部署可行性方面表现出潜力。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的无手语词 VLA 框架是一种创新方法，可以实现直观、包容且可扩展的人机交互，特别适用于需要高可靠性和可解释性的机器人控制应用。该框架有望推动可访问、可扩展和多模态的具身智能发展。

title: Metamorphic Testing of Vision-Language Action-Enabled Robots
summary: Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models are multimodal robotic task controllers that, given an instruction and visual inputs, produce a sequence of low-level control actions (or motor commands) enabling a robot to execute the requested task in the physical environment. These systems face the test oracle problem from multiple perspectives. On the one hand, a test oracle must be defined for each instruction prompt, which is a complex and non-generalizable approach. On the other hand, current state-of-the-art oracles typically capture symbolic representations of the world (e.g., robot and object states), enabling the correctness evaluation of a task, but fail to assess other critical aspects, such as the quality with which VLA-enabled robots perform a task. In this paper, we explore whether Metamorphic Testing (MT) can alleviate the test oracle problem in this context. To do so, we propose two metamorphic relation patterns and five metamorphic relations to assess whether changes to the test inputs impact the original trajectory of the VLA-enabled robots. An empirical study involving five VLA models, two simulated robots, and four robotic tasks shows that MT can effectively alleviate the test oracle problem by automatically detecting diverse types of failures, including, but not limited to, uncompleted tasks. More importantly, the proposed MRs are generalizable, making the proposed approach applicable across different VLA models, robots, and tasks, even in the absence of test oracles.

AI.tldr: 本研究探索了元测试（MT）在解决视觉-语言-动作（VLA）模型在机器人任务控制中的测试预言机问题上的潜力，并提出了一种通用的MT方法，可以在没有预言机的情况下检测VLA模型中的各种故障。
AI.motivation: 当前的VLA模型在测试时面临测试预言机问题。为每个指令定义复杂的、不可泛化的预言机很困难。此外，现有的基于符号表示的预言机无法评估任务执行的质量，而只能评估任务的正确性。
AI.method: 提出了一种基于元测试（MT）的方法，设计了两种元关系模式和五种具体的元关系，用于评估输入变化对VLA模型输出轨迹的影响。通过在五种VLA模型、两种模拟机器人和四种机器人任务上进行实证研究来验证该方法。
AI.result: 实证研究表明，MT能够有效地缓解测试预言机问题，并自动检测到包括任务未完成在内的多种类型的故障。提出的元关系具有泛化性，适用于不同的VLA模型、机器人和任务，即使在没有测试预言机的情况下也有效。
