AI.motivation: 潜在视觉推理作为一种模拟人类想象过程的范式，其有效性背后的机制尚不清楚。研究者希望揭示潜在推理的真正有效来源，并质疑其必要性。
AI.method: 研究者运用因果中介分析（Causal Mediation Analysis）来模拟从输入到答案的因果链，其中潜在token充当了中介。他们通过对输入和潜在token进行扰动，来观察其对最终答案的影响。此外，还进行了广泛的探针分析，以评估潜在token编码的视觉信息和其相似性。
AI.result: 研究发现了两个关键的断裂：1. 输入-潜在断裂：输入的变化对潜在token的影响微乎其微，表明潜在token并未有效关注输入。2. 潜在-答案断裂：潜在token的变化对最终答案的影响很小，表明潜在token对结果的因果效应有限。探针分析显示潜在token编码的视觉信息有限且高度相似。
AI.conclusion: 本研究通过因果分析和探针分析，表明当前的潜在视觉推理机制并未有效地利用输入信息或对输出产生显著影响。因此，研究者提出了一种名为CapImagine的新方法，该方法通过显式地引导模型进行文本想象来提升视觉推理能力，并在实验中证明其性能优于复杂的潜在空间基线方法，突显了显式想象的优越性。

title: CRAG: Can 3D Generative Models Help 3D Assembly?
summary: Most existing 3D assembly methods treat the problem as pure pose estimation, rearranging observed parts via rigid transformations. In contrast, human assembly naturally couples structural reasoning with holistic shape inference. Inspired by this intuition, we reformulate 3D assembly as a joint problem of assembly and generation. We show that these two processes are mutually reinforcing: assembly provides part-level structural priors for generation, while generation injects holistic shape context that resolves ambiguities in assembly. Unlike prior methods that cannot synthesize missing geometry, we propose CRAG, which simultaneously generates plausible complete shapes and predicts poses for input parts. Extensive experiments demonstrate state-of-the-art performance across in-the-wild objects with diverse geometries, varying part counts, and missing pieces. Our code and models will be released.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种新颖的3D组装方法CRAG，它将组装和生成视为一个联合问题，从而能够同时生成完整的形状并预测部件姿态，克服了现有方法无法合成缺失几何的局限性。
AI.motivation: 现有3D组装方法通常仅将问题视为姿态估计，忽略了人类组装过程中结构推理与整体形状推断的耦合。作者受到启发，希望通过将组装与生成联合起来，解决现有方法在处理缺失几何时的不足。
AI.method: 提出CRAG方法，将3D组装重新定义为一个同时进行组装和生成的联合问题。组装过程提供部件级别的结构先验，生成过程注入整体形状上下文以解决组装歧义。CRAG能够同时生成完整的形状并预测输入部件的姿态。
AI.result: 在包含各种几何形状、不同部件数量以及缺失部件的真实世界对象数据集上进行了广泛实验，CRAG取得了最先进的性能。
AI.conclusion: CRAG方法通过联合组装和生成，能够有效地处理复杂的3D组装任务，生成完整的形状并预测部件姿态，在各种场景下均表现出优越的性能。

title: Towards Better RL Training Data Utilization via Second-Order Rollout
summary: Reinforcement Learning (RL) has empowered Large Language Models (LLMs) with strong reasoning capabilities, but vanilla RL mainly focuses on generation capability improvement by training with only first-order rollout (generating multiple responses for a question), and we argue that this approach fails to fully exploit the potential of training data because of the neglect of critique capability training. To tackle this problem, we further introduce the concept of second-order rollout (generating multiple critiques for a response) and propose a unified framework for jointly training generation and critique capabilities. Extensive experiments across various models and datasets demonstrate that our approach can utilize training data more effectively than vanilla RL and achieve better performance under the same training data. Additionally, we uncover several insightful findings regarding second-order rollout and critique training, such as the importance of label balance in critique training and the noise problem of outcome-based rewards, which can be mitigated through sampling techniques. Our work offers a preliminary exploration of dynamic data augmentation and joint generation-critique training in RL, providing meaningful inspiration for the further advancement of RL training

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种结合生成和评论能力联合训练的强化学习框架，通过引入二阶回滚（生成多个评论）来弥补传统一阶回滚（生成多个回应）未能充分利用训练数据的不足，并在实验中证明了其有效性。
AI.motivation: 传统的基于强化学习的LLM训练主要关注生成能力的提升，但忽略了评论能力的训练，未能充分挖掘训练数据的潜力。
AI.method: 引入二阶回滚（生成对回应的多个评论）的概念，并提出一个统一框架，用于联合训练LLM的生成和评论能力。框架通过对比生成的回应和评论，学习如何生成更好的回应和更准确的评论。
AI.result: 实验表明，所提出的方法比传统强化学习方法能更有效地利用训练数据，在相同训练数据量下取得更好的性能。同时，研究还发现评论训练中的标签平衡重要性，以及如何通过采样技术缓解基于结果的奖励的噪声问题。
AI.conclusion: 该研究初步探索了强化学习中的动态数据增强和联合生成-评论训练，为RL训练的进一步发展提供了有益的启示，并证明了二阶回滚和评论训练在提升LLM能力方面的潜力。

title: Instruction-based Image Editing with Planning, Reasoning, and Generation
summary: Editing images via instruction provides a natural way to generate interactive content, but it is a big challenge due to the higher requirement of scene understanding and generation. Prior work utilizes a chain of large language models, object segmentation models, and editing models for this task. However, the understanding models provide only a single modality ability, restricting the editing quality. We aim to bridge understanding and generation via a new multi-modality model that provides the intelligent abilities to instruction-based image editing models for more complex cases. To achieve this goal, we individually separate the instruction editing task with the multi-modality chain of thought prompts, i.e., Chain-of-Thought (CoT) planning, editing region reasoning, and editing. For Chain-of-Thought planning, the large language model could reason the appropriate sub-prompts considering the instruction provided and the ability of the editing network. For editing region reasoning, we train an instruction-based editing region generation network with a multi-modal large language model. Finally, a hint-guided instruction-based editing network is proposed for editing image generations based on the sizeable text-to-image diffusion model to accept the hints for generation. Extensive experiments demonstrate that our method has competitive editing abilities on complex real-world images.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种新的多模态模型，通过链式思考（CoT）规划、编辑区域推理和基于提示的编辑，来改进基于指令的图像编辑，使其能够处理更复杂的场景。
AI.motivation: 现有基于大型语言模型、分割模型和编辑模型的指令图像编辑方法，由于其理解模型仅限于单一模态，限制了编辑质量。研究旨在弥合理解与生成之间的差距，以应对更复杂的图像编辑任务。
AI.method: 将指令编辑任务分解为三个阶段：1) 链式思考（CoT）规划：利用大型语言模型根据指令和编辑网络的能力推理出合适的子提示。2) 编辑区域推理：训练一个基于多模态大型语言模型的指令驱动的编辑区域生成网络。3) 基于提示的编辑：提出一个提示引导的指令驱动编辑网络，利用文本到图像扩散模型接受提示进行图像生成。
AI.result: 所提出的方法在处理复杂真实世界图像时，展现出具有竞争力的编辑能力。
AI.conclusion: 通过引入多模态链式思考的策略，该方法能够更有效地理解指令并生成编辑区域，从而提高指令驱动的图像编辑的质量和复杂性处理能力。

title: Probing for Knowledge Attribution in Large Language Models
summary: Large language models (LLMs) often generate fluent but unfounded claims, or hallucinations, which fall into two types: (i) faithfulness violations - misusing user context - and (ii) factuality violations - errors from internal knowledge. Proper mitigation depends on knowing whether a model's answer is based on the prompt or its internal weights. This work focuses on the problem of contributive attribution: identifying the dominant knowledge source behind each output. We show that a probe, a simple linear classifier trained on model hidden representations, can reliably predict contributive attribution. For its training, we introduce AttriWiki, a self-supervised data pipeline that prompts models to recall withheld entities from memory or read them from context, generating labelled examples automatically. Probes trained on AttriWiki data reveal a strong attribution signal, achieving up to 0.96 Macro-F1 on Llama-3.1-8B, Mistral-7B, and Qwen-7B, transferring to out-of-domain benchmarks (SQuAD, WebQuestions) with 0.94-0.99 Macro-F1 without retraining. Attribution mismatches raise error rates by up to 70%, demonstrating a direct link between knowledge source confusion and unfaithful answers. Yet, models may still respond incorrectly even when attribution is correct, highlighting the need for broader detection frameworks.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种名为“贡献归因”（contributive attribution）的方法，通过训练一个简单的线性分类器（probe）来识别大型语言模型（LLMs）输出的知识来源（用户提供还是模型内部知识）。使用新提出的自监督数据管道AttriWiki生成训练数据，该方法在多个LLM上表现出高准确率，并且能够迁移到其他基准测试。研究还发现，知识来源混淆与模型生成不准确答案之间存在直接联系。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型经常生成流畅但无根据的虚假信息（hallucinations），这些虚假信息分为两种：依赖用户上下文的错误（faithfulness violations）和模型内部知识的错误（factuality violations）。为了有效解决这个问题，需要区分模型输出是基于用户提供的提示还是其内部知识，从而实现正确的缓解策略。
AI.method: 本文提出“贡献归因”问题，旨在识别每个输出背后的主要知识来源。研究者训练了一个简单的线性分类器（probe），利用模型的隐藏层表示来预测知识来源。为了生成训练数据，他们设计了一个名为AttriWiki的自监督数据管道，通过提示模型回忆被隐藏的实体或从上下文中读取实体，自动生成带有标签的样本。
AI.result: 使用AttriWiki数据训练的probe在Llama-3.1-8B、Mistral-7B和Qwen-7B模型上实现了高达0.96的Macro-F1分数，能够可靠地预测贡献归因。该方法还能迁移到SQuAD和WebQuestions等领域外基准测试，获得0.94-0.99的Macro-F1分数，无需重新训练。此外，研究发现归因不匹配会将错误率提高高达70%，表明知识来源混淆与不忠实回答之间存在直接联系。
AI.conclusion: 贡献归因是一个可行的方法，可以通过简单的线性probe识别LLM输出的知识来源，并能有效迁移到其他任务。知识来源的混淆直接导致了模型回答的不准确性。然而，即使在归因正确的情况下，模型仍可能产生错误答案，这表明需要更全面的检测框架来解决LLM的虚假信息问题。

title: SPARR: Simulation-based Policies with Asymmetric Real-world Residuals for Assembly
summary: Robotic assembly presents a long-standing challenge due to its requirement for precise, contact-rich manipulation. While simulation-based learning has enabled the development of robust assembly policies, their performance often degrades when deployed in real-world settings due to the sim-to-real gap. Conversely, real-world reinforcement learning (RL) methods avoid the sim-to-real gap, but rely heavily on human supervision and lack generalization ability to environmental changes. In this work, we propose a hybrid approach that combines a simulation-trained base policy with a real-world residual policy to efficiently adapt to real-world variations. The base policy, trained in simulation using low-level state observations and dense rewards, provides strong priors for initial behavior. The residual policy, learned in the real world using visual observations and sparse rewards, compensates for discrepancies in dynamics and sensor noise. Extensive real-world experiments demonstrate that our method, SPARR, achieves near-perfect success rates across diverse two-part assembly tasks. Compared to the state-of-the-art zero-shot sim-to-real methods, SPARR improves success rates by 38.4% while reducing cycle time by 29.7%. Moreover, SPARR requires no human expertise, in contrast to the state-of-the-art real-world RL approaches that depend heavily on human supervision.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为SPARR的混合方法，结合了在模拟中训练的基础策略和在现实世界中学习的残差策略，以解决机器人装配中的sim-to-real差距问题。
AI.motivation: 模拟环境中训练的机器人装配策略在实际应用中性能会下降（sim-to-real差距），而纯实地强化学习方法需要大量人类监督且泛化能力差。
AI.method: 该方法使用在模拟中训练的基础策略（低级状态观察，密集奖励）提供初始行为先验，然后用在现实世界中学习的残差策略（视觉观察，稀疏奖励）来补偿现实世界的动力学和传感器噪声差异。
AI.result: SPARR在多种两件式装配任务中实现了近乎完美的成功率。与最先进的零样本sim-to-real方法相比，SPARR成功率提高了38.4%，周期时间缩短了29.7%。
AI.conclusion: SPARR通过结合模拟和现实世界的优势，有效地解决了机器人装配中的sim-to-real问题，并且无需人类专业知识，优于现有的方法。

title: Grasp, Slide, Roll: Comparative Analysis of Contact Modes for Tactile-Based Shape Reconstruction
summary: Tactile sensing allows robots to gather detailed geometric information about objects through physical interaction, complementing vision-based approaches. However, efficiently acquiring useful tactile data remains challenging due to the time-consuming nature of physical contact and the need to strategically choose contact locations that maximize information gain while minimizing physical interactions. This paper studies how different contact modes affect object shape reconstruction using a tactile-enabled dexterous gripper. We compare three contact interaction modes: grasp-releasing, sliding induced by finger-grazing, and palm-rolling. These contact modes are combined with an information-theoretic exploration framework that guides subsequent sampling locations using a shape completion model. Our results show that the improved tactile sensing efficiency of finger-grazing and palm-rolling translates into faster convergence in shape reconstruction, requiring 34% fewer physical interactions while improving reconstruction accuracy by 55%. We validate our approach using a UR5e robot arm equipped with an Inspire-Robots Dexterous Hand, showing robust performance across primitive object geometries.

AI.tldr: 研究了三种不同的触觉感应模式（抓取-释放、滑动、手掌滚动）对物体形状重建的影响，并结合信息论探索框架，发现手部滑动和手掌滚动模式能显著提高触觉感应效率，从而加速形状重建并提高准确性。
AI.motivation: 在机器人触觉感知领域，如何高效地获取有用的触觉数据仍然是一个挑战，因为物理接触耗时且需要策略性地选择接触点以最大化信息增益并最小化交互。本文旨在研究不同的接触模式对利用触觉信息进行物体形状重建的影响。
AI.method: 比较了三种接触交互模式：抓取-释放、由手指刮擦引起的滑动以及手掌滚动。这些模式与信息论探索框架相结合，该框架利用形状补全模型指导后续的采样位置。实验在UR5e机器人手臂上配备了Inspire-Robots灵巧手进行。
AI.result: 研究结果表明，手指刮擦和手掌滚动模式的触觉感应效率提升，使得形状重建的收敛速度更快，所需物理交互次数减少了34%，同时重建精度提高了55%。
AI.conclusion: 手指刮擦和手掌滚动这两种触觉感应模式相比于抓取-释放模式，在利用触觉信息进行物体形状重建时，能够更高效地获取信息，从而加速重建过程并提高重建的准确性。该方法在原始物体几何形状上表现出鲁棒性。

title: Plug, Play, and Fortify: A Low-Cost Module for Robust Multimodal Image Understanding Models
summary: Missing modalities present a fundamental challenge in multimodal models, often causing catastrophic performance degradation. Our observations suggest that this fragility stems from an imbalanced learning process, where the model develops an implicit preference for certain modalities, leading to the under-optimization of others. We propose a simple yet efficient method to address this challenge. The central insight of our work is that the dominance relationship between modalities can be effectively discerned and quantified in the frequency domain. To leverage this principle, we first introduce a Frequency Ratio Metric (FRM) to quantify modality preference by analyzing features in the frequency domain. Guided by FRM, we then propose a Multimodal Weight Allocation Module, a plug-and-play component that dynamically re-balances the contribution of each branch during training, promoting a more holistic learning paradigm. Extensive experiments demonstrate that MWAM can be seamlessly integrated into diverse architectural backbones, such as those based on CNNs and ViTs. Furthermore, MWAM delivers consistent performance gains across a wide range of tasks and modality combinations. This advancement extends beyond merely optimizing the performance of the base model; it also manifests as further performance improvements to state-of-the-art methods addressing the missing modality problem.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为多模态权重分配模块（MWAM）的即插即用组件，通过分析频率域特征的量化模态偏好（FRM），动态地重新平衡训练过程中各模态的贡献，从而解决多模态模型中模态缺失导致的性能下降问题。
AI.motivation: 多模态模型在面对缺失模态时性能会急剧下降，这是由于模型在学习过程中对某些模态存在隐式偏好，导致其他模态的优化不足。
AI.method: 首先，引入频率比率度量（FRM）来量化模态偏好。然后，提出多模态权重分配模块（MWAM），一个即插即用的组件，根据FRM动态调整各模态在训练过程中的权重，实现更全面的学习。
AI.result: MWAM可以轻松集成到CNN和ViT等不同的骨干网络中，并在各种任务和模态组合中持续提升性能，甚至超越了现有的解决模态缺失问题的最先进方法。
AI.conclusion: MWAM是一种有效且通用的方法，可以解决多模态模型中模态缺失带来的挑战，并提高整体性能。

title: TARAZ: Persian Short-Answer Question Benchmark for Cultural Evaluation of Language Models
comment: 11 pages, 3 figures, Fifteenth biennial Language Resources and Evaluation Conference (LREC) 2026 (to appear)
summary: This paper presents a comprehensive evaluation framework for assessing the cultural competence of large language models (LLMs) in Persian. Existing Persian cultural benchmarks rely predominantly on multiple-choice formats and English-centric metrics that fail to capture Persian's morphological complexity and semantic nuance. Our framework introduces a Persian-specific short-answer evaluation that combines rule-based morphological normalization with a hybrid syntactic and semantic similarity module, enabling robust soft-match scoring beyond exact string overlap. Through systematic evaluation of 15 state-of-the-art open- and closed-source models, we demonstrate that our hybrid evaluation improves scoring consistency by +10% compared to exact-match baselines by capturing meaning that surface-level methods cannot detect. We publicly release our evaluation framework, providing the first standardized benchmark for measuring cultural understanding in Persian and establishing a reproducible foundation for cross-cultural LLM evaluation research.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一个用于评估大型语言模型（LLMs）波斯语文化能力的新框架，该框架通过结合规则的形态学归一化和混合句法/语义相似性模块，实现了比现有基于选择题和英语中心化指标更准确的评估。实验结果表明，该混合评估方法在15个模型上提高了评分一致性10%，并公开了评估框架和基准。
AI.motivation: 现有的波斯语文化基准测试主要依赖于选择题和以英语为中心的指标，这些方法无法捕捉波斯语的形态复杂性和语义细微差别，因此需要一个更全面的评估框架。
AI.method: 研究提出了一种波斯语特定的短答案评估方法，结合了基于规则的形态学归一化和混合句法与语义相似性模块，以实现超越精确字符串匹配的鲁棒软匹配评分。
AI.result: 通过对15个最先进的开源和闭源模型进行系统评估，研究发现提出的混合评估方法通过捕获表面层方法无法检测的含义，将评分一致性比精确匹配基线提高了10%。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功开发并发布了一个用于衡量波斯语文化理解能力的新型标准化基准和评估框架，为跨文化LLM评估研究奠定了可重复的基础。

title: Toward Personalized LLM-Powered Agents: Foundations, Evaluation, and Future Directions
summary: Large language models have enabled agents that reason, plan, and interact with tools and environments to accomplish complex tasks. As these agents operate over extended interaction horizons, their effectiveness increasingly depends on adapting behavior to individual users and maintaining continuity across time, giving rise to personalized LLM-powered agents. In such long-term, user-dependent settings, personalization permeates the entire decision pipeline rather than remaining confined to surface-level generation. This survey provides a capability-oriented review of personalized LLM-powered agents. We organize the literature around four interdependent components: profile modeling, memory, planning, and action execution. Using this taxonomy, we synthesize representative methods and analyze how user signals are represented, propagated, and utilized, highlighting cross-component interactions and recurring design trade-offs. We further examine evaluation metrics and benchmarks tailored to personalized agents, summarize application scenarios spanning general assistance to specialized domains, and outline future directions for research and deployment. By offering a structured framework for understanding and designing personalized LLM-powered agents, this survey charts a roadmap toward more user-aligned, adaptive, robust, and deployable agentic systems, accelerating progress from prototype personalization to scalable real-world assistants.

AI.tldr: 本篇综述对个性化大型语言模型（LLM）驱动的智能体进行了全面梳理，重点关注其在长期、用户依赖场景下的行为适应和时序连续性。文章从用户画像建模、记忆、规划和动作执行四个核心组件出发，系统性地分析了现有研究，并探讨了用户信号的处理、跨组件交互、设计权衡、评估指标、基准测试、应用场景以及未来研究方向，旨在为开发更符合用户需求、适应性强、鲁棒且可部署的智能体系统提供路线图。
AI.motivation: 随着大型语言模型在复杂任务中展现出强大的推理、规划和交互能力，智能体在长期、用户特定的交互场景下，其行为的适应性和时序上的连续性变得至关重要。这催生了对个性化LLM驱动智能体的需求，但现有研究分散，缺乏系统性的梳理和框架性的指导。
AI.method: 该综述采用以能力为导向的视角，将个性化LLM驱动智能体的研究文献组织为四个相互关联的组件：用户画像建模（profile modeling）、记忆（memory）、规划（planning）和动作执行（action execution）。在此基础上，对代表性方法进行综合分析，探讨用户信号如何被表示、传播和利用，并识别跨组件的交互和常见的设计权衡。此外，文章还审视了针对个性化智能体的评估指标、基准测试，总结了应用场景，并展望了未来研究方向。
AI.result: 文章通过结构化的框架，系统地梳理了用户画像建模、记忆、规划和动作执行这四个关键组件在个性化LLM智能体中的作用和方法。分析揭示了用户信号在整个决策流程中的表示、传播和利用方式，以及不同组件之间的相互作用和设计取舍。同时，该工作还对适用于个性化智能体的评估指标和基准进行了考察，并总结了从通用助手到专业领域的各类应用。
AI.conclusion: 本综述提供了一个理解和设计个性化LLM驱动智能体的结构化框架，为实现更符合用户需求、具备适应性、鲁棒性和可部署性的智能体系统绘制了路线图，旨在加速从原型个性化向可扩展的真实世界助手的演进。

title: QuadSync: Quadrifocal Tensor Synchronization via Tucker Decomposition
summary: In structure from motion, quadrifocal tensors capture more information than their pairwise counterparts (essential matrices), yet they have often been thought of as impractical and only of theoretical interest. In this work, we challenge such beliefs by providing a new framework to recover $n$ cameras from the corresponding collection of quadrifocal tensors. We form the block quadrifocal tensor and show that it admits a Tucker decomposition whose factor matrices are the stacked camera matrices, and which thus has a multilinear rank of (4,~4,~4,~4) independent of $n$. We develop the first synchronization algorithm for quadrifocal tensors, using Tucker decomposition, alternating direction method of multipliers, and iteratively reweighted least squares. We further establish relationships between the block quadrifocal, trifocal, and bifocal tensors, and introduce an algorithm that jointly synchronizes these three entities. Numerical experiments demonstrate the effectiveness of our methods on modern datasets, indicating the potential and importance of using higher-order information in synchronization.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种从一组四焦点张量恢复多视图相机姿态的新框架，通过构造块四焦点张量并利用Tucker分解，实现了相机姿态的同步。该方法能够有效地处理大规模数据集，并展示了利用高阶几何信息在相机姿态同步中的重要性。
AI.motivation: 尽管四焦点张量比双焦或三焦点张量包含更多关于相机几何的信息，但由于其计算复杂性，在结构恢复（SfM）领域一直被认为不够实用。本研究旨在挑战这一观点，并探索利用四焦点张量来改进相机姿态恢复的实用方法。
AI.method: 研究者构造了一个块四焦点张量，并证明它可以进行Tucker分解，其中分解出的因子矩阵即为相机矩阵的堆叠。他们开发了一种基于Tucker分解、交替方向乘子法（ADMM）和迭代重加权最小二乘法（IRLS）的同步算法，用于从四焦点张量中恢复相机姿态。此外，还建立了块四焦点张量与三焦点、双焦张量之间的关系，并提出了一种联合同步这三类张量的算法。
AI.result: 通过数值实验，在现代数据集上验证了所提出方法的有效性。结果表明，该框架能够成功地从大量的四焦点张量中恢复相机姿态，并且在处理大规模数据集时表现良好。
AI.conclusion: 本研究成功地开发了一种实用的框架，可以从四焦点张量中恢复多视图相机的几何信息，证明了高阶几何信息在相机姿态同步中的价值和潜力。所提出的方法在实际应用中具有可行性，并为未来利用更高阶张量进行3D重建提供了新的思路。

title: RLHFless: Serverless Computing for Efficient RLHF
summary:
Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) has been widely applied to Large Language Model (LLM) post-training to align model outputs with human preferences. Recent models, such as DeepSeek-R1, have also shown RLHF's potential to improve LLM reasoning on complex tasks. In RL, inference and training co-exist, creating dynamic resource demands throughout the workflow. Compared to traditional RL, RLHF further challenges training efficiency due to expanding model sizes and resource consumption. Several RLHF frameworks aim to balance flexible abstraction and efficient execution. However, they rely on serverful infrastructures, which struggle with fine-grained resource variability. As a result, during synchronous RLHF training, idle time between or within RL components often causes overhead and resource wastage.
  To address these issues, we present RLHFless, the first scalable training framework for synchronous RLHF, built on serverless computing environments. RLHFless adapts to dynamic resource demands throughout the RLHF pipeline, pre-computes shared prefixes to avoid repeated computation, and uses a cost-aware actor scaling strategy that accounts for response length variation to find sweet spots with lower cost and higher speed. In addition, RLHFless assigns workloads efficiently to reduce intra-function imbalance and idle time. Experiments on both physical testbeds and a large-scale simulated cluster show that RLHFless achieves up to 1.35x speedup and 44.8% cost reduction compared to the state-of-the-art baseline.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为RLHFless的全新可扩展训练框架，它基于无服务器计算环境，旨在解决同步RLHF训练中的效率低下和资源浪费问题，并通过优化资源分配和预计算策略，在速度和成本方面均优于现有方法。
AI.motivation: 现有的RLHF训练框架依赖于服务器基础设施，难以应对LLM模型训练过程中动态变化的资源需求，导致训练效率低下和资源浪费。RLHFless旨在通过采用无服务器计算来克服这些限制。
AI.method: RLHFless是一个基于无服务器计算的同步RLHF训练框架。它通过以下方式优化效率：1. 适应RLHF流程中动态变化的资源需求；2. 预计算共享前缀以避免重复计算；3. 采用成本感知型Actor扩展策略，考虑响应长度变化；4. 高效分配工作负载以减少函数内不平衡和空闲时间。
AI.result: 在物理测试床和大规模模拟集群上的实验表明，与现有最先进的基线方法相比，RLHFless实现了高达1.35倍的速度提升和44.8%的成本降低。
AI.conclusion: RLHFless是第一个可扩展的同步RLHF训练框架，它利用无服务器计算有效地解决了RLHF训练中的资源分配和效率问题，并在速度和成本方面取得了显著的改进。

title: Knob: A Physics-Inspired Gating Interface for Interpretable and Controllable Neural Dynamics
summary: Existing neural network calibration methods often treat calibration as a static, post-hoc optimization task. However, this neglects the dynamic and temporal nature of real-world inference. Moreover, existing methods do not provide an intuitive interface enabling human operators to dynamically adjust model behavior under shifting conditions. In this work, we propose Knob, a framework that connects deep learning with classical control theory by mapping neural gating dynamics to a second-order mechanical system. By establishing correspondences between physical parameters -- damping ratio ($ζ$) and natural frequency ($ω_n$) -- and neural gating, we create a tunable "safety valve". The core mechanism employs a logit-level convex fusion, functioning as an input-adaptive temperature scaling. It tends to reduce model confidence particularly when model branches produce conflicting predictions. Furthermore, by imposing second-order dynamics (Knob-ODE), we enable a \textit{dual-mode} inference: standard i.i.d. processing for static tasks, and state-preserving processing for continuous streams. Our framework allows operators to tune "stability" and "sensitivity" through familiar physical analogues. This paper presents an exploratory architectural interface; we focus on demonstrating the concept and validating its control-theoretic properties rather than claiming state-of-the-art calibration performance. Experiments on CIFAR-10-C validate the calibration mechanism and demonstrate that, in Continuous Mode, the gate responses are consistent with standard second-order control signatures (step settling and low-pass attenuation), paving the way for predictable human-in-the-loop tuning.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为Knob的框架，将神经网络校准视为一个动态过程，并借鉴经典控制理论，通过调整模型的“阻尼比”和“自然频率”来实现可调的置信度控制，支持静态和连续数据流的推理模式。
AI.motivation: 现有神经网络校准方法多为静态的后验优化，忽略了现实世界推理的动态性和时间性，并且缺乏直观的人机交互接口来适应不断变化的情况。
AI.method: Knob框架将神经网络的门控动力学映射到二阶机械系统，建立了物理参数（阻尼比 $ζ$ 和自然频率 $ω_n$）与神经网络门控之间的对应关系。核心机制采用对数域的凸融合，作为输入自适应的温度缩放，特别是在模型分支预测冲突时降低模型置信度。通过引入二阶动力学（Knob-ODE），实现了双模推理：标准i.i.d.处理和状态保持的连续流处理。
AI.result: 在CIFAR-10-C数据集上的实验验证了该校准机制。结果表明，在连续模式下，门控响应与标准的二阶控制特征（阶跃响应的收敛和低通滤波衰减）一致，为可预测的人机在环调优奠定了基础。
AI.conclusion: Knob框架提供了一个探索性的架构接口，将神经网络校准与经典控制理论联系起来，允许用户通过直观的物理类比来调整模型的“稳定性和灵敏度”，实现了动态、可调的置信度控制，并支持双模推理。

title: Interactive Medical-SAM2 GUI: A Napari-based semi-automatic annotation tool for medical images
comment: 6 pages, 2 figures, Planning to submit JOSS (Journal of Open Source Software)
summary: Interactive Medical-SAM2 GUI is an open-source desktop application for semi-automatic annotation of 2D and 3D medical images. Built on the Napari multi-dimensional viewer, box/point prompting is integrated with SAM2-style propagation by treating a 3D volume as a slice sequence, enabling mask propagation from sparse prompts using Medical-SAM2 on top of SAM2. Voxel-level annotation remains essential for developing and validating medical imaging algorithms, yet manual labeling is slow and expensive for 3D scans, and existing integrations frequently emphasize per-slice interaction without providing a unified, cohort-oriented workflow for navigation, propagation, interactive correction, and quantitative export in a single local pipeline. To address this practical limitation, a local-first Napari workflow is provided for efficient 3D annotation across multiple studies using standard DICOM series and/or NIfTI volumes. Users can annotate cases sequentially under a single root folder with explicit proceed/skip actions, initialize objects via box-first prompting (including first/last-slice initialization for single-object propagation), refine predictions with point prompts, and finalize labels through prompt-first correction prior to saving. During export, per-object volumetry and 3D volume rendering are supported, and image geometry is preserved via SimpleITK. The GUI is implemented in Python using Napari and PyTorch, with optional N4 bias-field correction, and is intended exclusively for research annotation workflows. The code is released on the project page: https://github.com/SKKU-IBE/Medical-SAM2GUI/.

AI.tldr: 开发了一个基于Napari的开源GUI应用程序，利用Medical-SAM2进行2D/3D医学图像的半自动分割标注，支持逐切片提示传播、交互式修正和定量导出，旨在提高3D标注效率。
AI.motivation: 手动标注3D医学图像耗时且昂贵，现有工具缺乏统一的、面向队列的3D标注流程，无法高效处理多研究数据的导航、传播、交互修正和导出。
AI.method: 利用Napari作为多维查看器，集成了SAM2的逐切片传播机制（将3D体视为切片序列），通过框/点提示实现Medical-SAM2模型的掩码传播。支持逐研究、逐案例的标注流程，包括首/末切片提示初始化、点提示细化、交互式修正和基于SimpleITK的定量导出（体积测量、3D渲染）。
AI.result: 提供了一个本地优先的Napari工作流，可以高效地对多个研究的3D医学图像进行标注。用户可以通过多种提示方式进行标注，并能方便地进行修正和导出定量结果。
AI.conclusion: Interactive Medical-SAM2 GUI是一个实用的工具，通过集成先进的AI模型和用户友好的界面，显著提高了3D医学图像半自动标注的效率和便利性，满足了研究领域的需求。

title: Natural Language Declarative Prompting (NLD-P): A Modular Governance Method for Prompt Design Under Model Drift
summary: The rapid evolution of large language models (LLMs) has transformed prompt engineering from a localized craft into a systems-level governance challenge. As models scale and update across generations, prompt behavior becomes sensitive to shifts in instruction-following policies, alignment regimes, and decoding strategies, a phenomenon we characterize as GPT-scale model drift. Under such conditions, surface-level formatting conventions and ad hoc refinement are insufficient to ensure stable, interpretable control. This paper reconceptualizes Natural Language Declarative Prompting (NLD-P) as a declarative governance method rather than a rigid field template. NLD-P is formalized as a modular control abstraction that separates provenance, constraint logic, task content, and post-generation evaluation, encoded directly in natural language without reliance on external orchestration code. We define minimal compliance criteria, analyze model-dependent schema receptivity, and position NLD-P as an accessible governance framework for non-developer practitioners operating within evolving LLM ecosystems. Portions of drafting and editorial refinement employed a schema-bound LLM assistant configured under NLD-P. All conceptual framing, methodological claims, and final revisions were directed, reviewed, and approved by the human author under a documented human-in-the-loop protocol. The paper concludes by outlining implications for declarative control under ongoing model evolution and identifying directions for future empirical validation.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为自然语言声明式提示 (NLD-P) 的新方法，将提示工程视为系统级治理挑战，以应对大型语言模型 (LLM) 随时间推移的行为变化（模型漂移）。NLD-P 是一种声明式方法，将提示分解为可管理的部分，无需外部代码即可实现可解释和稳定的控制。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型 (LLM) 的快速发展和迭代更新导致了“模型漂移”现象，即模型的行为会因指令遵循策略、对齐机制和解码策略的变化而改变，使得传统的提示工程方法难以保证稳定和可控的输出。
AI.method: 本文将自然语言声明式提示 (NLD-P) 重构为一种声明式治理方法。NLD-P 被形式化为一个模块化控制抽象，将提示的来源、约束逻辑、任务内容和后处理评估分离，并直接用自然语言编码，不依赖于外部编排代码。论文定义了最小合规标准，分析了模型对特定模式的接收能力，并将 NLD-P 定位为一个易于非开发者使用的治理框架。
AI.result: NLD-P 提供了一种将提示工程视为声明式治理的方法，能够分离提示的不同组成部分，实现对 LLM 的可解释和稳定的控制，特别是在不断变化的 LLM 生态系统中。论文还描述了在 NLD-P 框架下使用 LLM 助手辅助撰写和编辑的过程，并强调了最终决策由人类作者控制。
AI.conclusion: NLD-P 为在持续演进的 LLM 环境中实现声明式控制提供了一个可行的框架，尤其适合非开发者。论文指出了其在应对模型漂移方面的意义，并提出了未来实证验证的方向。

title: Simple Models, Real Swimming: Digital Twins for Tendon-Driven Underwater Robots
summary: Mimicking the graceful motion of swimming animals remains a core challenge in soft robotics due to the complexity of fluid-structure interaction and the difficulty of controlling soft, biomimetic bodies. Existing modeling approaches are often computationally expensive and impractical for complex control or reinforcement learning needed for realistic motions to emerge in robotic systems. In this work, we present a tendon-driven fish robot modeled in an efficient underwater swimmer environment using a simplified, stateless hydrodynamics formulation implemented in the widespread robotics framework MuJoCo. With just two real-world swimming trajectories, we identify five fluid parameters that allow a matching to experimental behavior and generalize across a range of actuation frequencies. We show that this stateless fluid model can generalize to unseen actuation and outperform classical analytical models such as the elongated body theory. This simulation environment runs faster than real-time and can easily enable downstream learning algorithms such as reinforcement learning for target tracking, reaching a 93% success rate. Due to the simplicity and ease of use of the model and our open-source simulation environment, our results show that even simple, stateless models -- when carefully matched to physical data -- can serve as effective digital twins for soft underwater robots, opening up new directions for scalable learning and control in aquatic environments.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种基于MuJoCo的高效无状态水动力模型，用于模拟肌腱驱动的软体鱼机器人，并取得了优于经典模型的性能，且该模型能加速强化学习的应用，成功率达93%。
AI.motivation: 现有软体水下机器人建模方法计算成本高，难以实现复杂的控制和强化学习，限制了仿生运动的发展。研究旨在开发一种高效、易于使用的建模方法，以促进软体水下机器人的学习和控制。
AI.method: 使用MuJoCo机器人框架，实现了一个简化的、无状态的水动力模型，并通过两组真实游泳轨迹数据，识别了五个流体参数，使其能够匹配实验行为并泛化到不同的驱动频率。该模型被用于训练强化学习算法。
AI.result: 该无状态流体模型能够泛化到未见的驱动条件下，并且性能优于传统的细长体理论模型。在模拟环境中，模型运行速度快于实时，并且成功地将强化学习应用于目标跟踪任务，达到了93%的成功率。
AI.conclusion: 研究表明，即使是简单的无状态模型，在通过物理数据进行仔细匹配后，也能作为软体水下机器人的有效数字孪生，为水下环境的可扩展学习和控制开辟了新方向。

title: Scaling Audio-Visual Quality Assessment Dataset via Crowdsourcing
comment: Accepted to ICASSP 2026. 5 pages (main paper) + 8 pages (supplementary material)
summary: Audio-visual quality assessment (AVQA) research has been stalled by limitations of existing datasets: they are typically small in scale, with insufficient diversity in content and quality, and annotated only with overall scores. These shortcomings provide limited support for model development and multimodal perception research. We propose a practical approach for AVQA dataset construction. First, we design a crowdsourced subjective experiment framework for AVQA, breaks the constraints of in-lab settings and achieves reliable annotation across varied environments. Second, a systematic data preparation strategy is further employed to ensure broad coverage of both quality levels and semantic scenarios. Third, we extend the dataset with additional annotations, enabling research on multimodal perception mechanisms and their relation to content. Finally, we validate this approach through YT-NTU-AVQ, the largest and most diverse AVQA dataset to date, consisting of 1,620 user-generated audio and video (A/V) sequences. The dataset and platform code are available at https://github.com/renyu12/YT-NTU-AVQ

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一个用于构建大规模、多样化视听质量评估（AVQA）数据集的实用方法，并发布了迄今为止最大的AVQA数据集YT-NTU-AVQ，以克服现有数据集的局限性。
AI.motivation: 现有AVQA数据集规模小、内容和质量多样性不足、仅有总体分数，这限制了模型开发和多模态感知研究。
AI.method: 设计了一个众包主观实验框架，采用系统性的数据准备策略以确保质量和场景覆盖，并增加了额外的多模态感知相关注释。
AI.result: 构建了YT-NTU-AVQ数据集，包含1620个用户生成视音频序列，是迄今为止最大、最多样化的AVQA数据集。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的AVQA数据集构建方法是实用的，并成功生成了一个高质量、大规模的数据集，为AVQA研究和多模态感知研究提供了有力支持。

title: TCM-DiffRAG: Personalized Syndrome Differentiation Reasoning Method for Traditional Chinese Medicine based on Knowledge Graph and Chain of Thought
summary: Background: Retrieval augmented generation (RAG) technology can empower large language models (LLMs) to generate more accurate, professional, and timely responses without fine tuning. However, due to the complex reasoning processes and substantial individual differences involved in traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) clinical diagnosis and treatment, traditional RAG methods often exhibit poor performance in this domain. Objective: To address the limitations of conventional RAG approaches in TCM applications, this study aims to develop an improved RAG framework tailored to the characteristics of TCM reasoning. Methods: We developed TCM-DiffRAG, an innovative RAG framework that integrates knowledge graphs (KG) with chains of thought (CoT). TCM-DiffRAG was evaluated on three distinctive TCM test datasets. Results: The experimental results demonstrated that TCM-DiffRAG achieved significant performance improvements over native LLMs. For example, the qwen-plus model achieved scores of 0.927, 0.361, and 0.038, which were significantly enhanced to 0.952, 0.788, and 0.356 with TCM-DiffRAG. The improvements were even more pronounced for non-Chinese LLMs. Additionally, TCM-DiffRAG outperformed directly supervised fine-tuned (SFT) LLMs and other benchmark RAG methods. Conclusions: TCM-DiffRAG shows that integrating structured TCM knowledge graphs with Chain of Thought based reasoning substantially improves performance in individualized diagnostic tasks. The joint use of universal and personalized knowledge graphs enables effective alignment between general knowledge and clinical reasoning. These results highlight the potential of reasoning-aware RAG frameworks for advancing LLM applications in traditional Chinese medicine.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种名为 TCM-DiffRAG 的改进检索增强生成（RAG）框架，通过整合知识图谱（KG）和思维链（CoT）来提升大语言模型（LLMs）在传统中医学（TCM）领域的诊断和治疗能力，实验证明该框架显著优于现有方法。
AI.motivation: 传统 RAG 方法在处理传统中医学（TCM）复杂的临床诊断和治疗推理方面表现不佳，主要是由于 TCM 领域推理过程的复杂性和个体差异性。
AI.method: 开发了一种名为 TCM-DiffRAG 的新 RAG 框架，该框架结合了知识图谱（KG）和思维链（CoT）。在三个不同的 TCM 测试数据集上进行了评估。
AI.result: TCM-DiffRAG 在 qwen-plus 模型上显著提升了性能（例如，得分从 0.927, 0.361, 0.038 提高到 0.952, 0.788, 0.356），对于非中文 LLMs 提升效果更明显。此外，TCM-DiffRAG 的表现优于直接监督微调（SFT）的 LLMs 和其他基准 RAG 方法。
AI.conclusion: 将结构化的 TCM 知识图谱与基于思维链的推理相结合，可以显著提高个性化诊断任务的性能。通用和个性化知识图谱的联合使用能够有效协调通用知识与临床推理。这表明面向推理的 RAG 框架有潜力推动 LLMs 在 TCM 领域的应用。

title: Interface-Aware Trajectory Reconstruction of Limited Demonstrations for Robot Learning
comment: 13 pages, 8 figures, to appear in the proceedings of the 2026 Human-Robot Interaction (HRI) Conference
summary: Assistive robots offer agency to humans with severe motor impairments. Often, these users control high-DoF robots through low-dimensional interfaces, such as using a 1-D sip-and-puff interface to operate a 6-DoF robotic arm. This mismatch results in having access to only a subset of control dimensions at a given time, imposing unintended and artificial constraints on robot motion. As a result, interface-limited demonstrations embed suboptimal motions that reflect interface restrictions rather than user intent. To address this, we present a trajectory reconstruction algorithm that reasons about task, environment, and interface constraints to lift demonstrations into the robot's full control space. We evaluate our approach using real-world demonstrations of ADL-inspired tasks performed via a 2-D joystick and 1-D sip-and-puff control interface, teleoperating two distinct 7-DoF robotic arms. Analyses of the reconstructed demonstrations and derived control policies show that lifted trajectories are faster and more efficient than their interface-constrained counterparts while respecting user preferences.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种轨迹重建算法，通过考虑任务、环境和接口约束，将低维接口的机器人演示提升到机器人完整控制空间，从而生成更快捷、更高效且符合用户偏好的轨迹。
AI.motivation: 现有的辅助机器人控制接口（如1D吹吸）与高自由度机器人（如6D机械臂）之间存在维度不匹配，导致用户只能使用部分控制维度，产生了非预期的约束，并嵌入了次优的演示轨迹，无法完全反映用户意图。
AI.method: 开发了一种轨迹重建算法，该算法能够推理任务、环境和接口的约束，并将低维演示轨迹“提升”到机器人完整的控制空间。该方法通过分析演示数据并结合各种约束条件来生成更优的轨迹。
AI.result: 使用2D操纵杆和1D吹吸接口在实际演示中对两种不同的7自由度机器人进行了评估。结果表明，重建后的轨迹比原始接口受限的轨迹更快、更有效，同时还能尊重用户的偏好。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的轨迹重建算法能够有效地解决低维接口带来的约束问题，生成更高质量的机器人演示轨迹，从而提高辅助机器人的可用性和性能。

title: Generative Data Transformation: From Mixed to Unified Data
summary: Recommendation model performance is intrinsically tied to the quality, volume, and relevance of their training data. To address common challenges like data sparsity and cold start, recent researchs have leveraged data from multiple auxiliary domains to enrich information within the target domain. However, inherent domain gaps can degrade the quality of mixed-domain data, leading to negative transfer and diminished model performance. Existing prevailing \emph{model-centric} paradigm -- which relies on complex, customized architectures -- struggles to capture the subtle, non-structural sequence dependencies across domains, leading to poor generalization and high demands on computational resources. To address these shortcomings, we propose \textsc{Taesar}, a \emph{data-centric} framework for \textbf{t}arget-\textbf{a}lign\textbf{e}d \textbf{s}equenti\textbf{a}l \textbf{r}egeneration, which employs a contrastive decoding mechanism to adaptively encode cross-domain context into target-domain sequences. It employs contrastive decoding to encode cross-domain context into target sequences, enabling standard models to learn intricate dependencies without complex fusion architectures. Experiments show \textsc{Taesar} outperforms model-centric solutions and generalizes to various sequential models. By generating enriched datasets, \textsc{Taesar} effectively combines the strengths of data- and model-centric paradigms. The code accompanying this paper is available at~ \textcolor{blue}{https://github.com/USTC-StarTeam/Taesar}.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 Taesar 的数据中心框架，通过对比解码机制自适应地将跨领域上下文编码到目标领域序列中，以解决推荐模型中的数据稀疏和冷启动问题，并优于现有的模型中心方法。
AI.motivation: 现有的推荐模型在数据稀疏和冷启动问题上面临挑战，而利用辅助领域数据来丰富信息时，领域间的差异会导致负迁移。现有的模型中心范式难以捕捉跨领域序列依赖性，泛化能力差且计算资源需求高。
AI.method: 提出 Taesar (Target-aligned Sequential Regeneration) 数据中心框架，采用对比解码机制，将跨领域上下文自适应地编码到目标领域序列中，使标准模型能够学习复杂的依赖关系，而无需复杂的融合架构。
AI.result: Taesar 在实验中表现优于模型中心解决方案，并能泛化到各种序列模型。它通过生成丰富的数据集，有效地结合了数据中心和模型中心范式的优点。
AI.conclusion: Taesar 是一种有效的数据中心框架，通过对比解码机制解决跨领域推荐中的挑战，能够提高模型性能并降低对复杂模型架构的需求，同时还能泛化到不同的序列模型。

title: Denoising as Path Planning: Training-Free Acceleration of Diffusion Models with DPCache
summary: Diffusion models have demonstrated remarkable success in image and video generation, yet their practical deployment remains hindered by the substantial computational overhead of multi-step iterative sampling. Among acceleration strategies, caching-based methods offer a training-free and effective solution by reusing or predicting features across timesteps. However, existing approaches rely on fixed or locally adaptive schedules without considering the global structure of the denoising trajectory, often leading to error accumulation and visual artifacts. To overcome this limitation, we propose DPCache, a novel training-free acceleration framework that formulates diffusion sampling acceleration as a global path planning problem. DPCache constructs a Path-Aware Cost Tensor from a small calibration set to quantify the path-dependent error of skipping timesteps conditioned on the preceding key timestep. Leveraging this tensor, DPCache employs dynamic programming to select an optimal sequence of key timesteps that minimizes the total path cost while preserving trajectory fidelity. During inference, the model performs full computations only at these key timesteps, while intermediate outputs are efficiently predicted using cached features. Extensive experiments on DiT, FLUX, and HunyuanVideo demonstrate that DPCache achieves strong acceleration with minimal quality loss, outperforming prior acceleration methods by $+$0.031 ImageReward at 4.87$\times$ speedup and even surpassing the full-step baseline by $+$0.028 ImageReward at 3.54$\times$ speedup on FLUX, validating the effectiveness of our path-aware global scheduling framework. Code will be released at https://github.com/argsss/DPCache.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为DPCache的无训练加速框架，通过将扩散采样加速视为全局路径规划问题，利用路径感知成本张量和动态规划来选择关键时间步，从而实现高效加速同时保持高质量生成。
AI.motivation: 现有扩散模型的采样过程计算成本高昂，而现有的加速方法（如基于缓存的方法）存在依赖固定或局部调度的局限性，易导致误差累积和视觉伪影。研究动机是克服这些限制，提出一种更优的全局调度策略。
AI.method: DPCache将加速过程建模为全局路径规划问题。首先，利用一小部分校准数据构建路径感知成本张量，量化跳过时间步的路径依赖误差。然后，利用动态规划算法选择能最小化总路径成本并保持轨迹保真度的最优关键时间步序列。推理时，仅在关键时间步进行完全计算，中间输出通过缓存特征进行预测。
AI.result: 在DiT、FLUX和HunyuanVideo等模型上进行的实验表明，DPCache实现了显著的加速效果，且视觉质量损失很小。在FLUX数据集上，DPCache实现了4.87倍的加速，ImageReward得分提升了0.031；甚至在3.54倍加速下，ImageReward得分超越了全步长基线0.028。
AI.conclusion: DPCache是一种有效的训练免费加速框架，通过路径感知全局调度策略，能够显著提高扩散模型采样的速度，同时保持或提升生成质量，优于现有的加速方法。

title: Improving Neural Argumentative Stance Classification in Controversial Topics with Emotion-Lexicon Features
summary: Argumentation mining comprises several subtasks, among which stance classification focuses on identifying the standpoint expressed in an argumentative text toward a specific target topic. While arguments-especially about controversial topics-often appeal to emotions, most prior work has not systematically incorporated explicit, fine-grained emotion analysis to improve performance on this task. In particular, prior research on stance classification has predominantly utilized non-argumentative texts and has been restricted to specific domains or topics, limiting generalizability. We work on five datasets from diverse domains encompassing a range of controversial topics and present an approach for expanding the Bias-Corrected NRC Emotion Lexicon using DistilBERT embeddings, which we feed into a Neural Argumentative Stance Classification model. Our method systematically expands the emotion lexicon through contextualized embeddings to identify emotionally charged terms not previously captured in the lexicon. Our expanded NRC lexicon (eNRC) improves over the baseline across all five datasets (up to +6.2 percentage points in F1 score), outperforms the original NRC on four datasets (up to +3.0), and surpasses the LLM-based approach on nearly all corpora. We provide all resources-including eNRC, the adapted corpora, and model architecture-to enable other researchers to build upon our work.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种结合细粒度情感分析来改进论点立场分类任务的方法，通过利用DistilBERT嵌入扩展了NRC情感词典，并在多个数据集上取得了优于基线和现有方法的性能提升。
AI.motivation: 现有研究在论点立场分类任务中未能系统地纳入细粒度情感分析，且常使用非论证性文本或局限于特定领域，限制了模型的可泛化性。研究旨在解决这些不足，提高论点立场分类的准确性。
AI.method: 研究者首先从不同领域和争议性话题的五个数据集中收集数据。然后，他们利用DistilBERT嵌入扩展了Bias-Corrected NRC Emotion Lexicon，生成了一个新的情感词典（eNRC）。最后，将扩展后的情感词典整合到一个神经论证立场分类模型中进行训练。
AI.result: 研究提出的eNRC情感词典在所有五个数据集上都比基线模型提高了性能（F1分数最高提升6.2个百分点），并且在四个数据集上优于原始NRC词典（最高提升3.0个百分点）。此外，该方法在近乎所有语料库上都超越了基于LLM的方法。
AI.conclusion: 结合细粒度的情感分析，特别是通过利用上下文嵌入扩展情感词典，可以显著提高论点立场分类的性能。研究提出的eNRC词典和模型是应对该任务的有效方法，并为后续研究提供了资源。

title: Know What You Know: Metacognitive Entropy Calibration for Verifiable RL Reasoning
summary: Large reasoning models (LRMs) have emerged as a powerful paradigm for solving complex real-world tasks. In practice, these models are predominantly trained via Reinforcement Learning with Verifiable Rewards (RLVR), yet most existing outcome-only RLVR pipelines rely almost exclusively on a binary correctness signal and largely ignore the model's intrinsic uncertainty. We term this discrepancy the uncertainty-reward mismatch, under which high- and low-uncertainty solutions are treated equivalently, preventing the policy from "Know What You Know" and impeding the shift from optimizing for correct answers to optimizing effective reasoning paths. This limitation is especially critical in reasoning-centric tasks such as mathematics and question answering, where performance hinges on the quality of the model's internal reasoning process rather than mere memorization of final answers. To address this, we propose EGPO, a metacognitive entropy calibration framework that explicitly integrates intrinsic uncertainty into RLVR for enhancing LRMs. EGPO estimates per-sample uncertainty using a zero-overhead entropy proxy derived from token-level likelihoods and aligns it with extrinsic correctness through an asymmetric calibration mechanism that preserves correct reasoning while selectively regulating overconfident failures, thereby enabling stable and uncertainty-aware policy optimization. Moreover, EGPO recovers informative learning signals from otherwise degenerate group-based rollouts without modifying the verifier or reward definition. Extensive experiments across multiple benchmarks demonstrate that the proposed EGPO leads to substantial and consistent improvements in reasoning performance, establishing a principled path for advancing LRMs through metacognitive entropy calibration.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 EGPO 的新框架，通过整合模型的不确定性信息来改进大型推理模型（LRMs）的训练。EGPO 能够评估模型的不确定性，并将其与外部奖励相结合，从而优化模型的推理过程，尤其是在数学和问答等任务中。实验表明 EGPO 能显著提升 LRM 的推理性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的基于奖励的强化学习（RLVR）训练方法主要依赖二元正确性信号，忽略了模型内在的不确定性，这导致了“不确定性-奖励不匹配”问题。这种不匹配阻碍了模型“知道自己知道什么”，并限制了模型优化有效推理路径的能力，尤其是在依赖推理过程而非最终答案的任务中。
AI.method: EGPO 框架通过一个零开销的熵代理来估计每个样本的不确定性，该代理基于 token 级别的似然度。然后，通过一种不对称校准机制将内在不确定性与外在正确性对齐，该机制在保留正确推理的同时，选择性地纠正过于自信的错误。此外，EGPO 能够在不修改验证器或奖励定义的情况下，从退化的基于组的 rollout 中恢复有用的学习信号。
AI.result: EGPO 在多个基准测试中实现了显著且一致的推理性能提升。该框架能够稳定且关注不确定性的进行策略优化。
AI.conclusion: EGPO 框架通过元认知熵校准，成功地将内在不确定性整合到 RLVR 中，为提升大型推理模型的性能提供了一种原则性的方法，克服了现有方法在不确定性处理上的局限性。

title: Effective QA-driven Annotation of Predicate-Argument Relations Across Languages
summary: Explicit representations of predicate-argument relations form the basis of interpretable semantic analysis, supporting reasoning, generation, and evaluation. However, attaining such semantic structures requires costly annotation efforts and has remained largely confined to English. We leverage the Question-Answer driven Semantic Role Labeling (QA-SRL) framework -- a natural-language formulation of predicate-argument relations -- as the foundation for extending semantic annotation to new languages. To this end, we introduce a cross-linguistic projection approach that reuses an English QA-SRL parser within a constrained translation and word-alignment pipeline to automatically generate question-answer annotations aligned with target-language predicates. Applied to Hebrew, Russian, and French -- spanning diverse language families -- the method yields high-quality training data and fine-tuned, language-specific parsers that outperform strong multilingual LLM baselines (GPT-4o, LLaMA-Maverick). By leveraging QA-SRL as a transferable natural-language interface for semantics, our approach enables efficient and broadly accessible predicate-argument parsing across languages.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种跨语言迁移方法，利用英语的QA-SRL解析器，通过翻译和词语对齐生成目标语言的语义角色标注训练数据，并训练出在希伯来语、俄语和法语上优于大型语言模型的解析器。
AI.motivation: 现有的显式谓词-论元关系语义分析方法需要昂贵的人工标注，且主要集中在英语上。研究者希望为新语言扩展语义标注，使其更易于获取和应用。
AI.method: 研究者采用了基于问题-答案的语义角色标注（QA-SRL）框架，将其视为一种自然语言形式的谓词-论元关系。他们提出了一种跨语言迁移方法，该方法通过约束翻译和词语对齐流程，复用英语的QA-SRL解析器，自动生成目标语言中的问题-答案标注，这些标注与目标语言的谓词对齐。
AI.result: 该方法被应用于希伯来语、俄语和法语，生成了高质量的训练数据。通过对这些数据进行微调，训练出的特定语言解析器在性能上超越了包括GPT-4o和LLaMA-Maverick在内的强大多语言大型语言模型基线。
AI.conclusion: 通过将QA-SRL作为一种可迁移的自然语言语义接口，本文提出的方法能够高效且广泛地实现跨语言的谓词-论元解析，降低了语义分析的门槛。

title: WaterVideoQA: ASV-Centric Perception and Rule-Compliant Reasoning via Multi-Modal Agents
summary: While autonomous navigation has achieved remarkable success in passive perception (e.g., object detection and segmentation), it remains fundamentally constrained by a void in knowledge-driven, interactive environmental cognition. In the high-stakes domain of maritime navigation, the ability to bridge the gap between raw visual perception and complex cognitive reasoning is not merely an enhancement but a critical prerequisite for Autonomous Surface Vessels to execute safe and precise maneuvers. To this end, we present WaterVideoQA, the first large-scale, comprehensive Video Question Answering benchmark specifically engineered for all-waterway environments. This benchmark encompasses 3,029 video clips across six distinct waterway categories, integrating multifaceted variables such as volatile lighting and dynamic weather to rigorously stress-test ASV capabilities across a five-tier hierarchical cognitive framework. Furthermore, we introduce NaviMind, a pioneering multi-agent neuro-symbolic system designed for open-ended maritime reasoning. By synergizing Adaptive Semantic Routing, Situation-Aware Hierarchical Reasoning, and Autonomous Self-Reflective Verification, NaviMind transitions ASVs from superficial pattern matching to regulation-compliant, interpretable decision-making. Experimental results demonstrate that our framework significantly transcends existing baselines, establishing a new paradigm for intelligent, trustworthy interaction in dynamic maritime environments.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了WaterVideoQA，一个针对全水道环境的视频问答基准，以及NaviMind，一个多智能体神经符号系统，用于提升自主水面载体（ASV）在复杂海上导航中的认知和决策能力。
AI.motivation: 现有的自主导航在被动感知方面虽有成功，但在知识驱动的交互式环境认知方面存在不足，尤其是在高风险的海上导航领域，这阻碍了ASV进行安全精确的机动。因此，需要一个能够连接视觉感知和复杂认知推理的框架。
AI.method: 研究者提出了WaterVideoQA基准，包含3029个视频片段，覆盖六种水道类型，并考虑了多变的光照和天气条件，通过五层认知框架来测试ASV能力。同时，提出了NaviMind系统，一个多智能体神经符号系统，结合了自适应语义路由、情境感知分层推理和自主自反验证。
AI.result: NaviMind系统在实验中显著优于现有基线，表明其在动态海上环境中实现智能、可信交互的新范式。
AI.conclusion: WaterVideoQA和NaviMind的提出，使得ASV能够从表面模式匹配转向符合法规、可解释的决策，为实现自主海上导航的安全性、精确性和智能性奠定了基础。

title: ArtPro: Self-Supervised Articulated Object Reconstruction with Adaptive Integration of Mobility Proposals
summary: Reconstructing articulated objects into high-fidelity digital twins is crucial for applications such as robotic manipulation and interactive simulation. Recent self-supervised methods using differentiable rendering frameworks like 3D Gaussian Splatting remain highly sensitive to the initial part segmentation. Their reliance on heuristic clustering or pre-trained models often causes optimization to converge to local minima, especially for complex multi-part objects. To address these limitations, we propose ArtPro, a novel self-supervised framework that introduces adaptive integration of mobility proposals. Our approach begins with an over-segmentation initialization guided by geometry features and motion priors, generating part proposals with plausible motion hypotheses. During optimization, we dynamically merge these proposals by analyzing motion consistency among spatial neighbors, while a collision-aware motion pruning mechanism prevents erroneous kinematic estimation. Extensive experiments on both synthetic and real-world objects demonstrate that ArtPro achieves robust reconstruction of complex multi-part objects, significantly outperforming existing methods in accuracy and stability.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为ArtPro的自监督框架，用于高保真地重建可动关节物体，通过自适应整合运动建议来克服现有方法对初始分割的敏感性。
AI.motivation: 现有利用可微分渲染（如3D高斯泼溅）的自监督方法在初始部件分割上过于敏感，容易陷入局部最小值，尤其是在处理复杂的多部件物体时。
AI.method: ArtPro框架通过几何特征和运动先验指导的过度分割来初始化部件建议，并提出运动假设。在优化过程中，通过分析空间邻居间的运动一致性来动态合并这些建议，并使用碰撞感知的运动剪枝机制来避免错误的运动学估计。
AI.result: 在合成和真实世界物体上的大量实验表明，ArtPro能够稳健地重建复杂的多部件物体，在准确性和稳定性方面显著优于现有方法。
AI.conclusion: ArtPro通过自适应整合运动建议，解决了现有自监督方法在可动关节物体重建中对初始分割的依赖问题，提高了重建的鲁棒性和准确性。

title: GeoWorld: Geometric World Models
summary: Energy-based predictive world models provide a powerful approach for multi-step visual planning by reasoning over latent energy landscapes rather than generating pixels. However, existing approaches face two major challenges: (i) their latent representations are typically learned in Euclidean space, neglecting the underlying geometric and hierarchical structure among states, and (ii) they struggle with long-horizon prediction, which leads to rapid degradation across extended rollouts. To address these challenges, we introduce GeoWorld, a geometric world model that preserves geometric structure and hierarchical relations through a Hyperbolic JEPA, which maps latent representations from Euclidean space onto hyperbolic manifolds. We further introduce Geometric Reinforcement Learning for energy-based optimization, enabling stable multi-step planning in hyperbolic latent space. Extensive experiments on CrossTask and COIN demonstrate around 3% SR improvement in 3-step planning and 2% SR improvement in 4-step planning compared to the state-of-the-art V-JEPA 2. Project website: https://steve-zeyu-zhang.github.io/GeoWorld.

AI.tldr: GeoWorld是一个利用双曲空间来建模状态几何结构和层次关系的世界模型，并结合几何强化学习进行能量优化，以克服现有模型在长序列预测和几何结构捕捉方面的不足。
AI.motivation: 现有基于能量的预测世界模型在处理多步视觉规划时，其潜在表示学习于欧氏空间，忽视了状态间的几何和层次结构，且在长序列预测时性能会迅速下降。
AI.method: 提出GeoWorld，一个利用超双曲JEPA（Hyperbolic JEPA）将潜在表示映射到双曲流形，以保留几何结构和层次关系。同时引入几何强化学习（Geometric Reinforcement Learning）在双曲潜在空间中进行能量优化，实现多步规划。
AI.result: 在CrossTask和COIN数据集上的实验表明，GeoWorld在3步规划上相比现有最先进方法V-JEPA 2有约3%的成功率（SR）提升，在4步规划上提升约2%。
AI.conclusion: GeoWorld通过引入双曲几何表示和几何强化学习，成功解决了现有世界模型在捕捉状态间几何结构、层次关系以及长序列预测能力上的挑战，并在多步视觉规划任务上取得了性能提升。

title: Monocular Open Vocabulary Occupancy Prediction for Indoor Scenes
summary: Open-vocabulary 3D occupancy is vital for embodied agents, which need to understand complex indoor environments where semantic categories are abundant and evolve beyond fixed taxonomies. While recent work has explored open-vocabulary occupancy in outdoor driving scenarios, such methods transfer poorly indoors, where geometry is denser, layouts are more intricate, and semantics are far more fine-grained. To address these challenges, we adopt a geometry-only supervision paradigm that uses only binary occupancy labels (occupied vs free). Our framework builds upon 3D Language-Embedded Gaussians, which serve as a unified intermediate representation coupling fine-grained 3D geometry with a language-aligned semantic embedding. On the geometry side, we find that existing Gaussian-to-Occupancy operators fail to converge under such weak supervision, and we introduce an opacity-aware, Poisson-based approach that stabilizes volumetric aggregation. On the semantic side, direct alignment between rendered features and open-vocabulary segmentation features suffers from feature mixing; we therefore propose a Progressive Temperature Decay schedule that gradually sharpens opacities during splatting, strengthening Gaussian-language alignment. On Occ-ScanNet, our framework achieves 59.50 IoU and 21.05 mIoU in the open-vocabulary setting, surpassing all existing occupancy methods in IoU and outperforming prior open-vocabulary approaches by a large margin in mIoU. Code will be released at https://github.com/JuIvyy/LegoOcc.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种用于室内开放词汇3D占用理解的框架，通过仅使用几何信息进行监督，并引入新的高斯到占用算子和渐进温度衰减策略，显著提高了在Occ-ScanNet数据集上的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的开放词汇3D占用方法在室内环境中表现不佳，因为室内环境几何复杂、语义精细且类别丰富，无法满足具身智能体理解复杂室内环境的需求。
AI.method: 研究人员提出了一种基于几何信息监督的框架，该框架建立在3D语言嵌入高斯模型之上，用于结合3D几何和语言语义。具体方法包括：1. 引入一种不透明度感知、基于泊松的算子来稳定高斯到占用的体积聚合；2. 提出渐进温度衰减策略，在splatting过程中逐步锐化不透明度，以加强高斯与语言的对齐。
AI.result: 在Occ-ScanNet数据集上，该框架在开放词汇设置下实现了59.50的IoU和21.05的mIoU，在IoU方面超越了所有现有占用方法，在mIoU方面大幅领先于先前开放词汇方法。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的方法有效地解决了室内开放词汇3D占用理解的挑战，并通过新颖的几何和语义对齐技术显著提升了性能，为具身智能体在复杂室内环境中提供更强大的语义理解能力。

title: FLIGHT: Fibonacci Lattice-based Inference for Geometric Heading in real-Time
summary: Estimating camera motion from monocular video is a fundamental problem in computer vision, central to tasks such as SLAM, visual odometry, and structure-from-motion. Existing methods that recover the camera's heading under known rotation, whether from an IMU or an optimization algorithm, tend to perform well in low-noise, low-outlier conditions, but often decrease in accuracy or become computationally expensive as noise and outlier levels increase. To address these limitations, we propose a novel generalization of the Hough transform on the unit sphere (S(2)) to estimate the camera's heading. First, the method extracts correspondences between two frames and generates a great circle of directions compatible with each pair of correspondences. Then, by discretizing the unit sphere using a Fibonacci lattice as bin centers, each great circle casts votes for a range of directions, ensuring that features unaffected by noise or dynamic objects vote consistently for the correct motion direction. Experimental results on three datasets demonstrate that the proposed method is on the Pareto frontier of accuracy versus efficiency. Additionally, experiments on SLAM show that the proposed method reduces RMSE by correcting the heading during camera pose initialization.

AI.tldr: 提出一种基于S(2)单位球面广义霍夫变换的新方法，用于从单目视频估计相机朝向，能够有效处理噪声和离群点，并在准确性和效率上达到帕累托最优。
AI.motivation: 现有相机朝向估计方法在噪声和离群点较高时性能下降或计算成本增加，需要更鲁棒且高效的方法。
AI.method: 1. 提取两帧之间的对应关系，生成与每对对应关系兼容的方向大圆。2. 使用斐波那契格子离散化单位球面作为投票箱中心，使每个大圆对一系列方向进行投票，以应对噪声或动态目标。
AI.result: 在三个数据集上的实验表明，该方法在准确性和效率方面达到了帕累托最优。在SLAM实验中，该方法通过在相机姿态初始化期间纠正朝向，降低了RMSE。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的基于S(2)广义霍夫变换的方法是一种鲁棒且高效的相机朝向估计技术，能够有效处理噪声和离群点，并在实际应用（如SLAM）中表现出优势。

title: Rejection Mixing: Fast Semantic Propagation of Mask Tokens for Efficient DLLM Inference
summary: Diffusion Large Language Models (DLLMs) promise fast non-autoregressive inference but suffer a severe quality-speed trade-off in parallel decoding. This stems from the ''combinatorial contradiction'' phenomenon, where parallel tokens form semantically inconsistent combinations. We address this by integrating continuous representations into the discrete decoding process, as they preserve rich inter-position dependency. We propose ReMix (Rejection Mixing), a framework that introduces a novel Continuous Mixing State as an intermediate between the initial masked state and the final decoded token state. This intermediate state allows a token's representation to be iteratively refined in a continuous space, resolving mutual conflicts with other tokens before collapsing into a final discrete sample. Furthermore, a rejection rule reverts uncertain representations from the continuous state back to the masked state for reprocessing, ensuring stability and preventing error propagation. ReMix thus mitigates combinatorial contradictions by enabling continuous-space refinement during discrete diffusion decoding. Extensive experiments demonstrate that ReMix, as a training-free method, achieves a $2-8 \times$ inference speedup without any quality degradation.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 ReMix 的新框架，通过引入连续混合状态来改进扩散大型语言模型（DLLM）的并行解码，解决了组合矛盾问题，实现了在不牺牲质量的情况下将推理速度提高 2-8 倍。
AI.motivation: 传统的扩散大型语言模型（DLLM）在并行解码时存在严重的质量-速度权衡问题，这源于“组合矛盾”现象，即并行生成的 token 组合在语义上不一致。
AI.method: ReMix 框架通过引入一个“连续混合状态”（Continuous Mixing State）作为初始掩码状态和最终离散 token 状态之间的中间层。该中间状态允许 token 的表示在连续空间中进行迭代优化，解决 token 之间的冲突。此外，还引入了一个拒绝规则，将不确定的表示重新送回掩码状态进行再处理，以确保稳定性和防止错误传播。
AI.result: 实验证明，ReMix 作为一种无需额外训练的方法，能够实现 2-8 倍的推理速度提升，同时不降低生成质量。
AI.conclusion: ReMix 通过在离散扩散解码过程中引入连续空间的迭代优化和拒绝重试机制，有效缓解了组合矛盾问题，显著提高了 DLLM 的并行解码效率，且无需额外的模型训练。

title: AMA-Bench: Evaluating Long-Horizon Memory for Agentic Applications
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) are deployed as autonomous agents in increasingly complex applications, where enabling long-horizon memory is critical for achieving strong performance. However, a significant gap exists between practical applications and current evaluation standards for agent memory: existing benchmarks primarily focus on dialogue-centric, human-agent interactions. In reality, agent memory consists of a continuous stream of agent-environment interactions that are primarily composed of machine-generated representations. To bridge this gap, we introduce AMA-Bench (Agent Memory with Any length), which evaluates long-horizon memory for LLMs in real agentic applications. It features two key components: (1) a set of real-world agentic trajectories across representative agentic applications, paired with expert-curated QA, and (2) a set of synthetic agentic trajectories that scale to arbitrary horizons, paired with rule-based QA. Our comprehensive study shows that existing memory systems underperform on AMA-Bench primarily because they lack causality and objective information and are constrained by the lossy nature of similarity-based retrieval employed by many memory systems. To address these limitations, we propose AMA-Agent, an effective memory system featuring a causality graph and tool-augmented retrieval. Our results demonstrate that AMA-Agent achieves 57.22% average accuracy on AMA-Bench, surpassing the strongest memory system baselines by 11.16%.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了AMA-Bench基准测试和AMA-Agent记忆系统，用于评估和提升大型语言模型（LLM）在复杂应用中的长时记忆能力。AMA-Bench包含真实世界和合成的代理交互轨迹，AMA-Agent则通过因果图和工具增强检索来解决现有记忆系统的不足。
AI.motivation: 现有的大型语言模型（LLM）评估标准主要集中在对话场景，而忽略了LLM作为自主代理在现实应用中所需的连续、机器生成交互的长期记忆能力。因此，需要一个更贴近实际应用的评估基准来衡量和改进LLM的长期记忆。
AI.method: 引入AMA-Bench基准，包含真实世界的代理交互轨迹（配专家问答）和可无限扩展的合成代理交互轨迹（配规则问答）。提出AMA-Agent记忆系统，该系统结合了因果图和工具增强检索，以克服现有记忆系统在理解因果关系、利用客观信息以及处理相似性检索带来的信息损失等方面的局限性。
AI.result: 现有记忆系统在AMA-Bench上的表现不佳，主要是因为缺乏因果推理和客观信息，并且受到基于相似性的检索方式的信息损失限制。AMA-Agent在AMA-Bench上取得了57.22%的平均准确率，比最强的基线系统高出11.16%。
AI.conclusion: AMA-Bench为评估LLM在实际代理应用中的长期记忆提供了一个有效的框架。AMA-Agent通过引入因果图和工具增强检索，显著提升了LLM在长时记忆任务上的表现，证明了这些机制对于克服现有记忆系统局限性的重要性。

title: Decomposing Physician Disagreement in HealthBench
summary: We decompose physician disagreement in the HealthBench medical AI evaluation dataset to understand where variance resides and what observable features can explain it. Rubric identity accounts for 15.8% of met/not-met label variance but only 3.6-6.9% of disagreement variance; physician identity accounts for just 2.4%. The dominant 81.8% case-level residual is not reduced by HealthBench's metadata labels (z = -0.22, p = 0.83), normative rubric language (pseudo R^2 = 1.2%), medical specialty (0/300 Tukey pairs significant), surface-feature triage (AUC = 0.58), or embeddings (AUC = 0.485). Disagreement follows an inverted-U with completion quality (AUC = 0.689), confirming physicians agree on clearly good or bad outputs but split on borderline cases. Physician-validated uncertainty categories reveal that reducible uncertainty (missing context, ambiguous phrasing) more than doubles disagreement odds (OR = 2.55, p < 10^(-24)), while irreducible uncertainty (genuine medical ambiguity) has no effect (OR = 1.01, p = 0.90), though even the former explains only ~3% of total variance. The agreement ceiling in medical AI evaluation is thus largely structural, but the reducible/irreducible dissociation suggests that closing information gaps in evaluation scenarios could lower disagreement where inherent clinical ambiguity does not, pointing toward actionable evaluation design improvements.

AI.tldr: 研究分析了HealthBench医疗AI评估数据集中医生意见不一致的来源，发现绝大部分不一致（81.8%）无法被现有元数据、规范性语言、专业领域、表面特征或词嵌入解释。医生身份和评分标准身份只占小部分原因。然而，完成质量呈现倒U形与不一致度相关，而可规约的不确定性（如信息缺失、表述不清）显著增加了不一致的概率，但总体解释力有限。研究表明，医疗AI评估中的不一致性在很大程度上是结构性的，但通过弥补信息差距可以改善评估设计，减少部分不一致。
AI.motivation: 为了理解医疗AI评估中医生意见不一致的来源和可解释因素，从而改进评估流程。
AI.method: 通过分解HealthBench数据集中的医生意见不一致，分析了评分标准身份、医生身份、元数据标签、规范性语言、医疗专业、表面特征、词嵌入以及完成质量对不一致性的影响。此外，研究还区分了可规约不确定性和不可规约不确定性，并分析了它们与不一致性的关系。
AI.result: 评分标准身份和医生身份对不一致性的解释力很小（分别为3.6-6.9%和2.4%）。81.8%的案例级残差不一致性无法被大多数分析的特征解释。完成质量与不一致性呈倒U形关系。可规约不确定性显著增加不一致的可能性（OR = 2.55），而不可规约不确定性则没有影响。可规约不确定性仅解释了约3%的总不一致性。
AI.conclusion: 医疗AI评估中的意见不一致性主要源于结构性因素，而非可解释的特征。虽然弥补信息差距（可规约不确定性）可以降低部分不一致性，但大部分不一致性（源于内在的临床模糊性）难以消除。研究为改进医疗AI评估的设计提供了方向，尤其是在信息获取和表达清晰度方面。

title: SPMamba-YOLO: An Underwater Object Detection Network Based on Multi-Scale Feature Enhancement and Global Context Modeling
comment: 31 pages, 10 figures, 6 tables. This paper presents SPMamba-YOLO, an underwater object detection framework integrating multi-scale feature enhancement and global context modeling. The work is under review
summary: Underwater object detection is a critical yet challenging research problem owing to severe light attenuation, color distortion, background clutter, and the small scale of underwater targets. To address these challenges, we propose SPMamba-YOLO, a novel underwater object detection network that integrates multi-scale feature enhancement with global context modeling. Specifically, a Spatial Pyramid Pooling Enhanced Layer Aggregation Network (SPPELAN) module is introduced to strengthen multi-scale feature aggregation and expand the receptive field, while a Pyramid Split Attention (PSA) mechanism enhances feature discrimination by emphasizing informative regions and suppressing background interference. In addition, a Mamba-based state space modeling module is incorporated to efficiently capture long-range dependencies and global contextual information, thereby improving detection robustness in complex underwater environments. Extensive experiments on the URPC2022 dataset demonstrate that SPMamba-YOLO outperforms the YOLOv8n baseline by more than 4.9\% in mAP@0.5, particularly for small and densely distributed underwater objects, while maintaining a favorable balance between detection accuracy and computational cost.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为SPMamba-YOLO的新型水下目标检测网络，通过多尺度特征增强和全局上下文建模来解决水下检测的挑战。
AI.motivation: 水下目标检测面临光照衰减、颜色失真、背景杂乱和小目标等严峻挑战。
AI.method: 引入了SPPELAN模块用于多尺度特征聚合和扩大感受野，PSA机制用于增强特征辨别力，并整合了基于Mamba的状态空间模型来捕捉长距离依赖和全局上下文信息。
AI.result: 在URPC2022数据集上，SPMamba-YOLO在mAP@0.5上比YOLOv8n基线提升了4.9%以上，尤其对小目标和密集目标效果显著，同时保持了精度和计算成本的良好平衡。
AI.conclusion: SPMamba-YOLO通过有效的多尺度特征增强和全局上下文建模，能够显著提高水下目标检测的性能，尤其是在复杂的水下环境中。

title: Test-Time Scaling with Diffusion Language Models via Reward-Guided Stitching
summary: Reasoning with large language models often benefits from generating multiple chains-of-thought, but existing aggregation strategies are typically trajectory-level (e.g., selecting the best trace or voting on the final answer), discarding useful intermediate work from partial or "nearly correct" attempts. We propose Stitching Noisy Diffusion Thoughts, a self-consistency framework that turns cheap diffusion-sampled reasoning into a reusable pool of step-level candidates. Given a problem, we (i) sample many diverse, low-cost reasoning trajectories using a masked diffusion language model, (ii) score every intermediate step with an off-the-shelf process reward model (PRM), and (iii) stitch these highest-quality steps across trajectories into a composite rationale. This rationale then conditions an autoregressive (AR) model (solver) to recompute only the final answer. This modular pipeline separates exploration (diffusion) from evaluation and solution synthesis, avoiding monolithic unified hybrids while preserving broad search. Across math reasoning benchmarks, we find that step-level recombination is most beneficial on harder problems, and ablations highlight the importance of the final AR solver in converting stitched but imperfect rationales into accurate answers. Using low-confidence diffusion sampling with parallel, independent rollouts, our training-free framework improves average accuracy by up to 23.8% across six math and coding tasks. At the same time, it achieves up to a 1.8x latency reduction relative to both traditional diffusion models (e.g., Dream, LLaDA) and unified architectures (e.g., TiDAR). Code is available at https://github.com/roymiles/diffusion-stitching.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种名为“Stitching Noisy Diffusion Thoughts”（SNDT）的自洽性框架，通过从廉价的扩散模型生成的多个推理链中提取并拼接最优的中间步骤，来提高大型语言模型的推理能力，同时降低延迟。
AI.motivation: 现有的多链思维（CoT）推理方法通常在轨迹层面进行聚合（如选择最佳链或投票），这会丢弃来自不完美推理链中有价值的中间信息。研究者希望开发一种方法，能够有效地利用这些部分或“接近正确”的推理尝试。
AI.method: 该框架包含三个主要步骤：（1）使用掩码扩散语言模型生成大量低成本、多样化的推理轨迹。（2）利用现成的过程奖励模型（PRM）对每个中间推理步骤进行评分。（3）将来自不同轨迹的最高质量中间步骤拼接起来，形成一个复合推理过程。（4）将此复合推理过程作为条件，输入一个自回归模型（求解器），仅重新计算最终答案。
AI.result: 在数学推理基准测试中，研究发现步骤级别的重组在更难的问题上效果最显著。消融实验表明，最终的自回归求解器在将拼接但可能不完美的推理过程转化为准确答案方面至关重要。与传统的扩散模型和统一架构相比，该训练免费框架在六项数学和编程任务上的平均准确率提高了高达 23.8%，同时延迟降低了 1.8 倍。
AI.conclusion: SNDT 是一种有效的自洽性框架，通过模块化地分离探索（扩散）、评估（PRM）和解决方案合成（AR 求解器），能够高效地利用低成本扩散模型生成的推理信息，显著提高大型语言模型的推理性能并降低延迟。该方法在处理困难推理问题时尤其有效。

title: ClinDet-Bench: Beyond Abstention, Evaluating Judgment Determinability of LLMs in Clinical Decision-Making
summary: Clinical decisions are often required under incomplete information. Clinical experts must identify whether available information is sufficient for judgment, as both premature conclusion and unnecessary abstention can compromise patient safety. To evaluate this capability of large language models (LLMs), we developed ClinDet-Bench, a benchmark based on clinical scoring systems that decomposes incomplete-information scenarios into determinable and undeterminable conditions. Identifying determinability requires considering all hypotheses about missing information, including unlikely ones, and verifying whether the conclusion holds across them. We find that recent LLMs fail to identify determinability under incomplete information, producing both premature judgments and excessive abstention, despite correctly explaining the underlying scoring knowledge and performing well under complete information. These findings suggest that existing benchmarks are insufficient to evaluate the safety of LLMs in clinical settings. ClinDet-Bench provides a framework for evaluating determinability recognition, leading to appropriate abstention, with potential applicability to medicine and other high-stakes domains, and is publicly available.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了ClinDet-Bench基准，用于评估大型语言模型（LLM）在信息不完整情况下的临床决策能力。研究发现，现有LLM在识别信息是否足以做出判断方面表现不佳，容易过早下结论或过度回避，即使在信息完整的情况下表现良好。
AI.motivation: 临床决策常常需要在信息不完整的情况下进行，而过早下结论或过度回避都可能危及患者安全。因此，研究者希望评估大型语言模型（LLM）在这种情境下的判断能力。
AI.method: 研究者开发了一个名为ClinDet-Bench的基准，该基准基于临床评分系统，将信息不完整的场景分解为可确定和不可确定的条件。评估LLM识别可确定性的能力，需要考虑所有关于缺失信息的假设（包括可能性小的），并验证结论在所有假设下是否成立。
AI.result: 研究发现，近期的大型语言模型（LLM）在信息不完整的情况下，未能正确识别判断的可确定性。它们既会出现过早做出判断的情况，也会出现过度的回避（不作判断），尽管它们能够正确解释相关的评分知识，并在信息完整的情况下表现良好。
AI.conclusion: 现有的基准不足以评估LLM在临床环境中的安全性。ClinDet-Bench提供了一个评估可确定性识别能力的框架，从而引导模型进行适当的回避，这可能适用于医学和其他高风险领域。

title: Latent Gaussian Splatting for 4D Panoptic Occupancy Tracking
summary: Capturing 4D spatiotemporal surroundings is crucial for the safe and reliable operation of robots in dynamic environments. However, most existing methods address only one side of the problem: they either provide coarse geometric tracking via bounding boxes, or detailed 3D structures like voxel-based occupancy that lack explicit temporal association. In this work, we present Latent Gaussian Splatting for 4D Panoptic Occupancy Tracking (LaGS) that advances spatiotemporal scene understanding in a holistic direction. Our approach incorporates camera-based end-to-end tracking with mask-based multi-view panoptic occupancy prediction, and addresses the key challenge of efficiently aggregating multi-view information into 3D voxel grids via a novel latent Gaussian splatting approach. Specifically, we first fuse observations into 3D Gaussians that serve as a sparse point-centric latent representation of the 3D scene, and then splat the aggregated features onto a 3D voxel grid that is decoded by a mask-based segmentation head. We evaluate LaGS on the Occ3D nuScenes and Waymo datasets, achieving state-of-the-art performance for 4D panoptic occupancy tracking. We make our code available at https://lags.cs.uni-freiburg.de/.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为LaGS的新方法，用于在动态环境中进行4D全景占用跟踪，通过融合高斯散布和基于掩码的分割，实现了先进的3D场景理解。
AI.motivation: 现有方法在4D时空场景理解方面存在不足，要么提供粗糙的几何跟踪，要么提供缺乏时间关联的详细3D结构。因此，需要一种能够同时进行精确几何跟踪和详细3D结构建模，并具备明确时间关联的方法。
AI.method: LaGS方法结合了基于相机的端到端跟踪和基于掩码的多视图全景占用预测。关键在于利用新颖的潜在高斯散布技术，将多视图信息高效地聚合到3D体素网格中。具体来说，先将观测融合到3D高斯分布中，作为3D场景的稀疏点中心潜在表示，然后将聚合后的特征散布到3D体素网格上，并由基于掩码的分割头进行解码。
AI.result: 在Occ3D nuScenes和Waymo数据集上进行了评估，LaGS在4D全景占用跟踪方面取得了最先进的性能。
AI.conclusion: LaGS是一种先进的4D全景占用跟踪方法，能够有效地聚合多视图信息并实现准确的3D时空场景理解，在相关数据集上达到了SOTA性能。

title: ViCLIP-OT: The First Foundation Vision-Language Model for Vietnamese Image-Text Retrieval with Optimal Transport
comment: Preprint submitted to Expert Systems with Applications
summary: Image-text retrieval has become a fundamental component in intelligent multimedia systems; however, most existing vision-language models are optimized for highresource languages and remain suboptimal for low-resource settings such as Vietnamese. This work introduces ViCLIP-OT, a foundation vision-language model specifically designed for Vietnamese image-text retrieval. The proposed framework integrates CLIP-style contrastive learning with a Similarity-Graph Regularized Optimal Transport (SIGROT) loss to enhance global cross-modal consistency and mitigate modality gap issues. Extensive experiments on three Vietnamese benchmarks (UITOpenViIC, KTVIC, and Crossmodal-3600) demonstrate that ViCLIP-OT consistently outperforms CLIP and SigLIP baselines in both in-domain and zero-shot settings. On UIT-OpenViIC, the model achieves an average Recall@K of 67.34%, improving upon CLIP by 5.75 percentage points. In zero-shot evaluation on Crossmodal-3600, ViCLIPOT surpasses CLIP by 11.72 percentage points. Embedding-space analysis further confirms improved alignment and reduced modality gap. The results indicate that integrating SIGROT provides an effective and scalable strategy for cross-modal retrieval in low-resource languages, offering practical implications for intelligent multimedia retrieval systems in Vietnamese and other underrepresented linguistic contexts.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了ViCLIP-OT，一个专门为越南语图像-文本检索设计的视觉语言基础模型，通过结合对比学习和最优传输损失来解决低资源语言的挑战，并在多个越南语基准测试中取得了显著优于现有模型的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有视觉语言模型在低资源语言（如越南语）上的表现不佳，本文旨在为越南语图像-文本检索开发一个高效的基础模型。
AI.method: 提出ViCLIP-OT框架，该框架结合了CLIP风格的对比学习和一种名为“Similarity-Graph Regularized Optimal Transport (SIGROT)”的损失函数，以增强跨模态一致性并缩小模态差距。
AI.result: 在UIT-OpenViIC、KTVIC和Crossmodal-3600三个越南语基准测试中，ViCLIP-OT在有领域和零样本设置下均优于CLIP和SigLIP基线。在UIT-OpenViIC上，平均Recall@K提升了5.75个百分点；在Crossmodal-3600的零样本评估中，比CLIP提升了11.72个百分点。嵌入空间分析显示了更好的模态对齐和更小的模态差距。
AI.conclusion: SIGROT损失集成是处理低资源语言跨模态检索的有效且可扩展的策略，对越南语及其他代表性不足的语言的智能多媒体检索系统具有实际意义。

title: MiroFlow: Towards High-Performance and Robust Open-Source Agent Framework for General Deep Research Tasks
summary: Despite the remarkable progress of large language models (LLMs), the capabilities of standalone LLMs have begun to plateau when tackling real-world, complex tasks that require interaction with external tools and dynamic environments. Although recent agent frameworks aim to enhance model autonomy through tool integration and external interaction, they still suffer from naive workflows, unstable performance, limited support across diverse benchmarks and tasks, and heavy reliance on costly commercial APIs. In this work, we propose a high-performance and robust open-source agent framework, termed MiroFlow, which incorporates an agent graph for flexible orchestration, an optional deep reasoning mode to enhance performance, and a robust workflow execution to ensure stable and reproducible performance. Extensive experiments demonstrate that MiroFlow consistently achieves state-of-the-art performance across multiple agent benchmarks, including GAIA, BrowseComp-EN/ZH, HLE, xBench-DeepSearch, and notably FutureX. We hope it could serve as an easily accessible, reproducible, and comparable baseline for the deep research community.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 MiroFlow 的高性能、开源的代理框架，通过引入代理图、深度推理模式和稳健的工作流执行来克服现有 LLM 代理框架的局限性，并在多个基准测试中取得了最先进的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的 LLM 代理框架在处理需要与外部工具和动态环境交互的复杂现实世界任务时，存在工作流简单、性能不稳定、跨基准测试和任务支持有限以及过度依赖昂贵商业 API 等问题。
AI.method: MiroFlow 框架包含一个用于灵活编排的代理图，一个可选的深度推理模式以增强性能，以及一个稳健的工作流执行机制以确保稳定性和可复现性。
AI.result: 通过广泛的实验证明，MiroFlow 在 GAIA、BrowseComp-EN/ZH、HLE、xBench-DeepSearch 和 FutureX 等多个代理基准测试中始终 achieves state-of-the-art 性能。
AI.conclusion: MiroFlow 是一个高性能、稳健且易于访问、可复现和可比较的开源代理框架，旨在为深度研究社区提供一个强大的基线。

title: Affine-Scaled Attention: Towards Flexible and Stable Transformer Attention
summary:
Transformer attention is typically implemented using softmax normalization, which enforces attention weights with unit sum normalization. While effective in many settings, this constraint can limit flexibility in controlling attention magnitudes and may contribute to overly concentrated or unstable attention patterns during training. Prior work has explored modifications such as attention sinks or gating mechanisms, but these approaches provide only limited or indirect control over attention reweighting. We propose Affine-Scaled Attention, a simple extension to standard attention that introduces input-dependent scaling and a corresponding bias term applied to softmax-normalized attention weights. This design relaxes the strict normalization constraint while maintaining aggregation of value representations, allowing the model to adjust both the relative distribution and the scale of attention in a controlled manner.
  We empirically evaluate Affine-Scaled Attention in large-scale language model pretraining across multiple model sizes. Experimental results show consistent improvements in training stability, optimization behavior, and downstream task performance compared to standard softmax attention and attention sink baselines. These findings suggest that modest reweighting of attention outputs provides a practical and effective way to improve attention behavior in Transformer models.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为 Affine-Scaled Attention 的 Transformer 注意力机制的改进方法，通过引入与输入相关的缩放和偏置项，放松了 softmax 归一化的严格限制，从而提高了训练稳定性和下游任务性能。
AI.motivation: 标准的 Transformer 注意力机制使用 softmax 归一化，虽然有效，但可能限制了注意力的灵活控制，并可能导致训练过程中注意力模式过于集中或不稳定。现有的改进方法（如 attention sinks）提供的控制是有限的或间接的。
AI.method: 提出 Affine-Scaled Attention，通过向 softmax 归一化的注意力权重添加输入依赖的缩放因子和偏置项。这允许模型在放松严格归一化约束的同时，以可控的方式调整注意力的相对分布和尺度。
AI.result: 在大型语言模型预训练的实验中，Affine-Scaled Attention 相较于标准 softmax 注意力和 attention sink 基线，在训练稳定性、优化行为和下游任务性能方面均显示出持续的改进。
AI.conclusion: 对注意力权重的适度重加权是一种实用且有效的方法，可以改善 Transformer 模型中的注意力行为。

title: SUPERGLASSES: Benchmarking Vision Language Models as Intelligent Agents for AI Smart Glasses
summary: The rapid advancement of AI-powered smart glasses, one of the hottest wearable devices, has unlocked new frontiers for multimodal interaction, with Visual Question Answering (VQA) over external knowledge sources emerging as a core application. Existing Vision Language Models (VLMs) adapted to smart glasses are typically trained and evaluated on traditional multimodal datasets; however, these datasets lack the variety and realism needed to reflect smart glasses usage scenarios and diverge from their specific challenges, where accurately identifying the object of interest must precede any external knowledge retrieval. To bridge this gap, we introduce SUPERGLASSES, the first comprehensive VQA benchmark built on real-world data entirely collected by smart glasses devices. SUPERGLASSES comprises 2,422 egocentric image-question pairs spanning 14 image domains and 8 query categories, enriched with full search trajectories and reasoning annotations. We evaluate 26 representative VLMs on this benchmark, revealing significant performance gaps. To address the limitations of existing models, we further propose SUPERLENS, a multimodal smart glasses agent that enables retrieval-augmented answer generation by integrating automatic object detection, query decoupling, and multimodal web search. Our agent achieves state-of-the-art performance, surpassing GPT-4o by 2.19 percent, and highlights the need for task-specific solutions in smart glasses VQA scenarios.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了SUPERGLASSES，一个基于真实智能眼镜数据构建的多模态视觉问答（VQA）基准，并在此基础上开发了一个名为SUPERLENS的智能眼镜代理，该代理通过结合目标检测、查询解耦和网络搜索，在VQA任务上取得了优于GPT-4o的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有用于智能眼镜的视觉语言模型（VLM）在传统数据集上训练和评估，这些数据集未能反映智能眼镜使用场景的多样性和真实性，并且忽略了在检索外部知识之前准确识别关注对象这一关键挑战。
AI.method: 研究人员收集了由智能眼镜设备采集的真实世界数据，构建了SUPERGLASSES基准，包含2,422个自顶向下图像-问题对，涵盖14个图像领域和8个查询类别，并提供了搜索轨迹和推理标注。在此基础上，提出了SUPERLENS代理，集成了自动对象检测、查询解耦和多模态网络搜索，以实现检索增强的答案生成。
AI.result: 在SUPERGLASSES基准上，26个代表性VLM表现出显著的性能差距。SUPERLENS代理取得了最先进的性能，比GPT-4o高出2.19%。
