AI.conclusion: SUPERGLASSES基准的提出填补了真实世界智能眼镜VQA数据的空白。SUPERLENS代理的成功表明，针对智能眼镜VQA场景需要开发特定的、能够进行检索增强的多模态解决方案。

title: Where Vision Becomes Text: Locating the OCR Routing Bottleneck in Vision-Language Models
summary: Vision-language models (VLMs) can read text from images, but where does this optical character recognition (OCR) information enter the language processing stream? We investigate the OCR routing mechanism across three architecture families (Qwen3-VL, Phi-4, InternVL3.5) using causal interventions. By computing activation differences between original images and text-inpainted versions, we identify architecture-specific OCR bottlenecks whose dominant location depends on the vision-language integration strategy: DeepStack models (Qwen) show peak sensitivity at mid-depth (about 50%) for scene text, while single-stage projection models (Phi-4, InternVL) peak at early layers (6-25%), though the exact layer of maximum effect varies across datasets. The OCR signal is remarkably low-dimensional: PC1 captures 72.9% of variance. Crucially, principal component analysis (PCA) directions learned on one dataset transfer to others, demonstrating shared text-processing pathways. Surprisingly, in models with modular OCR circuits (notably Qwen3-VL-4B), OCR removal can improve counting performance (up to +6.9 percentage points), suggesting OCR interferes with other visual processing in sufficiently modular architectures.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过因果干预的方法，探究了三种视觉语言模型（VLMs）的OCR（光学字符识别）信息输入语言处理的机制，发现OCR信息主要集中在模型的早期或中期层，且其低维度的表示具有跨数据集的迁移性。有趣的是，在某些模块化设计的模型中，移除OCR甚至能提升计数任务的性能。
AI.motivation: 视觉语言模型（VLMs）能够识别图像中的文本，但目前尚不清楚这些OCR信息是如何进入模型的语言处理流程的。研究旨在探究不同VLM架构家族中OCR信息路由的机制。
AI.method: 研究采用了因果干预的方法，通过比较原始图像和文本修复（text-inpainted）图像的激活差异来识别OCR瓶颈。同时，使用了主成分分析（PCA）来分析OCR信号的维度和迁移性。研究对象包括Qwen3-VL、Phi-4和InternVL3.5这三种架构。
AI.result: 1. OCR信息进入语言处理的瓶颈位置因模型架构而异：DeepStack模型（如Qwen）在中期层（约50%深度）对场景文本最敏感；单阶段投影模型（如Phi-4、InternVL）在早期层（6-25%）最敏感。2. OCR信号是低维度的，PC1就能解释72.9%的方差。3. PCA学习到的方向在不同数据集之间具有迁移性。4. 在具有模块化OCR电路的模型（如Qwen3-VL-4B）中，移除OCR反而能提升计数任务的性能（最高提升6.9个百分点）。
AI.conclusion: OCR信息在VLMs中的路由机制存在架构特异性，并且其表示是低维且可迁移的。在某些模块化设计的模型中，OCR的独立性可能导致其与其他视觉处理任务产生干扰，移除OCR反而可能提高特定任务的表现。

title: Motion-aware Event Suppression for Event Cameras
summary: In this work, we introduce the first framework for Motion-aware Event Suppression, which learns to filter events triggered by IMOs and ego-motion in real time. Our model jointly segments IMOs in the current event stream while predicting their future motion, enabling anticipatory suppression of dynamic events before they occur. Our lightweight architecture achieves 173 Hz inference on consumer-grade GPUs with less than 1 GB of memory usage, outperforming previous state-of-the-art methods on the challenging EVIMO benchmark by 67\% in segmentation accuracy while operating at a 53\% higher inference rate. Moreover, we demonstrate significant benefits for downstream applications: our method accelerates Vision Transformer inference by 83\% via token pruning and improves event-based visual odometry accuracy, reducing Absolute Trajectory Error (ATE) by 13\%.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了首个用于运动感知的事件抑制框架，能够实时过滤由非自身运动（IMOs）和自身运动引起的事件。该模型能够分割当前事件流中的IMOs并预测其未来运动，从而在动态事件发生前进行预测性抑制。其轻量级架构性能优越，在EVIMO基准测试中精度提升67%，推理速度提升53%。此外，该方法还能加速Vision Transformer推理（83%）并提高事件视觉里程计精度（ATE降低13%）。
AI.motivation: 现有的事件处理方法在过滤由非自身运动（IMOs）和自身运动引起的动态事件方面存在不足，这限制了下游应用的效率和准确性。
AI.method: 提出一个运动感知的事件抑制框架，该框架能够同时分割当前事件流中的IMOs并预测其未来运动，从而实现对动态事件的预测性抑制。采用轻量级架构设计，以保证实时性和低资源消耗。
AI.result: 在EVIMO基准测试中，该方法在分割准确性上比现有最先进方法提高了67%，推理速度提高了53%。对于下游应用，该方法将Vision Transformer的推理速度提高了83%（通过令牌修剪），并将事件视觉里程计的绝对轨迹误差（ATE）降低了13%。
AI.conclusion: 提出的运动感知事件抑制框架能够有效且高效地过滤动态事件，显著提高了下游计算机视觉任务的性能，为实时事件处理和应用提供了新的解决方案。

title: When Should an AI Act? A Human-Centered Model of Scene, Context, and Behavior for Agentic AI Design
summary: Agentic AI increasingly intervenes proactively by inferring users' situations from contextual data yet often fails for lack of principled judgment about when, why, and whether to act. We address this gap by proposing a conceptual model that reframes behavior as an interpretive outcome integrating Scene (observable situation), Context (user-constructed meaning), and Human Behavior Factors (determinants shaping behavioral likelihood). Grounded in multidisciplinary perspectives across the humanities, social sciences, HCI, and engineering, the model separates what is observable from what is meaningful to the user and explains how the same scene can yield different behavioral meanings and outcomes. To translate this lens into design action, we derive five agent design principles (behavioral alignment, contextual sensitivity, temporal appropriateness, motivational calibration, and agency preservation) that guide intervention depth, timing, intensity, and restraint. Together, the model and principles provide a foundation for designing agentic AI systems that act with contextual sensitivity and judgment in interactions.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一个概念模型和五个设计原则，以解决当前主动型AI在判断何时、为何以及是否采取行动方面的不足，从而设计出更具情境感知和判断力的AI系统。
AI.motivation: 现有主动型AI在推断用户情境并主动干预时常失败，缺乏关于何时、为何以及是否行动的原则性判断。
AI.method: 提出一个概念模型，将行为视为对“场景”（可观察情境）、“情境”（用户构建的意义）和“人类行为因素”（决定行为可能性的因素）的综合解读结果。并从中提炼出五个AI设计原则（行为对齐、情境敏感性、时间适宜性、动机校准和自主性保留）。
AI.result: 该模型能够区分可观察的事实和用户赋予的意义，并解释为何相同的场景会产生不同的行为意义和结果。五个设计原则为指导AI干预的深度、时机、强度和克制提供了框架。
AI.conclusion: 该模型和原则共同为设计具有情境敏感性和判断力的主动型AI系统奠定了基础。

title: UniScale: Unified Scale-Aware 3D Reconstruction for Multi-View Understanding via Prior Injection for Robotic Perception
summary: We present UniScale, a unified, scale-aware multi-view 3D reconstruction framework for robotic applications that flexibly integrates geometric priors through a modular, semantically informed design. In vision-based robotic navigation, the accurate extraction of environmental structure from raw image sequences is critical for downstream tasks. UniScale addresses this challenge with a single feed-forward network that jointly estimates camera intrinsics and extrinsics, scale-invariant depth and point maps, and the metric scale of a scene from multi-view images, while optionally incorporating auxiliary geometric priors when available. By combining global contextual reasoning with camera-aware feature representations, UniScale is able to recover the metric-scale of the scene. In robotic settings where camera intrinsics are known, they can be easily incorporated to improve performance, with additional gains obtained when camera poses are also available. This co-design enables robust, metric-aware 3D reconstruction within a single unified model. Importantly, UniScale does not require training from scratch, and leverages world priors exhibited in pre-existing models without geometric encoding strategies, making it particularly suitable for resource-constrained robotic teams. We evaluate UniScale on multiple benchmarks, demonstrating strong generalization and consistent performance across diverse environments. We will release our implementation upon acceptance.

AI.tldr: UniScale 是一个统一的、感知尺度的多视图 3D 重建框架，专为机器人应用设计，能够灵活集成几何先验。它通过一个单一的前馈网络，从多视图图像中联合估计相机内参和外参、尺度不变的深度图和点图，以及场景的度量尺度，并且可以集成辅助几何先验。
AI.motivation: 在基于视觉的机器人导航中，从原始图像序列中准确提取环境结构对于下游任务至关重要。现有的方法在处理尺度不确定性和集成几何先验方面存在挑战。
AI.method: UniScale 使用一个单一的前馈网络，通过结合全局上下文推理和相机感知特征表示，联合估计相机内参和外参、尺度不变的深度图和点图，以及场景的度量尺度。它还支持可选地整合辅助几何先验（如已知的相机内参和外参）。该模型无需从头训练，可以利用预训练模型的先验知识。
AI.result: UniScale 能够恢复场景的度量尺度，并在机器人环境中（即使已知相机内参和外参）性能得到提升。在多个基准测试中，UniScale 展现了强大的泛化能力和跨不同环境的一致性性能。
AI.conclusion: UniScale 提供了一个统一、尺度感知的 3D 重建解决方案，适用于机器人应用，能够有效地集成几何先验，并能在资源受限的环境中表现出色。

title: Toward Automatic Filling of Case Report Forms: A Case Study on Data from an Italian Emergency Department
summary: Case Report Forms (CRFs) collect data about patients and are at the core of well-established practices to conduct research in clinical settings. With the recent progress of language technologies, there is an increasing interest in automatic CRF-filling from clinical notes, mostly based on the use of Large Language Models (LLMs). However, there is a general scarcity of annotated CRF data, both for training and testing LLMs, which limits the progress on this task. As a step in the direction of providing such data, we present a new dataset of clinical notes from an Italian Emergency Department annotated with respect to a pre-defined CRF containing 134 items to be filled. We provide an analysis of the data, define the CRF-filling task and metric for its evaluation, and report on pilot experiments where we use an open-source state-of-the-art LLM to automatically execute the task. Results of the case-study show that (i) CRF-filling from real clinical notes in Italian can be approached in a zero-shot setting; (ii) LLMs' results are affected by biases (e.g., a cautious behaviour favours "unknown" answers), which need to be corrected.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一个意大利急诊科临床笔记数据集，并标注了134个CRF（病例报告表）项，以解决CRF自动填充的标注数据稀缺问题。研究还定义了评估指标，并展示了使用开源LLM进行零样本CRF填充的初步实验结果，指出LLM存在“未知”答案偏好等偏差。
AI.motivation: 临床试验中的CRF数据收集是关键，但现有CRF自动填充方法缺乏足够的标注数据来训练和测试大型语言模型（LLM）。
AI.method: 构建了一个包含意大利急诊科临床笔记的数据集，并针对预定义的134项CRF进行了人工标注。定义了CRF填充任务的评估指标，并使用开源的LLM在零样本设置下进行了自动填充的试点实验。
AI.result: （i）表明在意大利语临床笔记的零样本设置下，可以实现CRF填充。（ii）LLM的填充结果受到偏见影响，例如倾向于给出“未知”答案，这需要进行修正。
AI.conclusion: 该研究通过提供标注数据和进行试点实验，为CRF自动填充任务的LLM研究奠定了基础，并指出了LLM在实际应用中需要解决的偏差问题。

title: DeepPresenter: Environment-Grounded Reflection for Agentic Presentation Generation
summary: Presentation generation requires deep content research, coherent visual design, and iterative refinement based on observation. However, existing presentation agents often rely on predefined workflows and fixed templates. To address this, we present DeepPresenter, an agentic framework that adapts to diverse user intents, enables effective feedback-driven refinement, and generalizes beyond a scripted pipeline. Specifically, DeepPresenter autonomously plans, renders, and revises intermediate slide artifacts to support long-horizon refinement with environmental observations. Furthermore, rather than relying on self-reflection over internal signals (e.g., reasoning traces), our environment-grounded reflection conditions the generation process on perceptual artifact states (e.g., rendered slides), enabling the system to identify and correct presentation-specific issues during execution. Results on the evaluation set covering diverse presentation-generation scenarios show that DeepPresenter achieves state-of-the-art performance, and the fine-tuned 9B model remains highly competitive at substantially lower cost. Our project is available at: https://github.com/icip-cas/PPTAgent

AI.tldr: DeepPresenter是一个智能体框架，通过环境反馈驱动的迭代优化，实现了超越预设流程的通用化演示文稿生成。
AI.motivation: 现有演示文稿生成工具依赖预定义流程和固定模板，无法适应多样化的用户需求和进行有效的反馈式优化。本研究旨在克服这些限制。
AI.method: DeepPresenter是一个智能体框架，能够自主规划、渲染和修订中间幻灯片，支持基于环境观察的长周期优化。它通过条件化生成过程于感知到的构件状态（如渲染的幻灯片），而非仅依赖内部信号进行自我反思，从而识别和纠正演示文稿特有的问题。
AI.result: 在涵盖多样化演示文稿生成场景的评估集中，DeepPresenter取得了最先进的性能。经过微调的9B模型在成本显著降低的情况下，依然保持了高度竞争力。
AI.conclusion: DeepPresenter框架能够适应不同的用户意图，实现有效的反馈驱动优化，并能超越脚本化流程实现泛化，在演示文稿生成任务上表现出优越的性能。

title: Risk-Aware World Model Predictive Control for Generalizable End-to-End Autonomous Driving
summary: With advances in imitation learning (IL) and large-scale driving datasets, end-to-end autonomous driving (E2E-AD) has made great progress recently. Currently, IL-based methods have become a mainstream paradigm: models rely on standard driving behaviors given by experts, and learn to minimize the discrepancy between their actions and expert actions. However, this objective of "only driving like the expert" suffers from limited generalization: when encountering rare or unseen long-tail scenarios outside the distribution of expert demonstrations, models tend to produce unsafe decisions in the absence of prior experience. This raises a fundamental question: Can an E2E-AD system make reliable decisions without any expert action supervision? Motivated by this, we propose a unified framework named Risk-aware World Model Predictive Control (RaWMPC) to address this generalization dilemma through robust control, without reliance on expert demonstrations. Practically, RaWMPC leverages a world model to predict the consequences of multiple candidate actions and selects low-risk actions through explicit risk evaluation. To endow the world model with the ability to predict the outcomes of risky driving behaviors, we design a risk-aware interaction strategy that systematically exposes the world model to hazardous behaviors, making catastrophic outcomes predictable and thus avoidable. Furthermore, to generate low-risk candidate actions at test time, we introduce a self-evaluation distillation method to distill riskavoidance capabilities from the well-trained world model into a generative action proposal network without any expert demonstration. Extensive experiments show that RaWMPC outperforms state-of-the-art methods in both in-distribution and out-of-distribution scenarios, while providing superior decision interpretability.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为RaWMPC的端到端自动驾驶框架，它不依赖专家演示，而是通过风险感知世界模型和鲁棒控制来提高泛化能力，并在处理长尾场景方面表现出色。
AI.motivation: 现有的模仿学习方法在面对长尾场景时泛化能力有限，可能导致不安全的决策。因此，研究如何让端到端自动驾驶系统在没有专家监督的情况下做出可靠决策。
AI.method: 提出RaWMPC框架，利用世界模型预测多项候选动作的后果，并通过显式风险评估选择低风险动作。通过风险感知交互策略使世界模型能够预测危险行为的后果。引入自评估蒸馏方法，将世界模型的风险规避能力提炼到生成式动作提议网络中。
AI.result: RaWMPC在分布内和分布外场景中均优于最先进的方法，并提供了更好的决策可解释性。
AI.conclusion: RaWMPC框架通过不依赖专家演示的鲁棒控制，有效解决了端到端自动驾驶的泛化性难题，特别是在处理长尾场景方面取得了显著成果。

title: FlexMS is a flexible framework for benchmarking deep learning-based mass spectrum prediction tools in metabolomics
summary: The identification and property prediction of chemical molecules is of central importance in the advancement of drug discovery and material science, where the tandem mass spectrometry technology gives valuable fragmentation cues in the form of mass-to-charge ratio peaks. However, the lack of experimental spectra hinders the attachment of each molecular identification, and thus urges the establishment of prediction approaches for computational models. Deep learning models appear promising for predicting molecular structure spectra, but overall assessment remains challenging as a result of the heterogeneity in methods and the lack of well-defined benchmarks. To address this, our contribution is the creation of benchmark framework FlexMS for constructing and evaluating diverse model architectures in mass spectrum prediction. With its easy-to-use flexibility, FlexMS supports the dynamic construction of numerous distinct combinations of model architectures, while assessing their performance on preprocessed public datasets using different metrics. In this paper, we provide insights into factors influencing performance, including the structural diversity of datasets, hyperparameters like learning rate and data sparsity, pretraining effects, metadata ablation settings and cross-domain transfer learning analysis. This provides practical guidance in choosing suitable models. Moreover, retrieval benchmarks simulate practical identification scenarios and score potential matches based on predicted spectra.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个名为FlexMS的基准框架，用于构建和评估用于质谱预测的深度学习模型。该框架支持灵活的模型构建和性能评估，并对影响模型性能的各种因素进行了分析，为模型选择提供了指导。此外，还模拟了实际应用场景，建立了检索基准。
AI.motivation: 深度学习在分子结构质谱预测方面展现出潜力，但现有研究在方法和基准方面缺乏统一性，难以进行全面评估。这阻碍了药物发现和材料科学的进展。
AI.method: 构建了一个灵活的基准框架FlexMS，支持动态组合不同的模型架构。使用预处理的公开数据集，通过不同的评估指标对模型进行性能评估。分析了数据集结构多样性、超参数、预训练、元数据剔除以及跨域迁移学习等因素对性能的影响。建立了模拟实际应用场景的检索基准。
AI.result: FlexMS框架能够灵活构建和评估多种模型。分析结果揭示了数据集结构、学习率、数据稀疏性、预训练、元数据以及迁移学习等因素对模型性能的关键影响。检索基准能够模拟实际识别场景。
AI.conclusion: FlexMS提供了一个标准化的框架来评估和指导质谱预测模型的开发。研究结果为选择和优化模型提供了实用建议，有助于提升计算化学在分子识别和性质预测方面的能力。

title: No Caption, No Problem: Caption-Free Membership Inference via Model-Fitted Embeddings
summary: Latent diffusion models have achieved remarkable success in high-fidelity text-to-image generation, but their tendency to memorize training data raises critical privacy and intellectual property concerns. Membership inference attacks (MIAs) provide a principled way to audit such memorization by determining whether a given sample was included in training. However, existing approaches assume access to ground-truth captions. This assumption fails in realistic scenarios where only images are available and their textual annotations remain undisclosed, rendering prior methods ineffective when substituted with vision-language model (VLM) captions. In this work, we propose MoFit, a caption-free MIA framework that constructs synthetic conditioning inputs that are explicitly overfitted to the target model's generative manifold. Given a query image, MoFit proceeds in two stages: (i) model-fitted surrogate optimization, where a perturbation applied to the image is optimized to construct a surrogate in regions of the model's unconditional prior learned from member samples, and (ii) surrogate-driven embedding extraction, where a model-fitted embedding is derived from the surrogate and then used as a mismatched condition for the query image. This embedding amplifies conditional loss responses for member samples while leaving hold-outs relatively less affected, thereby enhancing separability in the absence of ground-truth captions. Our comprehensive experiments across multiple datasets and diffusion models demonstrate that MoFit consistently outperforms prior VLM-conditioned baselines and achieves performance competitive with caption-dependent methods.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为MoFit的无条件图像生成模型成员推断攻击（MIA）框架，解决了现有方法依赖真实文本标签的问题，通过生成过拟合的合成条件输入来识别训练数据中的成员样本，并在不依赖真实文本的情况下提高了攻击效果。
AI.motivation: 现有的成员推断攻击（MIA）方法在评估文本到图像生成模型（如潜在扩散模型）的记忆训练数据问题时，普遍依赖真实的文本标签。然而，在实际应用场景中，这些文本标签往往不可用，导致现有方法失效。因此，需要一种能够在没有真实文本标签的情况下，有效评估模型记忆行为的方法。
AI.method: MoFit是一个两阶段的无条件MIA框架。第一阶段是“模型拟合的代理优化”，通过优化添加到查询图像上的扰动，在模型从成员样本学习到的无条件先验分布区域构建一个代理样本。第二阶段是“代理驱动的嵌入提取”，利用模型拟合的代理样本提取一个嵌入，然后将该嵌入作为查询图像的“不匹配条件”输入模型。这种方法能够放大成员样本的条件损失响应，同时对非成员样本影响较小，从而在没有真实文本标签的情况下提高可区分性。
AI.result: 在多个数据集和扩散模型上的实验表明，MoFit的性能始终优于基于视觉语言模型（VLM）生成的文本条件基线方法，并且在性能上可与依赖真实文本标签的方法相媲美。
AI.conclusion: MoFit成功地开发了一种无需真实文本标签的成员推断攻击框架，有效地解决了现有方法在实际场景中的局限性，证明了在没有 ground-truth captions 的情况下，通过生成模型拟合的合成条件输入，可以有效审计生成模型的记忆行为。

title: The AI Research Assistant: Promise, Peril, and a Proof of Concept
summary:
Can artificial intelligence truly contribute to creative mathematical research, or does it merely automate routine calculations while introducing risks of error? We provide empirical evidence through a detailed case study: the discovery of novel error representations and bounds for Hermite quadrature rules via systematic human-AI collaboration.
  Working with multiple AI assistants, we extended results beyond what manual work achieved, formulating and proving several theorems with AI assistance. The collaboration revealed both remarkable capabilities and critical limitations. AI excelled at algebraic manipulation, systematic proof exploration, literature synthesis, and LaTeX preparation. However, every step required rigorous human verification, mathematical intuition for problem formulation, and strategic direction.
  We document the complete research workflow with unusual transparency, revealing patterns in successful human-AI mathematical collaboration and identifying failure modes researchers must anticipate. Our experience suggests that, when used with appropriate skepticism and verification protocols, AI tools can meaningfully accelerate mathematical discovery while demanding careful human oversight and deep domain expertise.

AI.tldr: 通过人机协作，AI在数学研究中展现出加速发现新定理和结果的潜力，但在代数运算、证明探索和文献综述方面表现出色，然而，人类的验证、直觉和方向性指导仍然至关重要，AI工具的使用需要保持审慎和严格的验证。
AI.motivation: 探索人工智能能否真正推动创造性数学研究，还是仅仅自动化例行计算并引入错误风险。
AI.method: 通过人机协作的案例研究，利用多个AI助手，扩展了手动工作无法达到的结果，并辅助形式化和证明了多个定理。
AI.result: AI在代数运算、系统性证明探索、文献综合和LaTeX准备方面表现出色，但所有步骤都需要严格的人工验证，且AI也暴露了关键的局限性。
AI.conclusion: 当AI工具与恰当的怀疑态度和验证协议结合使用时，它们可以显著加速数学发现，但同时需要人类的仔细监督和深厚的领域专业知识。

title: GFRRN: Explore the Gaps in Single Image Reflection Removal
summary: Prior dual-stream methods with the feature interaction mechanism have achieved remarkable performance in single image reflection removal (SIRR). However, they often struggle with (1) semantic understanding gap between the features of pre-trained models and those of reflection removal models, and (2) reflection label inconsistencies between synthetic and real-world training data. In this work, we first adopt the parameter efficient fine-tuning (PEFT) strategy by integrating several learnable Mona layers into the pre-trained model to align the training directions. Then, a label generator is designed to unify the reflection labels for both synthetic and real-world data. In addition, a Gaussian-based Adaptive Frequency Learning Block (G-AFLB) is proposed to adaptively learn and fuse the frequency priors, and a Dynamic Agent Attention (DAA) is employed as an alternative to window-based attention by dynamically modeling the significance levels across windows (inter-) and within an individual window (intra-). These components constitute our proposed Gap-Free Reflection Removal Network (GFRRN). Extensive experiments demonstrate the effectiveness of our GFRRN, achieving superior performance against state-of-the-art SIRR methods.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为 GFRRN 的新型单图像反射去除网络，通过参数高效微调、统一标签生成、自适应频率学习和动态注意力机制来克服现有方法的语义鸿沟和标签不一致问题，并在实验中取得了优于现有最先进方法的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有基于双流和特征交互的反射去除方法在语义理解和数据标签一致性方面存在不足，导致性能受限。
AI.method: 1. 采用参数高效微调 (PEFT) 策略，集成 Mona 层以对齐训练方向。2. 设计标签生成器以统一合成和真实世界数据的反射标签。3. 提出基于高斯自适应频率学习块 (G-AFLB) 来自适应学习和融合频率先验。4. 采用动态代理注意力 (DAA) 来动态建模跨窗口和窗口内的显著性水平。
AI.result: GFRRN 在大量实验中展现了优越的性能，显著优于现有的单图像反射去除方法。
AI.conclusion: GFRRN 通过引入 PEFT、标签生成器、G-AFLB 和 DAA 等创新组件，有效地解决了现有方法的关键挑战，并在单图像反射去除任务上取得了最先进的性能。

title: UFO-DETR: Frequency-Guided End-to-End Detector for UAV Tiny Objects
comment: 6 pages, 6 figures, published to 2026 International Conference on Computer Supported Cooperative Work in Design
summary: Small target detection in UAV imagery faces significant challenges such as scale variations, dense distribution, and the dominance of small targets. Existing algorithms rely on manually designed components, and general-purpose detectors are not optimized for UAV images, making it difficult to balance accuracy and complexity. To address these challenges, this paper proposes an end-to-end object detection framework, UFO-DETR, which integrates an LSKNet-based backbone network to optimize the receptive field and reduce the number of parameters. By combining the DAttention and AIFI modules, the model flexibly models multi-scale spatial relationships, improving multi-scale target detection performance. Additionally, the DynFreq-C3 module is proposed to enhance small target detection capability through cross-space frequency feature enhancement. Experimental results show that, compared to RT-DETR-L, the proposed method offers significant advantages in both detection performance and computational efficiency, providing an efficient solution for UAV edge computing.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为UFO-DETR的端到端目标检测框架，用于解决无人机图像中小目标检测的挑战。该框架结合了LSKNet骨干网络、DAttention和AIFI模块以及DynFreq-C3模块，以优化感受野、建模多尺度空间关系并增强小目标检测能力。实验证明，UFO-DETR在检测性能和计算效率上优于RT-DETR-L，适用于无人机边缘计算。
AI.motivation: 无人机图像中小目标检测面临尺度变化大、分布密集、目标占比小等挑战。现有算法依赖手动设计的组件，通用检测器又未针对无人机图像优化，难以平衡精度和复杂性。
AI.method: 提出一种端到端目标检测框架UFO-DETR。该框架集成了基于LSKNet的骨干网络以优化感受野并减少参数量。通过结合DAttention和AIFI模块，灵活建模多尺度空间关系。引入DynFreq-C3模块增强跨空间频率特征，提升小目标检测能力。
AI.result: 与RT-DETR-L相比，UFO-DETR在检测性能和计算效率方面均显示出显著优势。
AI.conclusion: UFO-DETR为无人机小目标检测提供了一个高效的解决方案，适用于无人机边缘计算场景。

title: Quantity Convergence, Quality Divergence: Disentangling Fluency and Accuracy in L2 Mandarin Prosody
summary: While second language (L2) learners may acquire target syntactic word order, mapping this syntax onto appropriate prosodic structures remains a persistent challenge. This study investigates the fossilization and stability of the L2 syntax-prosody interface by comparing 67 native Mandarin speakers with 67 Vietnamese learners using the BLCU-SAIT corpus. By integrating C-ToBI boundary annotation with Dependency Grammar analysis, we examined both the quantity of prosodic boundaries and their mapping to syntactic relations. Results reveal a non-linear acquisition: although high-proficiency learners (VNH) converge to the native baseline in boundary quantity at the Major Phrase level (B3), their structural mapping significantly diverges. Specifically, VNH demote the prosodic boundary at the Subject-Verb (SBV) interface (Major Phrase B3 -> Prosodic Word B1), while erroneously promoting the boundary at the Verb-Object (VOB) interface (Prosodic Word B1 -> Major Phrase B3). This strategy allows learners to maintain high long phrasal output at the expense of structural accuracy. This results in a distorted prosodic hierarchy where the native pattern is inverted.

AI.tldr: 越南语学习者虽然在第二语言句法和长短语输出方面表现良好，但在句法-韵律界面上存在结构映射问题，导致韵律层级颠倒。
AI.motivation: 第二语言学习者在习得目标句法语序后，仍然难以将句法正确映射到合适的韵律结构。
AI.method: 研究者使用BLCU-SAIT语料库，对67名母语为汉语的学习者和67名越南语学习者进行分析。通过整合C-ToBI边界标注和依存语法分析，检查了韵律边界的数量及其与句法关系。
AI.result: 高水平的越南语学习者在主语-动词（SBV）界面上的韵律边界（B3）被降级为B1，而在动词-宾语（VOB）界面上的韵律边界（B1）被错误地提升为B3。这种策略虽然有利于保持长短语输出，但牺牲了结构准确性，导致韵律层级颠倒。
AI.conclusion: 句法-韵律界面的习得是非线性的。即使是高水平的学习者，在结构映射上仍然存在显著差异，未能完全掌握母语者在该界面上的韵律模式。

title: Assessing Deanonymization Risks with Stylometry-Assisted LLM Agent
summary: The rapid advancement of large language models (LLMs) has enabled powerful authorship inference capabilities, raising growing concerns about unintended deanonymization risks in textual data such as news articles. In this work, we introduce an LLM agent designed to evaluate and mitigate such risks through a structured, interpretable pipeline. Central to our framework is the proposed $\textit{SALA}$ (Stylometry-Assisted LLM Analysis) method, which integrates quantitative stylometric features with LLM reasoning for robust and transparent authorship attribution. Experiments on large-scale news datasets demonstrate that $\textit{SALA}$, particularly when augmented with a database module, achieves high inference accuracy in various scenarios. Finally, we propose a guided recomposition strategy that leverages the agent's reasoning trace to generate rewriting prompts, effectively reducing authorship identifiability while preserving textual meaning. Our findings highlight both the deanonymization potential of LLM agents and the importance of interpretable, proactive defenses for safeguarding author privacy.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一个基于大语言模型（LLM）的智能体，名为 SALA (Stylometry-Assisted LLM Analysis)，用于评估和缓解文本去匿名化风险。SALA 结合了风格计量学特征和 LLM 推理，能在新闻数据集上实现高准确度的作者推断，并通过引导重构策略来减少文本的可识别性。
AI.motivation: 随着大语言模型在作者推断方面的能力增强，人们对新闻等文本数据存在无意中去匿名化的风险感到担忧。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为 SALA (Stylometry-Assisted LLM Analysis) 的方法，该方法集成了定量风格计量学特征与 LLM 推理。此外，还设计了一个 LLM 智能体来实现结构化、可解释的评估和缓解流程，并提出了一个引导重构策略。
AI.result: 在大型新闻数据集上的实验表明，SALA 方法（特别是当与数据库模块结合时）在各种场景下都能实现高推断准确率。引导重构策略能够有效降低作者的可识别性，同时保留文本含义。
AI.conclusion: LLM 智能体具有去匿名化的潜力，同时，可解释的、主动的防御措施对于保护作者隐私至关重要。

title: CiteLLM: An Agentic Platform for Trustworthy Scientific Reference Discovery
summary: Large language models (LLMs) have created new opportunities to enhance the efficiency of scholarly activities; however, challenges persist in the ethical deployment of AI assistance, including (1) the trustworthiness of AI-generated content, (2) preservation of academic integrity and intellectual property, and (3) protection of information privacy. In this work, we present CiteLLM, a specialized agentic platform designed to enable trustworthy reference discovery for grounding author-drafted claims and statements. The system introduces a novel interaction paradigm by embedding LLM utilities directly within the LaTeX editor environment, ensuring a seamless user experience and no data transmission outside the local system. To guarantee hallucination-free references, we employ dynamic discipline-aware routing to retrieve candidates exclusively from trusted web-based academic repositories, while leveraging LLMs solely for generating context-aware search queries, ranking candidates by relevance, and validating and explaining support through paragraph-level semantic matching and an integrated chatbot. Evaluation results demonstrate the superior performance of the proposed system in returning valid and highly usable references.

AI.tldr: CiteLLM是一个集成了LLM的LaTeX编辑器插件，用于辅助学术文献引用，旨在解决AI生成内容的可信度、学术诚信和隐私问题，通过本地化处理和多重验证确保引用准确无误。
AI.motivation: 现有大型语言模型在学术领域的应用面临AI生成内容可信度低、学术诚信和知识产权难以保障、信息隐私易泄露等挑战。作者希望开发一个更安全、可信的AI辅助工具来处理学术写作中的引用环节。
AI.method: CiteLLM将LLM能力嵌入LaTeX编辑器，支持本地化运行，不传输外部数据。它采用动态学科感知路由从可信学术库检索文献，LLM仅用于生成搜索查询、排序候选文献、通过段落级语义匹配验证和解释支持，并集成聊天机器人提供辅助。关键在于“无幻觉”引用。
AI.result: 评估结果表明，CiteLLM在返回有效且高度可用的参考文献方面表现优异。
AI.conclusion: CiteLLM通过创新的交互模式和严格的引用验证机制，能够为学术界提供一个可信赖的AI引用辅助工具，有效解决了当前LLM在学术应用中面临的伦理挑战。

title: SoPE: Spherical Coordinate-Based Positional Embedding for Enhancing Spatial Perception of 3D LVLMs
summary: 3D Large Vision-Language Models (3D LVLMs) built upon Large Language Models (LLMs) have achieved remarkable progress across various multimodal tasks. However, their inherited position-dependent modeling mechanism, Rotary Position Embedding (RoPE), remains suboptimal for 3D multimodal understanding. The vanilla RoPE formulation fails to preserve essential three-dimensional spatial structures when encoding 3D tokens, and its relative distance computation overlooks angular dependencies, hindering the model's ability to capture directional variations in visual representations. To overcome these limitations, we introduce Spherical Coordinate-based Positional Embedding (SoPE). Our method maps point-cloud token indices into a 3D spherical coordinate space, enabling unified modeling of spatial locations and directional angles. This formulation preserves the inherent geometric structure of point-cloud data, enhances spatial awareness, and yields more consistent and expressive geometric representations for multimodal learning. In addition, we introduce a multi-scale frequency mixing strategy to fuse feature information across different frequency domains. Experimental results on multiple 3D scene benchmarks validate the effectiveness of our approach, while real-world deployment experiments further demonstrate its strong generalization capability.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种名为Spherical Coordinate-based Positional Embedding (SoPE) 的新位置编码方法，用于改进3D大型视觉语言模型。SoPE通过将点云索引映射到3D球坐标空间，更好地保留了3D空间结构和方向信息，并结合多尺度频率混合策略提升了模型性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的3D大型视觉语言模型（3D LVLMs）使用的RoPE位置编码方法在处理3D数据时存在不足，无法有效保留3D空间结构和方向信息，阻碍了对视觉表示中方向变化的捕捉。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为Spherical Coordinate-based Positional Embedding (SoPE) 的新方法，将点云 token 索引映射到3D球坐标空间，以统一建模位置和方向角度。同时，引入了多尺度频率混合策略来融合不同频率域的特征信息。
AI.result: 在多个3D场景基准测试中，SoPE方法验证了其有效性，并在真实世界部署实验中展示了强大的泛化能力。
AI.conclusion: SoPE方法能够有效克服RoPE在3D点云理解中的局限性，通过保留几何结构和增强空间感知能力，为多模态学习提供了更一致和富有表现力的几何表示，并且具有良好的泛化性能。

title: Towards LLM-Empowered Knowledge Tracing via LLM-Student Hierarchical Behavior Alignment in Hyperbolic Space
summary: Knowledge Tracing (KT) diagnoses students' concept mastery through continuous learning state monitoring in education.Existing methods primarily focus on studying behavioral sequences based on ID or textual information.While existing methods rely on ID-based sequences or shallow textual features, they often fail to capture (1) the hierarchical evolution of cognitive states and (2) individualized problem difficulty perception due to limited semantic modeling. Therefore, this paper proposes a Large Language Model Hyperbolic Aligned Knowledge Tracing(L-HAKT). First, the teacher agent deeply parses question semantics and explicitly constructs hierarchical dependencies of knowledge points; the student agent simulates learning behaviors to generate synthetic data. Then, contrastive learning is performed between synthetic and real data in hyperbolic space to reduce distribution differences in key features such as question difficulty and forgetting patterns. Finally, by optimizing hyperbolic curvature, we explicitly model the tree-like hierarchical structure of knowledge points, precisely characterizing differences in learning curve morphology for knowledge points at different levels. Extensive experiments on four real-world educational datasets validate the effectiveness of our Large Language Model Hyperbolic Aligned Knowledge Tracing (L-HAKT) framework.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 L-HAKT 的新方法，该方法利用大型语言模型和双曲空间来改进知识追踪（KT）模型，旨在更好地捕捉学生认知状态的层级演变和个体对问题难度的感知。
AI.motivation: 现有知识追踪方法在处理基于 ID 或文本信息的序列时，未能充分捕捉认知状态的层级演变以及个体对问题难度的主观认知，这是由于其有限的语义建模能力。
AI.method: 该方法包含一个教师代理，用于解析问题语义并构建知识点的层级依赖关系；一个学生代理，用于生成合成学习数据。然后，在双曲空间中对合成数据和真实数据进行对比学习，以缩小关键特征（如问题难度和遗忘模式）的分布差异。最后，通过优化双曲曲率来显式建模知识点的层级树状结构，精确刻画不同层级知识点的学习曲线形态差异。
AI.result: 在四个真实教育数据集上的广泛实验证明了 L-HAKT 框架的有效性。
AI.conclusion: L-HAKT 框架能够有效地解决现有知识追踪方法在捕捉认知状态层级演变和个体学习特征方面的局限性，显著提升了知识追踪的准确性。

title: IRSDE-Despeckle: A Physics-Grounded Diffusion Model for Generalizable Ultrasound Despeckling
comment: 12 pages main text + 6 pages appendix, 7 figures main + 3 figures appendix, 3 tables main + 1 table appendix. Preprint
summary: Ultrasound imaging is widely used for real-time, noninvasive diagnosis, but speckle and related artifacts reduce image quality and can hinder interpretation. We present a diffusion-based ultrasound despeckling method built on the Image Restoration Stochastic Differential Equations framework. To enable supervised training, we curate large paired datasets by simulating ultrasound images from speckle-free magnetic resonance images using the Matlab UltraSound Toolbox. The proposed model reconstructs speckle-suppressed images while preserving anatomically meaningful edges and contrast. On a held-out simulated test set, our approach consistently outperforms classical filters and recent learning-based despeckling baselines. We quantify prediction uncertainty via cross-model variance and show that higher uncertainty correlates with higher reconstruction error, providing a practical indicator of difficult or failure-prone regions. Finally, we evaluate sensitivity to simulation probe settings and observe domain shift, motivating diversified training and adaptation for robust clinical deployment.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于扩散模型的超声去噪方法，该方法在保持图像细节的同时有效抑制了散斑噪声，并通过模拟数据集进行了训练和验证，结果优于现有方法。
AI.motivation: 超声成像中的散斑噪声会降低图像质量并影响诊断，因此需要一种有效的去噪方法来提高超声图像的诊断能力。
AI.method: 该方法基于图像恢复随机微分方程框架，利用扩散模型进行超声去噪。研究人员通过模拟真实超声图像来构建大规模配对数据集，用于模型的监督训练。同时，研究还量化了预测不确定性，并评估了模拟参数对模型性能的影响。
AI.result: 在模拟测试集上，所提出的扩散模型在抑制散斑噪声方面优于传统的滤波方法和最近的基于学习的去噪基线。模型能够有效地保留解剖学上的重要边缘和对比度。此外，预测的不确定性与重建误差相关，可作为困难区域的指示。
AI.conclusion: 基于扩散模型的超声去噪方法能够有效地提高超声图像质量，同时保留重要图像特征。预测不确定性可用于指导临床应用。然而，模拟参数的敏感性和域偏移问题表明，需要更多样化的训练和适应性策略来实现稳健的临床部署。

title: MTRAG-UN: A Benchmark for Open Challenges in Multi-Turn RAG Conversations
summary: We present MTRAG-UN, a benchmark for exploring open challenges in multi-turn retrieval augmented generation, a popular use of large language models. We release a benchmark of 666 tasks containing over 2,800 conversation turns across 6 domains with accompanying corpora. Our experiments show that retrieval and generation models continue to struggle on conversations with UNanswerable, UNderspecified, and NONstandalone questions and UNclear responses. Our benchmark is available at https://github.com/IBM/mt-rag-benchmark

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个名为 MTRAG-UN 的基准测试，用于评估多轮检索增强生成（RAG）在处理包含无法回答、不明确和非独立问题以及模糊回应的对话时的挑战。
AI.motivation: 现有的大型语言模型在多轮检索增强生成（RAG）中仍然面临挑战，尤其是在处理具有不确定性或模糊性的对话时。
AI.method: 创建了一个包含 666 个任务、2800 多个对话轮次、涵盖 6 个领域并附带语料库的 MTRAG-UN 基准测试。并通过实验评估了现有检索和生成模型在处理特定类型问题和回应时的表现。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，检索和生成模型在处理包含无法回答（UNanswerable）、不明确（UNderspecified）、非独立（NONstandalone）的问题以及模糊（UNclear）的回应的对话时，仍然存在困难。
AI.conclusion: MTRAG-UN 基准测试揭示了多轮 RAG 在处理复杂对话场景下的不足，并为未来 RAG 模型的研究和改进提供了方向。

title: OmniGAIA: Towards Native Omni-Modal AI Agents
summary: Human intelligence naturally intertwines omni-modal perception -- spanning vision, audio, and language -- with complex reasoning and tool usage to interact with the world. However, current multi-modal LLMs are primarily confined to bi-modal interactions (e.g., vision-language), lacking the unified cognitive capabilities required for general AI assistants. To bridge this gap, we introduce OmniGAIA, a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate omni-modal agents on tasks necessitating deep reasoning and multi-turn tool execution across video, audio, and image modalities. Constructed via a novel omni-modal event graph approach, OmniGAIA synthesizes complex, multi-hop queries derived from real-world data that require cross-modal reasoning and external tool integration. Furthermore, we propose OmniAtlas, a native omni-modal foundation agent under tool-integrated reasoning paradigm with active omni-modal perception. Trained on trajectories synthesized via a hindsight-guided tree exploration strategy and OmniDPO for fine-grained error correction, OmniAtlas effectively enhances the tool-use capabilities of existing open-source models. This work marks a step towards next-generation native omni-modal AI assistants for real-world scenarios.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了OmniGAIA基准测试和OmniAtlas智能体，以促进跨视频、音频和图像的多模态理解、推理和工具使用，旨在构建更通用的AI助手。
AI.motivation: 现有多模态语言模型主要局限于双模态交互（如视觉-语言），缺乏通用AI助手所需的统一认知能力，而人类智能则能自然地融合全模态感知、推理和工具使用。
AI.method: 构建了一个名为OmniGAIA的新型全模态事件图方法基准测试，用于评估需要深度推理和多轮工具执行的全模态智能体。提出OmniAtlas，一个在工具集成推理范式下、具有主动全模态感知的原生全模态基础智能体，并使用“事后诸葛亮”式树探索策略和OmniDPO进行训练和优化。
AI.result: OmniGAIA能够合成复杂的多跳查询，需要跨模态推理和外部工具集成。OmniAtlas有效提升了现有开源模型的工具使用能力。
AI.conclusion: 该工作是朝着下一代面向真实世界场景的原生全模态AI助手迈出的重要一步。

title: HulluEdit: Single-Pass Evidence-Consistent Subspace Editing for Mitigating Hallucinations in Large Vision-Language Models
summary: Object hallucination in Large Vision-Language Models (LVLMs) significantly hinders their reliable deployment. Existing methods struggle to balance efficiency and accuracy: they often require expensive reference models and multiple forward passes, or apply static edits that risk suppressing genuine visual evidence. To address this, we introduce HulluEdit, a single-pass, reference-free intervention framework. Our core innovation is orthogonal subspace editing: we decompose the hidden states of the model into orthogonal subspaces - visual evidence, conflicting priors, and residual uncertainty - enabling selective suppression of hallucinatory patterns without interfering with visual grounding. This approach mathematically guarantees that edits applied to the prior subspace leave the visual component entirely unaffected. Extensive experiments show that HulluEdit achieves state-of-the-art hallucination reduction on benchmarks including POPE and CHAIR across diverse architectures, while preserving general capabilities on MME and maintaining efficient inference. Our method consistently outperforms contrastive decoding and static subspace editing baselines, offering a new pathway toward more trustworthy LVLMs.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为HulluEdit的单通道、无参考的干预框架，通过正交子空间编辑来解决大型视觉语言模型（LVLM）中的对象幻觉问题，实现了高效且准确的幻觉抑制，同时保留了模型的通用能力。
AI.motivation: 大型视觉语言模型（LVLM）中的对象幻觉问题阻碍了其可靠部署。现有方法在效率和准确性之间难以平衡，要么需要昂贵的参考模型和多次前向传播，要么采用可能抑制真实视觉证据的静态编辑。
AI.method: 提出HulluEdit框架，采用单通道、无参考的正交子空间编辑方法。该方法将模型的隐藏状态分解为视觉证据、冲突先验和残差不确定性等正交子空间，从而选择性地抑制幻觉模式，同时不干扰视觉基础。通过数学保证编辑先验子空间不影响视觉组件。
AI.result: 在POPE和CHAIR等基准测试中，HulluEdit在不同架构上实现了最先进的幻觉抑制效果，同时在MME上保持了通用能力，并实现了高效推理。相较于对比解码和静态子空间编辑基线，HulluEdit表现更优。
AI.conclusion: HulluEdit是一种高效且准确的LVLM幻觉抑制新方法，通过正交子空间编辑技术，能够在不损害真实视觉信息的情况下减少幻觉，为构建更可信赖的LVLM提供了新途径。

title: General Agent Evaluation
summary: The promise of general-purpose agents - systems that perform tasks in unfamiliar environments without domain-specific engineering - remains largely unrealized. Existing agents are predominantly specialized, and while emerging implementations like OpenAI SDK Agent and Claude Code hint at broader capabilities, no systematic evaluation of their general performance has been pursued. Current agentic benchmarks assume domain-specific integration, encoding task information in ways that preclude fair evaluation of general agents. This paper frames general-agent evaluation as a first-class research objective. We propose conceptual principles for such evaluation, a Unified Protocol enabling agent-benchmark integration, and Exgentic - a practical framework for general agent evaluation. We benchmark five prominent agent implementations across six environments as the first Open General Agent Leaderboard. Our experiments show that general agents generalize across diverse environments, achieving performance comparable to domain-specific agents without any environment-specific tuning. We release our evaluation protocol, framework, and leaderboard to establish a foundation for systematic research on general-purpose agents.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个通用智能体评估框架Exgentic，并发布了首个通用智能体排行榜，证明了通用智能体在未接触过的环境中也能取得与领域特定智能体相当的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有智能体大多是领域特定的，缺乏对通用智能体能力进行系统性评估的方法和基准。OpenAI SDK Agent和Claude Code等新兴实现预示着通用智能体的潜力，但缺乏公平的评估机制。
AI.method: 提出了通用智能体评估的概念原则，设计了一个统一协议（Unified Protocol）用于智能体与基准的集成，并构建了一个名为Exgentic的实际评估框架。在六个不同环境中对五种主流智能体实现进行了基准测试。
AI.result: 通用智能体在跨越不同环境时表现出良好的泛化能力，其性能可与领域特定智能体相媲美，且无需进行环境特定的调优。
AI.conclusion: 通用智能体评估是一个重要的研究方向。提出的Exgentic框架和Open General Agent Leaderboard为通用智能体的系统性研究奠定了基础，并表明通用智能体在实际应用中具有巨大潜力。

title: FactGuard: Agentic Video Misinformation Detection via Reinforcement Learning
summary: Multimodal large language models (MLLMs) have substantially advanced video misinformation detection through unified multimodal reasoning, but they often rely on fixed-depth inference and place excessive trust in internally generated assumptions, particularly in scenarios where critical evidence is sparse, fragmented, or requires external verification. To address these limitations, we propose FactGuard, an agentic framework for video misinformation detection that formulates verification as an iterative reasoning process built upon MLLMs. FactGuard explicitly assesses task ambiguity and selectively invokes external tools to acquire critical evidence, enabling progressive refinement of reasoning trajectories. To further strengthen this capability, we introduce a two-stage training strategy that combines domain-specific agentic supervised fine-tuning with decision-aware reinforcement learning to optimize tool usage and calibrate risk-sensitive decision making. Extensive experiments on FakeSV, FakeTT, and FakeVV demonstrate FactGuard's state-of-the-art performance and validate its excellent robustness and generalization capacity.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为FactGuard的代理框架，用于视频虚假信息检测，通过迭代推理和外部工具调用来解决现有MLLMs依赖固定深度推理和过度信任内部假设的问题。
AI.motivation: 现有的多模态大语言模型（MLLMs）在视频虚假信息检测方面存在不足，尤其是在证据稀疏、碎片化或需要外部验证的情况下，它们依赖固定的推理深度，并过度信任内部生成的假设。
AI.method: 提出FactGuard框架，将虚假信息检测视为一个迭代推理过程。该框架能够评估任务的模糊性，并选择性地调用外部工具来获取关键证据，从而逐步优化推理路径。此外，还引入了两阶段训练策略：领域特定的代理监督微调和决策感知的强化学习，以优化工具使用和校准风险敏感的决策。
AI.result: 在FakeSV、FakeTT和FakeVV数据集上的广泛实验表明，FactGuard达到了最先进的性能，并验证了其出色的鲁棒性和泛化能力。
AI.conclusion: FactGuard框架通过引入迭代推理和外部工具验证机制，有效克服了现有MLLMs在视频虚假信息检测中的局限性，并在多个基准数据集上取得了优异的表现。

title: Modality Collapse as Mismatched Decoding: Information-Theoretic Limits of Multimodal LLMs
summary:
Multimodal LLMs can process speech and images, but they cannot hear a speaker's voice or see an object's texture. We show this is not a failure of encoding: speaker identity, emotion, and visual attributes survive through every LLM layer (3--55$\times$ above chance in linear probes), yet removing 64--71% of modality-specific variance improves decoder loss. The decoder has no learned use for these directions; their presence is noise.
  We formalize this as a mismatched decoder problem: a decoder trained on text can only extract information along text-aligned directions. Accessible information is bounded by the Generalized Mutual Information (GMI), with degradation scaling with distributional distance and decoder sensitivity. The bound is a property of the decoder's scoring rule, not of any particular architecture; it applies whether non-text inputs arrive through a learned projection, a discrete codebook, or no explicit adapter at all. We validate this across five models spanning speech and vision. A controlled experiment (two Prismatic VLMs differing only in encoder text-alignment) confirms the bottleneck is the decoder's scoring rule, not the encoder or projection. A LoRA intervention demonstrates the fix: training with an emotion objective improves emotion accessibility ($+$7.5%) without affecting other attributes, confirming that the training objective determines what becomes accessible.

AI.tldr: 多模态大型语言模型（LLM）虽然能处理语音和图像，但无法真正理解语音中的说话人身份、情感或图像中的纹理等信息。研究发现，这些信息并非在编码时丢失，而是在解码时被忽略，因为解码器主要关注文本信息。通过调整训练目标，可以提高模型对特定非文本信息的提取能力。
AI.motivation: 尽管多模态LLM能够处理图像和语音，但它们在理解语音的说话人身份、情感或图像的纹理等细节方面存在局限性。研究旨在探究这种局限性的根本原因，并提出改进方法。
AI.method: 研究者通过线性探针分析了多模态LLM中不同层级所保留的说话人身份、情感和视觉属性信息。他们通过移除模态特定方差来观察对解码器损失的影响，并提出了“解码器不匹配”问题来解释现象。通过计算广义互信息（GMI）来量化信息可及性，并在一系列模型上进行了验证。最后，通过LoRA干预实验，证明了通过调整训练目标可以提高模型对特定信息的提取能力。
AI.result: 说话人身份、情感和视觉属性信息在LLM的各层级均得以保留（高于随机探测3-55倍）。移除64%-71%的模态特定方差可以改善解码器损失，表明这些信息在解码过程中并未被有效利用，而是作为“噪声”。解码器的文本对齐评分规则是信息提取的瓶颈，而非编码器或投影。通过训练时的情感目标可以提升情感信息的提取能力（+7.5%），而不影响其他属性。
AI.conclusion: 多模态LLM在理解非文本信息方面的局限性源于解码器的“不匹配”问题，即解码器倾向于关注文本信息，而忽略了其他模态的细节。通过调整训练目标，可以有针对性地提升模型对特定非文本信息的理解和提取能力。

title: Fine-Tuning Without Forgetting In-Context Learning: A Theoretical Analysis of Linear Attention Models
summary: Transformer-based large language models exhibit in-context learning, enabling adaptation to downstream tasks via few-shot prompting with demonstrations. In practice, such models are often fine-tuned to improve zero-shot performance on downstream tasks, allowing them to solve tasks without examples and thereby reducing inference costs. However, fine-tuning can degrade in-context learning, limiting the performance of fine-tuned models on tasks not seen during fine-tuning. Using linear attention models, we provide a theoretical analysis that characterizes how fine-tuning objectives modify attention parameters and identifies conditions under which this leads to degraded few-shot performance. We show that fine-tuning all attention parameters can harm in-context learning, whereas restricting updates to the value matrix improves zero-shot performance while preserving in-context learning. We further show that incorporating an auxiliary few-shot loss enhances in-context learning primarily on the target task, at the expense of degraded in-context learning ability on tasks not seen during fine-tuning. We empirically validate our theoretical results.

AI.tldr: 研究表明，微调大型语言模型（LLM）以提高零样本性能会损害其上下文学习能力。通过理论和实验发现，仅微调值矩阵可以保留上下文学习能力，而引入额外的少样本损失会侧重于目标任务的上下文学习。
AI.motivation: 现有的大型语言模型通过上下文学习（in-context learning, ICL）可以在少样本提示下适应新任务。然而，通常会对模型进行微调以提高零样本性能，但这可能会损害其ICL能力，尤其是在未见过的任务上。本文旨在理解并解决这种微调对ICL能力的负面影响。
AI.method: 使用线性注意力模型进行理论分析，研究微调目标如何改变注意力参数，以及由此导致的少样本性能下降的条件。探索了两种策略：1) 仅微调值矩阵；2) 引入额外的少样本损失。并通过实验验证了理论结果。
AI.result: 理论分析表明，微调所有注意力参数会损害ICL能力。实验发现，仅微调值矩阵可以在提高零样本性能的同时保留ICL能力。而引入额外的少样本损失主要会增强目标任务的ICL能力，但会损害在未见过的任务上的ICL能力。
AI.conclusion: 微调大型语言模型以提升零样本性能是一个双刃剑，它可能牺牲模型固有的上下文学习能力。通过限制微调范围（例如，仅微调值矩阵）或结合辅助损失函数，可以在一定程度上平衡零样本性能和上下文学习能力，但需要在目标任务ICL和泛化ICL之间做出权衡。

title: AMLRIS: Alignment-aware Masked Learning for Referring Image Segmentation
summary: Referring Image Segmentation (RIS) aims to segment an object in an image identified by a natural language expression. The paper introduces Alignment-Aware Masked Learning (AML), a training strategy to enhance RIS by explicitly estimating pixel-level vision-language alignment, filtering out poorly aligned regions during optimization, and focusing on trustworthy cues. This approach results in state-of-the-art performance on RefCOCO datasets and also enhances robustness to diverse descriptions and scenarios

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为AML的训练策略，通过显式估计像素级视觉-语言对齐来提升Referring Image Segmentation（RIS）性能，过滤掉对齐不良的区域，并专注于可信线索，该方法在RefCOCO数据集上取得了最先进的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的RIS方法在处理视觉-语言对齐方面存在不足，导致模型在训练过程中可能受到不良对齐区域的影响。研究动机是提升RIS模型的性能和鲁棒性，使其能更好地理解自然语言描述并进行准确分割。
AI.method: 引入了Alignment-Aware Masked Learning (AML) 训练策略。该策略通过显式估计像素级别的视觉-语言对齐，识别并过滤掉对齐不良的区域，从而让模型更专注于可信的视觉线索进行学习。
AI.result: AML在RefCOCO数据集上取得了最先进的性能。此外，该方法还提升了模型在处理多样化描述和不同场景下的鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: AML是一种有效的训练策略，通过优化像素级别的视觉-语言对齐，可以显著提高Referring Image Segmentation的性能和鲁棒性。

title: Certified Circuits: Stability Guarantees for Mechanistic Circuits
summary: Understanding how neural networks arrive at their predictions is essential for debugging, auditing, and deployment. Mechanistic interpretability pursues this goal by identifying circuits - minimal subnetworks responsible for specific behaviors. However, existing circuit discovery methods are brittle: circuits depend strongly on the chosen concept dataset and often fail to transfer out-of-distribution, raising doubts whether they capture concept or dataset-specific artifacts. We introduce Certified Circuits, which provide provable stability guarantees for circuit discovery. Our framework wraps any black-box discovery algorithm with randomized data subsampling to certify that circuit component inclusion decisions are invariant to bounded edit-distance perturbations of the concept dataset. Unstable neurons are abstained from, yielding circuits that are more compact and more accurate. On ImageNet and OOD datasets, certified circuits achieve up to 91% higher accuracy while using 45% fewer neurons, and remain reliable where baselines degrade. Certified Circuits puts circuit discovery on formal ground by producing mechanistic explanations that are provably stable and better aligned with the target concept. Code will be released soon!

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种名为“认证电路”的新方法，用于发现神经网络中对特定行为负责的最小子网络（电路）。与现有易受数据扰动影响的方法不同，认证电路通过随机数据采样提供可证明的稳定性保证，使其在不同数据集上更加鲁棒和准确。
AI.motivation: 现有神经网络解释方法（如电路发现）在面对数据变化时表现不稳定，容易捕获数据集特有的伪影而非真实的概念，这限制了它们在调试、审计和部署中的可靠性。
AI.method: 通过使用随机数据子采样来包装任何黑盒电路发现算法，从而证明电路组件包含决策对概念数据集的有界编辑距离扰动是不变的。不稳定的神经元被排除在外。
AI.result: 在ImageNet和OOD数据集上，认证电路的准确率提高了91%，使用的神经元减少了45%，并在基线方法失效的情况下仍保持可靠性。
AI.conclusion: 认证电路为电路发现提供了正式基础，能够生成可证明稳定且更符合目标概念的机械解释，提高了模型的可解释性和鲁棒性。

title: Discourse-Aware Dual-Track Streaming Response for Low-Latency Spoken Dialogue Systems
summary: Achieving human-like responsiveness is a critical yet challenging goal for cascaded spoken dialogue systems. Conventional ASR-LLM-TTS pipelines follow a strictly sequential paradigm, requiring complete transcription and full reasoning before speech synthesis can begin, which results in high response latency. We propose the Discourse-Aware Dual-Track Streaming Response (DDTSR) framework, a low-latency architecture that enables listen-while-thinking and speak-while-thinking. DDTSR is built upon three key mechanisms: (1) connective-guided small-large model synergy, where an auxiliary small model generates minimal-committal discourse connectives while a large model performs knowledge-intensive reasoning in parallel; (2) streaming-based cross-modal collaboration, which dynamically overlaps ASR, LLM inference, and TTS to advance the earliest speakable moment; and (3) curriculum-learning-based discourse continuity enhancement, which maintains coherence and logical consistency between early responses and subsequent reasoning outputs. Experiments on two spoken dialogue benchmarks demonstrate that DDTSR reduces response latency by 19%-51% while preserving discourse quality. Further analysis shows that DDTSR functions as a plug-and-play module compatible with diverse LLM backbones, and remains robust across varying utterance lengths, indicating strong practicality and scalability for real-time spoken interaction.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为DDTSR的低延迟级联语音对话系统框架，实现了“边听边想”和“边说边想”，通过连接词引导的模型协同、流式跨模态协作以及课程学习来提升对话质量和实时性。
AI.motivation: 传统的ASR-LLM-TTS语音对话系统由于严格的顺序处理流程（需要先完成语音识别和完整推理才能进行语音合成），导致响应延迟高，无法实现人类般的即时响应。
AI.method: DDTSR框架包含三个关键机制：1. 连接词引导的小大模型协同：辅助小模型生成连接词，大模型并行进行知识推理。2. 流式跨模态协作：动态重叠ASR、LLM推理和TTS，提前进入可说状态。3. 基于课程学习的语篇连续性增强：确保早期响应与后续推理输出之间的连贯性。
AI.result: 在两个语音对话基准测试中，DDTSR将响应延迟降低了19%-51%，同时保持了语篇质量。DDTSR可作为即插即用模块，兼容不同LLM，并且在不同发话长度下表现稳定。
AI.conclusion: DDTSR是一种有效的低延迟级联语音对话系统框架，通过创新的协同和流式机制，显著减少了响应延迟，同时保持了对话的连贯性和质量，具有很强的实用性和可扩展性，适用于实时语音交互场景。

title: Why Diffusion Language Models Struggle with Truly Parallel (Non-Autoregressive) Decoding?
summary: Diffusion Language Models (DLMs) are often advertised as enabling parallel token generation, yet practical fast DLMs frequently converge to left-to-right, autoregressive (AR)-like decoding dynamics. In contrast, genuinely non-AR generation is promising because it removes AR's sequential bottleneck, better exploiting parallel hardware to reduce synchronization/communication overhead and improve latency scaling with output length. We argue that a primary driver of AR-like decoding is a mismatch between DLM objectives and the highly sequential structure of widely used training data, including standard pretraining corpora and long chain-of-thought (CoT) supervision. Motivated by this diagnosis, we propose NAP (Non-Autoregressive Parallel DLMs), a proof-of-concept, data-centric approach that better aligns supervision with non-AR parallel decoding. NAP curates examples as multiple independent reasoning trajectories and couples them with a parallel-forced decoding strategy that encourages multi-token parallel updates. Across math reasoning benchmarks, NAP yields stronger performance under parallel decoding than DLMs trained on standard long CoT data, with gains growing as parallelism increases. Our results suggest that revisiting data and supervision is a principled direction for mitigating AR-like behavior and moving toward genuinely non-autoregressive parallel generation in DLMs. Our code is available at https://github.com/pixeli99/NAP.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为NAP（Non-Autoregressive Parallel DLMs）的新方法，通过数据增强和并行强制解码策略，解决扩散语言模型（DLMs）在生成过程中出现的自回归（AR）现象，从而实现真正的非自回归并行生成。
AI.motivation: 现有的扩散语言模型（DLMs）虽然声称支持并行生成，但在实际应用中常表现出自回归（AR）式的解码行为，这限制了并行硬件的优势。研究动机在于克服AR的顺序瓶颈，实现更高效的并行生成。
AI.method: NAP方法的核心在于数据处理和解码策略的创新。它将训练数据重新组织为多个独立的推理轨迹，并结合并行强制解码策略，鼓励模型一次性生成多个token，以更好地匹配非自回归的并行解码。
AI.result: 在数学推理基准测试中，NAP方法在并行解码下表现优于使用标准长CoT（Chain-of-Thought）数据训练的DLMs，并且随着并行度的增加，性能提升更加显著。
AI.conclusion: 研究表明，调整训练数据的形式和监督方式是解决DLMs自回归行为、实现真正非自回归并行生成的可行途径。NAP方法提供了一个数据驱动的解决方案，为未来的DLM研究指明了方向。

title: SPM-Bench: Benchmarking Large Language Models for Scanning Probe Microscopy
summary: As LLMs achieved breakthroughs in general reasoning, their proficiency in specialized scientific domains reveals pronounced gaps in existing benchmarks due to data contamination, insufficient complexity, and prohibitive human labor costs. Here we present SPM-Bench, an original, PhD-level multimodal benchmark specifically designed for scanning probe microscopy (SPM). We propose a fully automated data synthesis pipeline that ensures both high authority and low-cost. By employing Anchor-Gated Sieve (AGS) technology, we efficiently extract high-value image-text pairs from arXiv and journal papers published between 2023 and 2025. Through a hybrid cloud-local architecture where VLMs return only spatial coordinates "llbox" for local high-fidelity cropping, our pipeline achieves extreme token savings while maintaining high dataset purity. To accurately and objectively evaluate the performance of the LLMs, we introduce the Strict Imperfection Penalty F1 (SIP-F1) score. This metric not only establishes a rigorous capability hierarchy but also, for the first time, quantifies model "personalities" (Conservative, Aggressive, Gambler, or Wise). By correlating these results with model-reported confidence and perceived difficulty, we expose the true reasoning boundaries of current AI in complex physical scenarios. These insights establish SPM-Bench as a generalizable paradigm for automated scientific data synthesis.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了SPM-Bench，一个针对扫描探针显微镜（SPM）的PhD级别多模态基准测试，通过自动化数据合成管道（AGS技术）生成高质量、低成本的数据集，并引入SIP-F1评分机制来客观评估LLM性能，区分模型“个性”，揭示AI在复杂物理场景下的推理边界。
AI.motivation: 现有通用LLM在科学领域的基准测试存在数据污染、复杂性不足和高昂人力成本等问题，无法准确评估其在专业科学领域的表现。
AI.method: 1. 提出SPM-Bench，一个PhD级别的多模态基准测试；2. 开发全自动数据合成管道，利用AGS技术从arXiv和期刊论文中提取图像-文本对；3. 采用混合云-本地架构，通过“llbox”减少token消耗；4. 引入SIP-F1评分机制，量化模型“个性”。
AI.result: SPM-Bench能够高效地生成高纯度、低成本的数据集；SIP-F1评分能够区分不同模型在SPM领域的性能，并识别出模型的“保守”、“激进”、“冒险”或“明智”等个性；研究揭示了当前AI在复杂物理场景下的真实推理边界。
AI.conclusion: SPM-Bench为自动化科学数据合成提供了一个可推广的范例，并为评估LLM在专业科学领域的性能提供了一个更客观、更具挑战性的方法，同时揭示了AI在复杂推理中的局限性。

title: Asymmetric Idiosyncrasies in Multimodal Models
summary: In this work, we study idiosyncrasies in the caption models and their downstream impact on text-to-image models. We design a systematic analysis: given either a generated caption or the corresponding image, we train neural networks to predict the originating caption model. Our results show that text classification yields very high accuracy (99.70\%), indicating that captioning models embed distinctive stylistic signatures. In contrast, these signatures largely disappear in the generated images, with classification accuracy dropping to at most 50\% even for the state-of-the-art Flux model. To better understand this cross-modal discrepancy, we further analyze the data and find that the generated images fail to preserve key variations present in captions, such as differences in the level of detail, emphasis on color and texture, and the distribution of objects within a scene. Overall, our classification-based framework provides a novel methodology for quantifying both the stylistic idiosyncrasies of caption models and the prompt-following ability of text-to-image systems.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，标题生成模型具有独特的风格特征，但这些特征在生成的图像中丢失了，表明文本到图像模型在忠实遵循提示方面存在不足。
AI.motivation: 了解标题生成模型特有的风格特征及其对文本到图像模型的影响，以及评估文本到图像模型遵循提示的能力。
AI.method: 通过训练神经网络来预测原始标题模型，以区分生成标题或图像。分析数据以找出标题和图像之间的差异。
AI.result: 文本分类器的准确率高达99.70%，表明标题模型具有独特的风格。然而，在生成的图像中，这种风格特征的区分度大大降低，分类准确率降至50%以下。生成的图像未能保留标题中的关键变异，如细节水平、颜色和纹理的强调以及场景中物体的分布。
AI.conclusion: 提出的基于分类的框架可以量化标题模型的风格特征和文本到图像系统的提示遵循能力。研究结果突显了文本到图像模型在图像生成过程中丢失标题信息的挑战。

title: SPARTA: Scalable and Principled Benchmark of Tree-Structured Multi-hop QA over Text and Tables
comment: 10 pages, 5 figures. Published as a conference paper at ICLR 2026. Project page: https://sparta-projectpage.github.io/
summary: Real-world Table-Text question answering (QA) tasks require models that can reason across long text and source tables, traversing multiple hops and executing complex operations such as aggregation. Yet existing benchmarks are small, manually curated - and therefore error-prone - and contain shallow questions that seldom demand more than two hops or invoke aggregations, grouping, or other advanced analytical operations expressible in natural-language queries. We present SPARTA, an end-to-end construction framework that automatically generates large-scale Table-Text QA benchmarks with lightweight human validation, requiring only one quarter of the annotation time of HybridQA. The framework first constructs a reference fact database by enriching each source table with grounding tables whose tuples are atomic facts automatically extracted from the accompanying unstructured passages, then synthesizes nested queries whose number of nested predicates matches the desired hop count. To ensure that every SQL statement is executable and that its verbalization yields a fluent, human-sounding question, we propose two novel techniques: provenance-based refinement, which rewrites any syntactically valid query that returns a non-empty result, and realistic-structure enforcement, which confines generation to post-order traversals of the query graph. The resulting pipeline produces thousands of high-fidelity question-answer pairs covering aggregations, grouping, and deep multi-hop reasoning across text and tables. On SPARTA, state-of-the-art models that reach over 70 F1 on HybridQA or over 50 F1 on OTT-QA drop by more than 30 F1 points, exposing fundamental weaknesses in current cross-modal reasoning. Our benchmark, construction code, and baseline models are available at https://github.com/pshlego/SPARTA/tree/main.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了SPARTA，一个自动生成大规模表格-文本问答基准的框架，该框架能够生成包含复杂操作（如聚合、分组和多步推理）的高保真问答对，并能有效评估现有模型的跨模态推理能力。
AI.motivation: 现有的表格-文本问答基准规模小、人工标注易出错，且问题简单，无法充分测试模型在处理长文本、表格以及进行复杂推理（如多步查询、聚合、分组）方面的能力。
AI.method: SPARTA框架首先构建一个事实数据库，通过从文本中提取原子事实来丰富源表格。然后，它合成具有不同嵌套谓词数量（对应不同跳数）的SQL查询。为确保查询的可执行性和问题的自然流畅性，采用了基于来源的重写技术和现实结构强制技术，限制查询生成于查询图的后序遍历。
AI.result: SPARTA能够生成包含聚合、分组和深度多步推理的高保真问答对。在SPARTA基准上，现有最先进的模型性能大幅下降（超过30 F1点），暴露了当前模型在跨模态推理方面的根本性弱点。
AI.conclusion: SPARTA是一个能够自动生成大规模、高质量表格-文本问答基准的框架，其生成的问题能够有效评估模型在复杂推理方面的能力，并揭示了当前模型在该任务上的不足。SPARTA基准、代码和模型均已开源。

title: ProjFlow: Projection Sampling with Flow Matching for Zero-Shot Exact Spatial Motion Control
summary: Generating human motion with precise spatial control is a challenging problem. Existing approaches often require task-specific training or slow optimization, and enforcing hard constraints frequently disrupts motion naturalness. Building on the observation that many animation tasks can be formulated as a linear inverse problem, we introduce ProjFlow, a training-free sampler that achieves zero-shot, exact satisfaction of linear spatial constraints while preserving motion realism. Our key advance is a novel kinematics-aware metric that encodes skeletal topology. This metric allows the sampler to enforce hard constraints by distributing corrections coherently across the entire skeleton, avoiding the unnatural artifacts of naive projection. Furthermore, for sparse inputs, such as filling in long gaps between a few keyframes, we introduce a time-varying formulation using pseudo-observations that fade during sampling. Extensive experiments on representative applications, motion inpainting, and 2D-to-3D lifting, demonstrate that ProjFlow achieves exact constraint satisfaction and matches or improves realism over zero-shot baselines, while remaining competitive with training-based controllers.

AI.tldr: ProjFlow 是一种无需训练的运动生成方法，能够精确满足线性空间约束，同时保持运动的自然度，适用于运动修复和2D到3D转换等任务。
AI.motivation: 现有的人体运动生成方法在精确的空间控制方面存在挑战，要么需要针对特定任务进行训练，要么优化过程缓慢，并且强制执行硬约束常常会破坏运动的自然性。
AI.method: ProjFlow 采用一种无需训练的采样器，通过引入一种新颖的、感知运动学（kinematics-aware）的度量来解决线性逆问题，该度量能够编码骨骼拓扑结构。这种度量使得采样器能够通过在整个骨骼上协同分布修正来强制执行硬约束，从而避免了朴素投影产生的非自然伪影。对于稀疏输入（如关键帧之间的长间隔），引入了一种随时间变化的公式，利用在采样过程中逐渐衰减的伪观测。
AI.result: ProjFlow 在运动修复和2D到3D转换等典型应用中，能够精确满足约束条件，并且与零样本基线相比，在运动真实性方面相当或有所提升，同时与基于训练的控制器相比也具有竞争力。
AI.conclusion: ProjFlow 提出了一种有效的、无需训练的运动生成方法，能够精确地满足线性空间约束，并保持运动的真实性，克服了现有方法的局限性。

title: Modeling Expert AI Diagnostic Alignment via Immutable Inference Snapshots
summary: Human-in-the-loop validation is essential in safety-critical clinical AI, yet the transition between initial model inference and expert correction is rarely analyzed as a structured signal. We introduce a diagnostic alignment framework in which the AI-generated image based report is preserved as an immutable inference state and systematically compared with the physician-validated outcome. The inference pipeline integrates a vision-enabled large language model, BERT- based medical entity extraction, and a Sequential Language Model Inference (SLMI) step to enforce domain-consistent refinement prior to expert review. Evaluation on 21 dermatological cases (21 complete AI physician pairs) em- ployed a four-level concordance framework comprising exact primary match rate (PMR), semantic similarity-adjusted rate (AMR), cross-category alignment, and Comprehensive Concordance Rate (CCR). Exact agreement reached 71.4% and remained unchanged under semantic similarity (t = 0.60), while structured cross-category and differential overlap analysis yielded 100% comprehensive concordance (95% CI: [83.9%, 100%]). No cases demonstrated complete diagnostic divergence. These findings show that binary lexical evaluation substantially un- derestimates clinically meaningful alignment. Modeling expert validation as a structured transformation enables signal-aware quantification of correction dynamics and supports traceable, human aligned evaluation of image based clinical decision support systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种诊断对齐框架，通过比较AI生成的报告与医生验证结果，以结构化方式分析了AI在临床应用中的误差修正过程，并提出了一种新的评估指标，证明了传统的二元评估方法低估了AI与临床实践的一致性。
AI.motivation: 现有的安全关键临床AI模型在专家纠正AI推理结果的过程中，缺乏结构化的信号分析，导致难以准确评估AI的临床效用。
AI.method: 提出一个诊断对齐框架，固定AI的初步报告（推理状态），并将其与医生验证结果进行系统比较。该框架集成了视觉大型语言模型、BERT医学实体提取和序列语言模型推理（SLMI）步骤，以在专家审查前进行领域一致性细化。评估采用了包括主要匹配率（PMR）、语义相似度调整率（AMR）、跨类别对齐和综合一致率（CCR）在内的四级一致性框架。
AI.result: 在21个皮肤科病例的评估中，精确匹配率（PMR）为71.4%，语义相似度调整后（AMR）无显著变化。结构化的跨类别和鉴别重叠分析得出100%的综合一致率（95% CI: [83.9%, 100%]），且没有病例出现完全的诊断分歧。
AI.conclusion: 二元词汇评估会严重低估临床上有意义的一致性。将专家验证建模为结构化变换，能够实现对信号的感知量化，并支持可追溯的、与人类对齐的基于图像的临床决策支持系统的评估。

title: SPATIALALIGN: Aligning Dynamic Spatial Relationships in Video Generation
summary: Most text-to-video (T2V) generators prioritize aesthetic quality, but often ignoring the spatial constraints in the generated videos. In this work, we present SPATIALALIGN, a self-improvement framework that enhances T2V models capabilities to depict Dynamic Spatial Relationships (DSR) specified in text prompts. We present a zeroth-order regularized Direct Preference Optimization (DPO) to fine-tune T2V models towards better alignment with DSR. Specifically, we design DSR-SCORE, a geometry-based metric that quantitatively measures the alignment between generated videos and the specified DSRs in prompts, which is a step forward from prior works that rely on VLM for evaluation. We also conduct a dataset of text-video pairs with diverse DSRs to facilitate the study. Extensive experiments demonstrate that our fine-tuned model significantly out performs the baseline in spatial relationships. The code will be released in Link.

AI.tldr: 提出SPATIALALIGN框架，通过零阶正则化DPO和几何度量DSR-SCORE，提升文本到视频生成模型对动态空间关系的描述能力。
AI.motivation: 现有文本到视频生成模型在注重美学质量的同时，常常忽略文本提示中指定的空间约束。需要一种方法来增强模型对动态空间关系的理解和生成能力。
AI.method: 提出SPATIALALIGN框架，采用零阶正则化直接偏好优化（DPO）来微调文本到视频模型。设计了一种基于几何的度量DSR-SCORE来量化生成视频与提示中DSR的对齐程度。构建了一个包含多样化DSR的文本-视频数据集。
AI.result: 通过实验证明，SPATIALALIGN框架微调后的模型在空间关系对齐方面显著优于基线模型。
AI.conclusion: SPATIALALIGN框架能够有效提升文本到视频生成模型在描述动态空间关系方面的能力，并且提出的DSR-SCORE度量提供了一种有效的评估方法。

title: RepSPD: Enhancing SPD Manifold Representation in EEGs via Dynamic Graphs
summary: Decoding brain activity from electroencephalography (EEG) is crucial for neuroscience and clinical applications. Among recent advances in deep learning for EEG, geometric learning stands out as its theoretical underpinnings on symmetric positive definite (SPD) allows revealing structural connectivity analysis in a physics-grounded manner. However, current SPD-based methods focus predominantly on statistical aggregation of EEGs, with frequency-specific synchronization and local topological structures of brain regions neglected. Given this, we propose RepSPD, a novel geometric deep learning (GDL)-based model. RepSPD implements a cross-attention mechanism on the Riemannian manifold to modulate the geometric attributes of SPD with graph-derived functional connectivity features. On top of this, we introduce a global bidirectional alignment strategy to reshape tangent-space embeddings, mitigating geometric distortions caused by curvature and thereby enhancing geometric consistency. Extensive experiments demonstrate that our proposed framework significantly outperforms existing EEG representation methods, exhibiting superior robustness and generalization capabilities.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为RepSPD的新型几何深度学习模型，用于解码脑电图（EEG）信号。该模型通过在黎曼流形上使用交叉注意力机制，并结合图论功能连接特征来增强SPD矩阵的几何属性，同时利用全局双向对齐策略来减少几何失真，从而显著提高了EEG信号的表示能力，并在实验中展现出优越的鲁棒性和泛化能力。
AI.motivation: 当前基于对称正定（SPD）矩阵的EEG解码方法主要侧重于统计聚合，忽略了特定频率的同步性和大脑区域的局部拓扑结构。
AI.method: 提出RepSPD模型，采用交叉注意力机制在黎曼流形上整合图论功能连接特征来调节SPD矩阵的几何属性。此外，引入全局双向对齐策略来重塑切空间嵌入，减少曲率引起的几何畸变，增强几何一致性。
AI.result: RepSPD模型在实验中显著优于现有的EEG表示方法，展现出更强的鲁棒性和泛化能力。
AI.conclusion: RepSPD是一种有效的几何深度学习模型，能够更好地捕捉EEG信号的结构信息，为EEG解码提供了新的视角和方法。

title: A Mixture-of-Experts Model for Multimodal Emotion Recognition in Conversations
comment: Accepted to Elsevier Computer Speech and Language. 30 pages, 9 figures, 5 tables
summary: Emotion Recognition in Conversations (ERC) presents unique challenges, requiring models to capture the temporal flow of multi-turn dialogues and to effectively integrate cues from multiple modalities. We propose Mixture of Speech-Text Experts for Recognition of Emotions (MiSTER-E), a modular Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) framework designed to decouple two core challenges in ERC: modality-specific context modeling and multimodal information fusion. MiSTER-E leverages large language models (LLMs) fine-tuned for both speech and text to provide rich utterance-level embeddings, which are then enhanced through a convolutional-recurrent context modeling layer. The system integrates predictions from three experts-speech-only, text-only, and cross-modal-using a learned gating mechanism that dynamically weighs their outputs. To further encourage consistency and alignment across modalities, we introduce a supervised contrastive loss between paired speech-text representations and a KL-divergence-based regulariza-tion across expert predictions. Importantly, MiSTER-E does not rely on speaker identity at any stage. Experiments on three benchmark datasets-IEMOCAP, MELD, and MOSI-show that our proposal achieves 70.9%, 69.5%, and 87.9% weighted F1-scores respectively, outperforming several baseline speech-text ERC systems. We also provide various ablations to highlight the contributions made in the proposed approach.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为MiSTER-E的对话情感识别（ERC）框架，该框架采用混合专家（MoE）模型，通过分离模态特定上下文建模和多模态信息融合来解决ERC的挑战。该模型利用了两个经过微调的大型语言模型（LLMs）用于语音和文本，并通过卷积-循环上下文建模层增强了这些模型的嵌入。一个学习到的门控机制可以动态地权衡三个专家（仅语音、仅文本和跨模态）的预测。此外，还引入了监督对比损失和KL散度正则化来促进模态之间的一致性。该模型在IEMOCAP、MELD和MOSI数据集上取得了最先进的性能，并且不依赖说话人身份信息。
AI.motivation: 对话情感识别（ERC）面临着捕捉多轮对话的时间动态和有效整合多模态线索的挑战。现有的方法在处理这些挑战时存在不足。
AI.method: 提出MiSTER-E框架，一个模块化的混合专家（MoE）模型，用于ERC。核心组件包括：1) 使用微调的LLMs为语音和文本生成增强的声明级嵌入；2) 采用卷积-循环上下文建模层；3) 利用一个学习到的门控机制来整合语音、文本和跨模态三个专家的预测；4) 引入监督对比损失和KL散度正则化来增强模态间的一致性。该模型不依赖说话人身份信息。
AI.result: 在IEMOCAP、MELD和MOSI三个基准数据集上，MiSTER-E分别取得了70.9%、69.5%和87.9%的加权F1分数，超越了多个基线语音-文本ERC系统。
AI.conclusion: MiSTER-E是一个有效的ERC框架，通过模块化的设计成功地处理了模态特定上下文建模和多模态信息融合的挑战，并在多个数据集上取得了优于现有方法的性能。

title: TrajTok: Learning Trajectory Tokens enables better Video Understanding
summary: Tokenization in video models, typically through patchification, generates an excessive and redundant number of tokens. This severely limits video efficiency and scalability. While recent trajectory-based tokenizers offer a promising solution by decoupling video duration from token count, they rely on complex external segmentation and tracking pipelines that are slow and task-agnostic. We propose TrajTok, an end-to-end video tokenizer module that is fully integrated and co-trained with video models for a downstream objective, dynamically adapting its token granularity to semantic complexity, independent of video duration. TrajTok contains a unified segmenter that performs implicit clustering over pixels in both space and time to directly produce object trajectories in a single forward pass. By prioritizing downstream adaptability over pixel-perfect segmentation fidelity, TrajTok is lightweight and efficient, yet empirically improves video understanding performance. With TrajTok, we implement a video CLIP model trained from scratch (TrajViT2). It achieves the best accuracy at scale across both classification and retrieval benchmarks, while maintaining efficiency comparable to the best token-merging methods. TrajTok also proves to be a versatile component beyond its role as a tokenizer. We show that it can be seamlessly integrated as either a probing head for pretrained visual features (TrajAdapter) or an alignment connector in vision-language models (TrajVLM) with especially strong performance in long-video reasoning.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 TrajTok 的新型视频分词器，它能动态调整分词粒度，实现端到端、高效的视频理解，并在视频分类、检索和长视频推理等任务中取得了SOTA性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的视频分词方法（如 patchification）会生成过多冗余的 token，限制了视频模型的效率和可扩展性。而基于轨迹的方法虽然能解耦视频时长和 token 数量，但依赖于慢速且与任务无关的外部分割和跟踪流水线。
AI.method: TrajTok 是一个端到端、可与视频模型协同训练的分词模块。它包含一个统一的分割器，通过空间和时间上的像素隐式聚类，直接生成目标轨迹。它优先考虑下游任务的适应性而非像素级的分割精度，从而实现轻量化和高效。
AI.result: 基于 TrajTok 构建的 TrajViT2 在大规模分类和检索基准上均取得了最佳精度，同时保持了与现有高效分词方法相当的效率。此外，TrajTok 作为 TrajAdapter（用于预训练视觉特征的探测头）和 TrajVLM（视觉-语言模型中的对齐连接器）时也表现出色，尤其在长视频推理方面。
AI.conclusion: TrajTok 是一种高效且通用的视频分词器，它能够动态适应语义复杂性，并与下游任务协同优化。它不仅提升了视频理解的性能，还能作为多功能组件应用于其他视觉和视觉-语言任务。

title: Obscure but Effective: Classical Chinese Jailbreak Prompt Optimization via Bio-Inspired Search
summary: As Large Language Models (LLMs) are increasingly used, their security risks have drawn increasing attention. Existing research reveals that LLMs are highly susceptible to jailbreak attacks, with effectiveness varying across language contexts. This paper investigates the role of classical Chinese in jailbreak attacks. Owing to its conciseness and obscurity, classical Chinese can partially bypass existing safety constraints, exposing notable vulnerabilities in LLMs. Based on this observation, this paper proposes a framework, CC-BOS, for the automatic generation of classical Chinese adversarial prompts based on multi-dimensional fruit fly optimization, facilitating efficient and automated jailbreak attacks in black-box settings. Prompts are encoded into eight policy dimensions-covering role, behavior, mechanism, metaphor, expression, knowledge, trigger pattern and context; and iteratively refined via smell search, visual search, and cauchy mutation. This design enables efficient exploration of the search space, thereby enhancing the effectiveness of black-box jailbreak attacks. To enhance readability and evaluation accuracy, we further design a classical Chinese to English translation module. Extensive experiments demonstrate that effectiveness of the proposed CC-BOS, consistently outperforming state-of-the-art jailbreak attack methods.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种名为CC-BOS的框架，利用古文的特性来自动生成对抗性提示，以绕过大型语言模型的安全限制，并在黑盒环境中实现高效的越狱攻击。该框架通过多维度果蝇优化算法，并结合多种搜索和变异策略来优化提示，实验证明其效果优于现有方法。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型（LLMs）的安全风险日益受到关注，尤其是越狱攻击。现有研究表明，越狱攻击在不同语言环境下效果差异显著。本研究旨在探索古文在越狱攻击中的作用，并利用其特性来提升LLM越狱的效率和有效性。
AI.method: 提出CC-BOS框架，基于多维度果蝇优化算法自动生成古文对抗性提示。提示的八个维度包括角色、行为、机制、隐喻、表达、知识、触发模式和语境。通过“闻味搜索”、“视觉搜索”和柯西变异策略迭代优化提示。此外，还设计了一个古文到英文的翻译模块以提高可读性和评估准确性。
AI.result: 大量的实验表明，CC-BOS框架在黑盒环境下能够有效地生成越狱提示，并且其有效性持续优于最先进的越狱攻击方法。
AI.conclusion: 古文因其简洁性和模糊性，可以有效绕过LLM的安全限制，暴露其漏洞。CC-BOS框架通过自动化方法利用了这一特性，实现了高效且有效的黑盒越狱攻击，证明了其在LLM安全研究中的潜力。

title: Enhancing CVRP Solver through LLM-driven Automatic Heuristic Design
summary: The Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problem (CVRP), a fundamental combinatorial optimization challenge, focuses on optimizing fleet operations under vehicle capacity constraints. While extensively studied in operational research, the NP-hard nature of CVRP continues to pose significant computational challenges, particularly for large-scale instances. This study presents AILS-AHD (Adaptive Iterated Local Search with Automatic Heuristic Design), a novel approach that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to revolutionize CVRP solving. Our methodology integrates an evolutionary search framework with LLMs to dynamically generate and optimize ruin heuristics within the AILS method. Additionally, we introduce an LLM-based acceleration mechanism to enhance computational efficiency. Comprehensive experimental evaluations against state-of-the-art solvers, including AILS-II and HGS, demonstrate the superior performance of AILS-AHD across both moderate and large-scale instances. Notably, our approach establishes new best-known solutions for 8 out of 10 instances in the CVRPLib large-scale benchmark, underscoring the potential of LLM-driven heuristic design in advancing the field of vehicle routing optimization.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 AILS-AHD 的新方法，利用大型语言模型（LLMs）来自动设计和优化用于解决容量车辆路径问题（CVRP）的启发式算法，并在大型实例上取得了优于现有最先进方法的性能。
AI.motivation: CVRP 是一个 NP-hard 问题，对于大规模实例来说，计算挑战仍然很大。研究的目的是利用 LLMs 的能力来改进 CVRP 的求解方法，特别是通过自动设计和优化启发式算法。
AI.method: 该研究提出了一种名为 AILS-AHD 的新方法，该方法结合了进化搜索框架和 LLMs，用于动态生成和优化 AILS 方法中的毁坏启发式算法。此外，还引入了一个基于 LLMs 的加速机制来提高计算效率。
AI.result: 在与 AILS-II 和 HGS 等最先进求解器的对比实验中，AILS-AHD 在中等和大规模实例上都表现出优越的性能。特别是在 CVRPLib 大型基准测试的 10 个实例中，有 8 个实例刷新了已知最佳解。
AI.conclusion: 研究表明，AILS-AHD 方法在解决 CVRP 问题上具有显著优势，尤其是在大规模实例上。LLMs 在启发式算法设计方面的应用能够有效提升 CVRP 问题的求解效率和性能，为该领域的研究带来了新的可能性。

title: Beyond Detection: Multi-Scale Hidden-Code for Natural Image Deepfake Recovery and Factual Retrieval
summary: Recent advances in image authenticity have primarily focused on deepfake detection and localization, leaving recovery of tampered contents for factual retrieval relatively underexplored. We propose a unified hidden-code recovery framework that enables both retrieval and restoration from post-hoc and in-generation watermarking paradigms. Our method encodes semantic and perceptual information into a compact hidden-code representation, refined through multi-scale vector quantization, and enhances contextual reasoning via conditional Transformer modules. To enable systematic evaluation for natural images, we construct ImageNet-S, a benchmark that provides paired image-label factual retrieval tasks. Extensive experiments on ImageNet-S demonstrate that our method exhibits promising retrieval and reconstruction performance while remaining fully compatible with diverse watermarking pipelines. This framework establishes a foundation for general-purpose image recovery beyond detection and localization.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种统一的隐藏信息恢复框架，可以从后验和生成式水印方法中恢复被篡改的图像内容，从而实现信息检索和图像修复。该框架利用紧凑的隐藏码表示，结合多尺度向量量化和条件Transformer模块，并引入了ImageNet-S基准进行评估。
AI.motivation: 现有图像真实性研究主要集中在深度伪造检测和定位，而对被篡改内容的恢复以进行事实检索的研究相对较少。因此，需要一个能够同时实现检索和修复的统一框架。
AI.method: 该方法将语义和感知信息编码成一个紧凑的隐藏码表示，通过多尺度向量量化进行精炼，并利用条件Transformer模块增强上下文推理。为了对自然图像进行系统评估，构建了一个包含配对图像-标签事实检索任务的ImageNet-S基准。
AI.result: 在ImageNet-S基准上的广泛实验表明，该方法在检索和重建方面表现出有希望的性能，并且可以与各种水印管道完全兼容。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为超越检测和定位的通用图像恢复奠定了基础，实现了从水印中进行信息检索和图像修复的功能。

title: Scale Can't Overcome Pragmatics: The Impact of Reporting Bias on Vision-Language Reasoning
summary: The lack of reasoning capabilities in Vision-Language Models (VLMs) has remained at the forefront of research discourse. We posit that this behavior stems from a reporting bias in their training data. That is, how people communicate about visual content by default omits tacit information needed to supervise some types of reasoning; e.g., "at the game today!" is a more likely caption than "a photo of 37 people standing behind a field". We investigate the data underlying the popular VLMs OpenCLIP, LLaVA-1.5 and Molmo through the lens of theories from pragmatics, and find that reporting bias results in insufficient representation of four reasoning skills (spatial, temporal, negation, and counting), despite the corpora being of web-scale, and/or synthetically generated. With a set of curated benchmarks, we demonstrate that: (i) VLMs perform poorly on the aforementioned types of reasoning suppressed in the training data by reporting bias; (ii) contrary to popular belief, scaling data size, model size, and to multiple languages does not result in emergence of these skills by default; but, promisingly, (iii) incorporating annotations specifically collected to obtain tacit information is effective. Our findings highlight the need for more intentional training data curation methods, rather than counting on scale for emergence of reasoning capabilities.

AI.tldr: 当前视觉语言模型（VLMs）缺乏推理能力，这源于训练数据中的报告偏差。作者通过分析OpenCLIP、LLaVA-1.5和Molmo等模型的数据，发现报告偏差导致空间、时间、否定和计数等推理技能表示不足。尽管扩大模型和数据规模以及多语言训练不能默认提升这些技能，但通过专门收集包含隐含信息的数据集进行训练，可以有效提升VLMs的推理能力。
AI.motivation: 视觉语言模型（VLMs）在推理能力方面存在不足，研究人员认为这可能与训练数据中的报告偏差有关。报告偏差是指人们在描述图像时倾向于省略隐含的、但对推理至关重要的信息。
AI.method: 作者从语用学理论出发，分析了OpenCLIP、LLaVA-1.5和Molmo的训练数据，识别了报告偏差对空间、时间、否定和计数这四种推理技能表示不足的问题。然后，他们使用专门设计的基准测试来评估VLMs在这些推理任务上的表现，并探讨了数据规模、模型规模、多语言以及引入包含隐含信息的数据集对推理能力的影响。
AI.result: 研究表明，VLMs在因报告偏差而在训练数据中表示不足的推理任务上表现不佳。此外，扩大数据规模、模型规模以及使用多语言训练并不能默认带来这些推理技能的涌现。然而，通过引入专门收集了隐含信息的注释数据，可以有效提升VLMs的推理能力。
AI.conclusion: 为了使VLMs具备推理能力，仅依赖大规模数据和模型规模是不够的，必须采用更具目的性的数据策方法，主动收集和整合训练数据中缺失的隐含信息。

title: A Decision-Theoretic Formalisation of Steganography With Applications to LLM Monitoring
summary: Large language models are beginning to show steganographic capabilities. Such capabilities could allow misaligned models to evade oversight mechanisms. Yet principled methods to detect and quantify such behaviours are lacking. Classical definitions of steganography, and detection methods based on them, require a known reference distribution of non-steganographic signals. For the case of steganographic reasoning in LLMs, knowing such a reference distribution is not feasible; this renders these approaches inapplicable.
